translated: The meaning of the foot in

original: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i cha des rkang pa'i don sbyin pa'am dor bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i cha des rkang pa'i don sbyin pa'am dor bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the foot should be understood as giving or discarding by the aspect of equality and inequality.

original: rkang pa'i don zhes pa ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams te gnas bcu bzhir steng dang 'og gi rkang pa bdun bdun bzlog pa sa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi dbye bas tha dad pa rnams so //
analyzed: rkang pa'i don zhes pa ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams te gnas bcu bzhir steng dang 'og gi rkang pa bdun bdun bzlog pa sa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi dbye bas tha dad pa rnams so //
translated: The meaning of the foot is the feet of the moon. In the fourteen places, the seven upper and seven lower feet are reversed, different by the division of the qualities of earth and so forth.

original: rkang pa'i don de dag kyang sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rkang pa'i don de dag kyang sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those meanings of the foot are given or discarded.

original: stong la stong pa rnam dag ces pa ni bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma gal te stong par 'gyur na de'i tshe rkang pa'i don yang stong pa ste /
analyzed: stong la stong pa rnam dag ces pa ni bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma gal te stong par 'gyur na de'i tshe rkang pa'i don yang stong pa ste /
translated: If the remainder of the fourteen parts becomes empty, then at that time the meaning of the foot is also empty.

original: sbyin pa dang dor ba med do zhes pa ni byed pa la rigs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang dor ba med do zhes pa ni byed pa la rigs pa'o //
translated: There is no giving or discarding, this is the logic of the agent.

original: bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste zhes pa ni lhag ma rkang pa bcu gsum pa'am rkang pa gcig pa mthong na chu tshod lnga nor ram bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste zhes pa ni lhag ma rkang pa bcu gsum pa'am rkang pa gcig pa mthong na chu tshod lnga nor ram bu lon du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the remainder of the thirteen feet or the single foot is seen, there are five hours of profit or debt.

original: de bzhin du mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs zhes pa ni lhag ma rkang pa gnyis pa'am bcu gnyis pa la chu tshod bcu sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs zhes pa ni lhag ma rkang pa gnyis pa'am bcu gnyis pa la chu tshod bcu sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the word ‚Äúdirection‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúeye and sun‚Äù is applied to the second or twelfth [part] of the day, giving or subtracting ten hours.

original: bcu gcig pa dang me la zhes pa gsum pa la tshes zhes bya ste zhes pa bco lnga 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa dang me la zhes pa gsum pa la tshes zhes bya ste zhes pa bco lnga 'gyur ro //
translated: The eleventh and ‚Äúfire‚Äù [part] in the third [part] is called ‚Äúlunar day,‚Äù that is, fifteen.

original: rkang pa bcu pa dang chu gter zhes pa cha'i lhag ma rkang pa bzhi pa mthong na nyi shur gcig gis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rkang pa bcu pa dang chu gter zhes pa cha'i lhag ma rkang pa bzhi pa mthong na nyi shur gcig gis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: The tenth [part] and ‚Äúocean‚Äù [part] in the fourth [part] of the remainder of the parts, if seen, will be twenty minus one.

original: lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes pa lnga pa dang dgu pa la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes pa lnga pa dang dgu pa la 'gyur ro //
translated: The fifth and ‚Äúhole‚Äù [part] in the fifth and ninth [parts] will be twenty-two.

original: dus zhes pa drug dang nor zhes pa rkang pa brgyad pa la rgyal ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus zhes pa drug dang nor zhes pa rkang pa brgyad pa la rgyal ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: The sixth [part] and ‚Äútime‚Äù [part] in the eighth [part] of ‚Äúwealth‚Äù will be twenty-four.

original: cha'i lhag ma rkang pa bdun pa mthong na chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga mnyam pa la @177b sbyin pa dang mi mnyam pa la dor bar 'gyur te zla ba'i cha 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: cha'i lhag ma rkang pa bdun pa mthong na chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga mnyam pa la @177b sbyin pa dang mi mnyam pa la dor bar 'gyur te zla ba'i cha 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: If one sees the remainder of the part, in twenty-five equal hours, it is added; in unequal hours, it is subtracted, due to the waxing and waning of the lunar part.

original: de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur //
translated: There, the solar feet, clarified by the division of the sun, are added and subtracted.

original: tshes kyi longs spyod de la nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas 'gyur te nyi ma'i bu lon ni de la bu lon no //
analyzed: tshes kyi longs spyod de la nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas 'gyur te nyi ma'i bu lon ni de la bu lon no //
translated: The enjoyment of the lunar day is the solar feet, due to the division of the sun. The sun‚Äôs debt is a debt there.

original: nyi ma'i nor ni de la nor nyid do zhes pa ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i nor ni de la nor nyid do zhes pa ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: The sun‚Äôs wealth is wealth there. This is the division of the sun.

original: 'dir zla ba'i rkang pa rnams ni 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang zhes pa ste 'byung dang zhes pa lnga'o //
analyzed: 'dir zla ba'i rkang pa rnams ni 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang zhes pa ste 'byung dang zhes pa lnga'o //
translated: Here, the lunar feet are emergence, emergence, arrow, Veda, hand, rabbit, the former part, and also the other. Emergence is five.

original: slar yang 'byung ba zhes pa de'i 'og tu lnga'o //
analyzed: slar yang 'byung ba zhes pa de'i 'og tu lnga'o //
translated: Again, emergence is five after that.

original: mda' zhes pa de'i 'og tu lnga'o //
analyzed: mda' zhes pa de'i 'og tu lnga'o //
translated: The word arrow is below the fifth.

original: rig byed ces pa de'i 'og tu bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig byed ces pa de'i 'og tu bzhi'o //
translated: The word Veda is below the fourth.

original: me zhes pa de'i 'og tu gsum mo //
analyzed: me zhes pa de'i 'og tu gsum mo //
translated: The word fire is below the third.

original: lag pa zhes pa de'i 'og tu gnyis so //
analyzed: lag pa zhes pa de'i 'og tu gnyis so //
translated: The word hand is below the second.

original: ri bong can zhes pa de'i 'og tu rkang pa gcig ste /
analyzed: ri bong can zhes pa de'i 'og tu rkang pa gcig ste /
translated: The word rabbit is below the one foot.

original: de ltar gnas bdun po dag tu rkang pa rnams so ;
analyzed: de ltar gnas bdun po dag tu rkang pa rnams so ;
translated: Thus the feet are in the seven abodes.

original: / gzhan gnas bdun po rnams su gcig la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: / gzhan gnas bdun po rnams su gcig la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa ste /
translated: In the other seven abodes, the feet are in reverse order, one and so on.

original: gnas bcu bzhi po rnams su rkang pa lnga'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gnas bcu bzhi po rnams su rkang pa lnga'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to five feet are in the fourteen abodes.

original: de ltar gnas bcu bzhi po rnams su zla ba'i rkang pa rnams dgod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gnas bcu bzhi po rnams su zla ba'i rkang pa rnams dgod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus the lunar feet are placed in the fourteen abodes.

original: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor zhes pa ni /
analyzed: tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor zhes pa ni /
translated: The movement of the equal and unequal attainment of the ocean and moon in the part of the constellation is give and discard.

original: 'dir yang cha bcu bzhi'i lhag ma mthong bar gyur pa na mnyam par thob pa la rgyu ba lnga la sogs pa rnams sbyin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang cha bcu bzhi'i lhag ma mthong bar gyur pa na mnyam par thob pa la rgyu ba lnga la sogs pa rnams sbyin no //
translated: Here also, when the remainder of the fourteen parts is seen, the five movements of equal attainment and so on are given.

original: mi mnyam pa thob pa la dor ro zhes pa ste cha bcu bzhi'i lhag ma gcig mthong na chu tshod lnga gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa thob pa la dor ro zhes pa ste cha bcu bzhi'i lhag ma gcig mthong na chu tshod lnga gzung bar bya'o //
translated: When one part is seen, five hours should be taken.

original: gnyis pa la gnyis pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang lhan cig bcu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la gnyis pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang lhan cig bcu'o //
translated: In the second, together with the one abiding in the second abode, there are ten.

original: gsum pa la gsum pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang lhan cig bco lnga'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la gsum pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang lhan cig bco lnga'o //
translated: In the third, together with the one abiding in the third abode, there are fifteen.

original: bzhi pa la bzhi pa'i gnas na gnas pa bzhi dang lhan cig nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la bzhi pa'i gnas na gnas pa bzhi dang lhan cig nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o //
translated: In the fourth, together with the four abiding in the fourth abode, there are nineteen.

original: lnga pa la lnga pa'i gnas na gnas pa gsum dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: lnga pa la lnga pa'i gnas na gnas pa gsum dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: In the fifth, together with the three abiding in the fifth abode, there are twenty-two.

original: drug pa la drug pa'i gnas na gnas pa gnyis dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: drug pa la drug pa'i gnas na gnas pa gnyis dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: In the sixth, together with the two abiding in the sixth abode, there are twenty-four.

original: bdun pa la bdun pa'i gnas na gnas pa gcig dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la bdun pa'i gnas na gnas pa gcig dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: In the seventh, together with the one abiding in the seventh abode, there are twenty-five.

original: de nas zla ba'i rkang pa 'phel ba bzlog ste brgyad pa mthong @178a * //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i rkang pa 'phel ba bzlog ste brgyad pa mthong @178a * //
translated: Then, reversing the increase of the lunar mansions, the eighth is seen.

original: bar gyur ba na rkang pa brgyad pa snga ma bdun dang bcas pa rnams dor te gzhan ma spyad pa'i rkang pa drug po rnams tshogs gcig tu byas nas chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar gyur ba na rkang pa brgyad pa snga ma bdun dang bcas pa rnams dor te gzhan ma spyad pa'i rkang pa drug po rnams tshogs gcig tu byas nas chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the middle, having discarded the first seven verses of eight syllables, the remaining six verses of six syllables are made into one group, and twenty-four hours are given or discarded.

original: dgu pa la rkang pa lnga po rnams kyi chu tshod nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: dgu pa la rkang pa lnga po rnams kyi chu tshod nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: In the ninth, the five verses of five syllables are twenty-two hours.

original: bcu pa la rkang pa bzhi po rnams kyi nyi shur gcig gis mtshang pa'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la rkang pa bzhi po rnams kyi nyi shur gcig gis mtshang pa'o //
translated: In the tenth, the four verses of four syllables are twenty hours less one.

original: bcu gcig pa la rkang pa gsum po rnams kyi bco lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la rkang pa gsum po rnams kyi bco lnga'o //
translated: In the eleventh, the three verses of three syllables are fifteen hours.

original: bcu gnyis pa la rkang pa gnyis po dag gi bcu'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la rkang pa gnyis po dag gi bcu'o //
translated: In the twelfth, the two verses of two syllables are ten hours.

original: bcu gsum pa la rkang pa gcig gi lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la rkang pa gcig gi lnga'o //
translated: In the thirteenth, the one verse of one syllable is five hours.

original: bcu bzhi pa la stong pa'o zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la stong pa'o zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'i nges pa'o //
translated: In the fourteenth, the zero is zero hours. This is the definitive conclusion.

original: rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no zhes pa la //
analyzed: rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no zhes pa la //
translated: From the remaining transformations by the existence of the cause, the parts of the time and the sun are also like that.

original: 'dir rgyu zhing yod pa zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'og na gnas pa'i tshogs kyi cha shas dus dang nyi mas cha thob pa'i lhag ma rnams rgyu zhing yod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir rgyu zhing yod pa zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'og na gnas pa'i tshogs kyi cha shas dus dang nyi mas cha thob pa'i lhag ma rnams rgyu zhing yod pa ste /
translated: Here, ‚Äúexisting in motion‚Äù means the remainder of the parts of the lunar mansion that exist below the lunar mansion, the remainder of the parts of the lunar mansion that are obtained by time and the sun.

original: tshogs las bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma rgyu ba'i rkang pa gang yin pa de'i sngon ma ni rgyu zhing yod pa'i rkang pa ste /
analyzed: tshogs las bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma rgyu ba'i rkang pa gang yin pa de'i sngon ma ni rgyu zhing yod pa'i rkang pa ste /
translated: The foot that is the remainder of the fourteen parts of the lunar mansion that moves is the foot that exists in motion.

original: tshogs kyi cha shas rnams yod pa'i rkang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshogs kyi cha shas rnams yod pa'i rkang par 'gyur ro //
translated: The parts of the lunar mansion become the foot that exists.

original: der gza' rab tu zhugs te de'i phyir sbyin pa dang dor ba'i don du de gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: der gza' rab tu zhugs te de'i phyir sbyin pa dang dor ba'i don du de gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The planet enters there, and therefore it should be grasped for the sake of giving and discarding.

original: rkang pa des lhag ma tshogs kyi cha shas bsgyur te /
analyzed: rkang pa des lhag ma tshogs kyi cha shas bsgyur te /
translated: By that foot, the remainder of the parts of the lunar mansion is transformed.

original: de las brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis cha thob pa yang de bzhi du sbyin te /
analyzed: de las brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis cha thob pa yang de bzhi du sbyin te /
translated: The remainder of the parts of the lunar mansion that are obtained by one hundred and twenty-six is also given to it.

original: thams cad sngar gyi rkang pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs ji lta ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad sngar gyi rkang pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs ji lta ba de bzhin no //
translated: Everything is just as the collection of hours of the previous foot.

original: de nyid la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas sngar bzhin du nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de nyid la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas sngar bzhin du nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyin pa'am dor bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: In that [calculation], the solar terms are added or subtracted as before, by the solar factors. This is the conclusion.

original: da ni nyin zhag so so'i nyi ma'i longs spyod gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni nyin zhag so so'i nyi ma'i longs spyod gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the daily solar enjoyments are stated.

original: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te /
analyzed: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te /
translated: The day converted by the Vedas is clearly the error.

original: de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o zhes pa la rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur ba ni bsres pa ste /
analyzed: de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o zhes pa la rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur ba ni bsres pa ste /
translated: It is mixed with one-third of that. In this [statement], the day converted by the Vedas is the mixing.

original: rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur ba ni nyi ma'i chu tshod kyi gnas su gsal bar nor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur ba ni nyi ma'i chu tshod kyi gnas su gsal bar nor du 'gyur ro //
translated: The day converted by the Vedas is the error in the location of solar hours.

original: bsgyur ba'i tshes grangs de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa ni nor te chu tshod kyi gnas su sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgyur ba'i tshes grangs de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa ni nor te chu tshod kyi gnas su sbyin par bya'o //
translated: That converted day, mixed with one-third of it, is the error, and should be added in the location of the hours.

original: dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste /
analyzed: dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste /
translated: The lunar mansions of the season, along with the three feet, are the debts.

original: nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar @178b bya zhes pa ni 'dir nyi ma'i rkang pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du gang gis nyi ma'i longs spyod nyin zhag so so la rgyu ba'i chu tshod dang chu srang la sogs pa rnams shes par byed
analyzed: nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar @178b bya zhes pa ni 'dir nyi ma'i rkang pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du gang gis nyi ma'i longs spyod nyin zhag so so la rgyu ba'i chu tshod dang chu srang la sogs pa rnams shes par byed
translated: The meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThe enjoyment of the sun is purified from the center‚Äù is that in order to purify the sun‚Äôs rays, one should understand the sun‚Äôs enjoyment, which is the movement of the hours, minutes, and so on, in each day.üîΩ

original: pa nyi ma'i skye ba'i khyim sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa nyi ma'i skye ba'i khyim sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpurify the sun‚Äôs enjoyment in the middle‚Äù is that in order to purify the sun‚Äôs lunar mansions, one should purify the sun‚Äôs house of birth, which is the one through which the sun passes in each day and night, and which is known as the sun‚Äôs enjoyment.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na byed pa la nyi ma'i nyin zhag so so dag pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na byed pa la nyi ma'i nyin zhag so so dag pa med do //
translated: Otherwise, the sun‚Äôs daily passage would not be purified.

original: de'i phyir tha skar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod las rgyu skar drug dang rkang pa gsum bcas zhes pa chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha skar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod las rgyu skar drug dang rkang pa gsum bcas zhes pa chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste /
translated: Therefore, from the sun‚Äôs enjoyment of the lunar mansions beginning with a≈õvini, six lunar mansions and three feet, that is, forty-five hours,

original: nyi ma'i rkang pa dag par bya ba'i phyir lug la sogs pa'i khyim gsum yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur zhing ka rka ta skye ba'i khyim du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma'i rkang pa dag par bya ba'i phyir lug la sogs pa'i khyim gsum yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur zhing ka rka ta skye ba'i khyim du 'gyur ro //
translated: are purified for the sake of purifying the sun‚Äôs lunar mansions, and three houses beginning with Aries are purified, and Cancer becomes the house of birth.

original: de'i phyir dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the three feet of the lunar mansions are paid off, and the sun‚Äôs enjoyment is purified from the center.

original: longs spyod ni skar ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod de nyi ma'i longs spyod tha dad du byas la longs spyod de'i dbus nas skar ma'i gnas nas skar ma sbyang bar bya zhing chu tshod kyi gnas nas chu tshod sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod ni skar ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod de nyi ma'i longs spyod tha dad du byas la longs spyod de'i dbus nas skar ma'i gnas nas skar ma sbyang bar bya zhing chu tshod kyi gnas nas chu tshod sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Enjoyment is the enjoyment of the lunar mansions, etc. It is differentiated from the sun‚Äôs enjoyment. The lunar mansions are purified from the center of that enjoyment, and the hours are purified from the place of the hours.

original: bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin zhes pa ni 'dir bya ba lhag ma rnams mig dmar gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du nyi ma'i yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin zhes pa ni 'dir bya ba lhag ma rnams mig dmar gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du nyi ma'i yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The remaining activity is like Mars. The remaining activity of the sun should be understood to be like that of Mars.

original: 'on kyang mig dmar gyi rgyu ba'i rkang pa rnams tha dad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang mig dmar gyi rgyu ba'i rkang pa rnams tha dad do //
translated: However, the feet of the movement of Mars are different.

original: nyi ma yi ni ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste ro zhes pa drug go //
analyzed: nyi ma yi ni ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste ro zhes pa drug go //
translated: The sun‚Äôs RƒÅhu is the slow activity of the moon‚Äôs feet, which are six.

original: dus zhes pa de'i 'og tu bzhi'o //
analyzed: dus zhes pa de'i 'og tu bzhi'o //
translated: The time is four below that.

original: ri bong zhes pa de'i 'og tu gcig ste khyim gsum la phyed snga ma'o //
analyzed: ri bong zhes pa de'i 'og tu gcig ste khyim gsum la phyed snga ma'o //
translated: The first half is the three houses below the rabbit.

original: phyed phyi ma ni lugs las bzlog pa ste khyim bzhi pa la gcig go //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma ni lugs las bzlog pa ste khyim bzhi pa la gcig go //
translated: The second half is the reverse order, the one in the fourth house.

original: khyim lnga pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: khyim lnga pa la bzhi'o //
translated: There are four in the fifth house.

original: khyim drug pa la drug ste khyim 'di dag gi las ni dal ba'i las so ;
analyzed: khyim drug pa la drug ste khyim 'di dag gi las ni dal ba'i las so ;
translated: There are six in the sixth house. The work of these houses is slow work.

original: / dal ba'i las 'di la ka rka ta la sogs pa'i khyim drug po rnams su drug po 'di dag rkang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / dal ba'i las 'di la ka rka ta la sogs pa'i khyim drug po rnams su drug po 'di dag rkang par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this slow work, these six become the feet in the six houses beginning with Cancer.

original: gzhan ni mig dmar la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni mig dmar la brjod par bya'o //
translated: The others should be described in terms of Mars.

original: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa //
analyzed: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa //
translated: Having subtracted the hours by the enjoyment, the portion of the moon by the strength and qualities,üîΩthe sun by the addition and subtraction by the power of motion and going, there is no other purification.

original: bgrod dang 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin zhes pa'i tshig 'di ni nges pa'i don te /
analyzed: bgrod dang 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin zhes pa'i tshig 'di ni nges pa'i don te /
translated: This verse is of definitive meaning.

original: ji ltar bkra shis la rgyu ba'i rkang pas chu tshod bsgyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bkra shis la rgyu ba'i rkang pas chu tshod bsgyur te /
translated: As in the auspicious motion, the hours are subtracted by the feet.

original: de las mda' dang yon tan zla bas zhes pa khyim gcig gi chu tshod kyi tshogs te brgya sum cu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: de las mda' dang yon tan zla bas zhes pa khyim gcig gi chu tshod kyi tshogs te brgya sum cu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: The collection of hours of one sign is 135.

original: cha des @179a * //
analyzed: cha des @179a * //
translated: By that part,

original: thob pa ni chu tshod kyi tshogs te chu tshod kyi gnas su nor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob pa ni chu tshod kyi tshogs te chu tshod kyi gnas su nor du 'gyur ro //
translated: the acquisition is the collection of hours. In the place of the hours, there is debt.

original: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis bu lon du yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis bu lon du yang 'gyur te /
translated: By the power of the motion of the planets, there is also debt.

original: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis chu sin la sogs pa la nor dang / ka rka ta la sogs pa la bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis chu sin la sogs pa la nor dang / ka rka ta la sogs pa la bu lon du 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of the motion of the planets, in Cancer, etc., there is debt, and in Leo, etc., there is wealth.

original: gzhan du byed pa la brjod pa'i cho gas ni nyin zhag so so dag pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan du byed pa la brjod pa'i cho gas ni nyin zhag so so dag pa med do //
translated: In the other [signs], there is no distinction of days.üîΩHere, the rule of expression in the calculation is stated:

original: 'dir byed pa la brjod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa nyi ma la ni dus ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir byed pa la brjod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa nyi ma la ni dus ro zhes pa ste /
translated: In the sun, there is time.

original: ka rka ta la bu lon ni phyogs dang po la dus zhes pa chu tshod gsum dang / ka rka ta'i phyogs gnyis pa la ro zhes pa drug go //
analyzed: ka rka ta la bu lon ni phyogs dang po la dus zhes pa chu tshod gsum dang / ka rka ta'i phyogs gnyis pa la ro zhes pa drug go //
translated: In Cancer, in the first part, there is time, three hours. In the second part of Cancer, there is death, six hours.

original: de bzhin du seng ge la sbrul zhes pa brgyad dang bcu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du seng ge la sbrul zhes pa brgyad dang bcu'o //
translated: In Leo, there is a snake, eight hours. In Virgo, there is a snake, ten hours.

original: de bzhin du bu mo la 'phrog byed de bcu gcig dang slar yang 'phrog byed de bcu gcig go //
analyzed: de bzhin du bu mo la 'phrog byed de bcu gcig dang slar yang 'phrog byed de bcu gcig go //
translated: Likewise, in the Dasa-kumara-hara·πáa, there are eleven Haranas, and again eleven Haranas.

original: de nas srang la drag po zhes pa bcu gcig dang phyogs zhes pa bcu'o //
analyzed: de nas srang la drag po zhes pa bcu gcig dang phyogs zhes pa bcu'o //
translated: Then in the Tula, there are eleven Rudras and ten Dik.

original: de bzhin du sdig pa la klu zhes pa brgyad dang drug go //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdig pa la klu zhes pa brgyad dang drug go //
translated: Likewise, in the Vriscika, there are eight Nagas and six.

original: de nas gzhu la me zhes pa gsum dang nam mkha' zhes pa stong pa bgrod pa'i mthar ro //üîΩde bzhin du chu srin la sogs pa la nor ro zhes pa ni byed pa la ste thams cad du grub pa'i mtha' la dgongs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nas gzhu la me zhes pa gsum dang nam mkha' zhes pa stong pa bgrod pa'i mthar ro // de bzhin du chu srin la sogs pa la nor ro zhes pa ni byed pa la ste thams cad du grub pa'i mtha' la dgongs pa ni ma yin no //

original: da ni zla ba'i longs spyod gsungs pa nyi ma la byin zhes pa ni nyi ma'i longs spyod la tshes grangs byin nas 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la zhes pa ni tshes grangs de dag 'og tu drug gis sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: da ni zla ba'i longs spyod gsungs pa nyi ma la byin zhes pa ni nyi ma'i longs spyod la tshes grangs byin nas 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la zhes pa ni tshes grangs de dag 'og tu drug gis sgyur ba'o //
translated: Now, the text says, ‚ÄúThe lunar enjoyment is given to the sun,‚Äù meaning that the lunar days are given to the solar enjoyment. ‚Äú Below, multiplied by 6‚Äù means that those lunar days are multiplied by 6 below.

original: gza'i longs spyod bsres pa dag ces pa ni gza'i longs spyod chu tshod la sogs pa rnams bsres pa dag chu tshod kyi gnas nas dman par gyur pa ni ri bong mtshan ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //üîΩnyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o //

translated: ‚Äú The mixed enjoyments of the planets‚Äù means that the enjoyments of the planets, such as the hours, are mixed. The inferior ones from the place of the hours become the enjoyments of the lunar mansions.üîΩ‚Äú The addition of the sun and moon‚Äù means that the enjoyments of the sun and moon are added.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba'i longs spyod bsres pa dag sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba'i longs spyod bsres pa dag sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚Äú The addition of the sun and moon‚Äù means that the enjoyments of the sun and moon are added.

original: byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig ces pa ni mig ste gnyis kyis tshes grangs rnams bsgyur ba las gcig dang bral ba bdun gyi lhag ma ni byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig ces pa ni mig ste gnyis kyis tshes grangs rnams bsgyur ba las gcig dang bral ba bdun gyi lhag ma ni byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚Äú The agent is the eye multiplied by the lunar day, minus one‚Äù means that the agent is the remainder of the lunar days multiplied by the eye, 2, minus 1, divided by 7.

original: gza'i longs spyod ni longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gza'i longs spyod ni longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
translated: The enjoyment of the planets is the enjoyment of the planets.

original: 'dir yan lag lnga ni gza' dang tshes dang rgyu skar dang sbyor ba dang byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yan lag lnga ni gza' dang tshes dang rgyu skar dang sbyor ba dang byed pa'o //
translated: Here, the five limbs are the planets, the lunar days, the lunar mansions, the conjunctions, and the actions.

original: de la gza' @179b ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang mig dmar dang gza' lag dang phur bu dang pa  bsangs dang spen pa ste bdun no //
analyzed: de la gza' @179b ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang mig dmar dang gza' lag dang phur bu dang pa  bsangs dang spen pa ste bdun no //
translated: The planets are seven: the sun, the moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, and Saturn.

original: tshes ni tshes gcig la sogs pa bco lnga'o //üîΩrgyu skar ni tha skar dang bra nye dang smin drug dang / snar ma dang mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / rgyal dang skag dang mchu dang gre dang dbo dang me bzhi dang nag pa dang / sa ri dang sa ga dang lha mtshams dang  snron dang snrubs dang /
analyzed: tshes ni tshes gcig la sogs pa bco lnga'o // rgyu skar ni tha skar dang bra nye dang smin drug dang / snar ma dang mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / rgyal dang skag dang mchu dang gre dang dbo dang me bzhi dang nag pa dang / sa ri dang sa ga dang lha mtshams dang  snron dang snrubs dang /
translated: The lunar days are the fifteen lunar days beginning with the first lunar day.
