translated: The pure year is the function year.

original: klu bsres ni brgyad bsres pa'o //
analyzed: klu bsres ni brgyad bsres pa'o //
translated: Mixed with nƒÅga means mixed with eight.

original: mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur zhes pa ni bzhi brgyas bsgyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur zhes pa ni bzhi brgyas bsgyur ba yin no //
translated: Divided by space, sky, and ocean means divided by four hundred.

original: klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag ces ni byed pa'i lo brgyad bsres pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa ste dman par byas pa'o //
analyzed: klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag ces ni byed pa'i lo brgyad bsres pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa ste dman par byas pa'o //
translated: Purified by the mixed nƒÅga years means purified, that is, reduced, by the function year mixed with eight.

original: re zla me yis rab tu phye ste zhes pa ni sum brgya bcu bdun gyis phye ba gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: re zla me yis rab tu phye ste zhes pa ni sum brgya bcu bdun gyis phye ba gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: Well divided by the fire of the zodiac means divided by three hundred and seventeen.

original: nam mkha' ros bsgyur zhes pa ni slar yang @181a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' ros bsgyur zhes pa ni slar yang @181a * //
translated: The ‚Äúcorrection for the zodiac‚Äù is again

original: cha'i lhag ma chu tshod kyi don du drug cus bsgyur te ri la sogs pas phye ba ni chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cha'i lhag ma chu tshod kyi don du drug cus bsgyur te ri la sogs pas phye ba ni chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
translated: the remainder of the division by sixty. The ‚Äúcorrection for the hour‚Äù is the remainder of the division by twelve.

original: gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zhes pa 'dir ni mig dmar la sogs pa'i nges pa las nyi ma la sogs pa byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zhes pa 'dir ni mig dmar la sogs pa'i nges pa las nyi ma la sogs pa byed pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe determination of the two and the thirty is the conjunction here‚Äù means that the determination of Mars and so on is the meaning of the agent, the sun and so on.

original: gza'i gnas su gnyis sbyin zhing chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu ste drug cu'i chas thob pa ni gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gza'i gnas su gnyis sbyin zhing chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu ste drug cu'i chas thob pa ni gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the place of the planet, two is given, and in the place of the hour, thirty. The quotient by sixty is the planet.

original: lhag ma ni gza'i chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma ni gza'i chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
translated: The remainder is the hour of the planet.

original: gza'i gnas su bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma gza' ste zla ba dag la lo'i 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: gza'i gnas su bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma gza' ste zla ba dag la lo'i 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rig pa'o //
translated: The remainder of the division by seven in the place of the planet is the planet, the moon, in the revolution of the year. This is the knowledge.

original: da ni lo'i nges pa la lug la sogs pa'i 'pho ba la snon par byed pa la snon byed bcu gnyis gsungs pa lug sogs rnams kyi snon byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod ces pa ste /
analyzed: da ni lo'i nges pa la lug la sogs pa'i 'pho ba la snon par byed pa la snon byed bcu gnyis gsungs pa lug sogs rnams kyi snon byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod ces pa ste /
translated: The adders of Aries and so on are the planets and the hours.

original: gza'i gnas dang chu tshod kyi gnas su gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste /
analyzed: gza'i gnas dang chu tshod kyi gnas su gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste /
translated: The twelve planets and hours are respectively arranged in the places of the planets and the places of the hours.

original: zla ba ri 'byung zhes pa la zla ba ni gza'i gnas su gcig go //
analyzed: zla ba ri 'byung zhes pa la zla ba ni gza'i gnas su gcig go //
translated: The moon is one in the place of the planets.

original: ri 'byung zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: ri 'byung zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa bdun no //
translated: The rising of the mountains is fifty-seven in the place of the hours.

original: 'dir lo'i nges pa dang bcas pas gza'i gnas su gza' gang byung ba'i gza' des lug gi 'pho bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir lo'i nges pa dang bcas pas gza'i gnas su gza' gang byung ba'i gza' des lug gi 'pho bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, by the determination of the year, the planet that occurs in the place of the planets becomes the transit of Aries,

original: chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod gang byung ba'i chu tshod de rnams kyis so zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod gang byung ba'i chu tshod de rnams kyis so zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: and the hours that occur in the place of the hours become the hours. This is the reasoning of the agent.

original: rig byed dag dang zhes pa gnyis kyi tshig ni sdeb sbyor gyi dbang gis te /
analyzed: rig byed dag dang zhes pa gnyis kyi tshig ni sdeb sbyor gyi dbang gis te /
translated: The two words ‚ÄúVedas‚Äù and ‚Äúetc.‚Äù are due to the power of meter.

original: rig byed ni gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig byed ni gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
translated: The Vedas are four in the place of the planet.

original: yon tan mda' ste zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste glang gi 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: yon tan mda' ste zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste glang gi 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The qualities are the arrow, that is, fifty-three in the place of the hour, in the sign of Taurus.

original: ri bong can zhes pa gza'i gnas su gcig go //
analyzed: ri bong can zhes pa gza'i gnas su gcig go //
translated: The moon is one in the place of the planet.

original: ri zla zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bcu bdun te gsum pa la zhes pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: ri zla zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bcu bdun te gsum pa la zhes pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The mountain moon is seventeen in the place of the hour, in the third, that is, in the sign of Gemini.

original: rig byed ces pa ni gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig byed ces pa ni gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
translated: The Vedas are four in the place of the planet.

original: me 'byung zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste ka rka ta'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: me 'byung zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste ka rka ta'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The fire element is fifty-three in the place of the hour, in the sign of Cancer.

original: zla ba zhes pa gza' la gcig go //
analyzed: zla ba zhes pa gza' la gcig go //
translated: The moon is one in the place of the planet.

original: mig dang lag pa zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su nyi shu rtsa gnyis te seng ge la'o //
analyzed: mig dang lag pa zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su nyi shu rtsa gnyis te seng ge la'o //
translated: The eye and the hand are twenty-two in the place of the hour, in the sign of Leo.

original: dus zhes pa gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
analyzed: dus zhes pa gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
translated: The time is four in the place of the planet.

original: rig byed mig ces pa chu tshod kyi gnas su nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste drug pa dag la'o zhes pa bu mo'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: rig byed mig ces pa chu tshod kyi gnas su nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste drug pa dag la'o zhes pa bu mo'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The Vedic eye is twenty-four in the place of the hour, in the sixth, that is, in the sign of Virgo.

original: gza' la drug dang zla ba mda' @181b zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gcig srang gi 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: gza' la drug dang zla ba mda' @181b zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gcig srang gi 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The six planets and the moon are in the place of the hours, fifty-one, in the revolution of the scales.

original: zla ba zhes pa gza' la gcig go //
analyzed: zla ba zhes pa gza' la gcig go //
translated: The moon is in the place of the planets, one.

original: ri dus zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bzhi bcu rtsa bdun te sdig pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: ri dus zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bzhi bcu rtsa bdun te sdig pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The mountain and time are in the place of the hours, forty-seven, in the revolution of Scorpio.

original: me zhes pa gza'i gnas su gsum mo //
analyzed: me zhes pa gza'i gnas su gsum mo //
translated: The fire is in the place of the planets, three.

original: drug zla zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bcu drug ste gzhu'i 'pho ba la'o ;
analyzed: drug zla zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bcu drug ste gzhu'i 'pho ba la'o ;
translated: The six months are in the place of the hours, sixteen, in the revolution of Sagittarius.

original: / rig byed ces pa gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
analyzed: / rig byed ces pa gza'i gnas su bzhi'o //
translated: The Vedas are in the place of the planets, four.

original: ri dang 'jig rten zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu rtsa bdun te chu srin gyi 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: ri dang 'jig rten zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu rtsa bdun te chu srin gyi 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The mountain and world are in the place of the hours, thirty-seven, in the revolution of Capricorn.

original: gza'i gnas su drug go //
analyzed: gza'i gnas su drug go //
translated: The planets are in the place of the planets, six.

original: rig byed stong pa dag ces pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bzhi ste bum pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: rig byed stong pa dag ces pa chu tshod kyi gnas su bzhi ste bum pa'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: The empty Vedas are in the place of the hours, four, in the revolution of Aquarius.

original: stong pa zhes pa gza'i gnas su ci yang sbyin par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa zhes pa gza'i gnas su ci yang sbyin par mi bya ba'o //
translated: The empty is in the place of the planets, nothing is given.

original: mig mda' zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te nyi ma'i go 'phang nya'i khyim la sbyin par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni byed pa la 'pho ba'i longs spyod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mig mda' zhes pa chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te nyi ma'i go 'phang nya'i khyim la sbyin par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni byed pa la 'pho ba'i longs spyod du shes par bya'o //
translated: The so-called eye ray, which is fifty-two in the place of hours, is given to the zodiac sign of Cancer, the position of the sun. This should be known as the enjoyment of the transfer to the agent.

original: grub pa'i mtha' la ni 'di 'pho ba'i longs spyod du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' la ni 'di 'pho ba'i longs spyod du mi 'gyur te /
translated: In the conclusion, this is not the enjoyment of the transfer.

original: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o zhes pa 'dis zla ba'i nang du chu tshod gcig med do //
analyzed: gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o zhes pa 'dis zla ba'i nang du chu tshod gcig med do //
translated: Since it is clear that the day is changed by the Vedas, it is mixed with one-third of that. By this, there is no one hour in the moon.

original: spros pa yis kyang gnas gsum dbu ma dbang phyug gis bsgyur zhes pa 'dis yang nyams pa sos nas nyi ma'i longs spyod gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spros pa yis kyang gnas gsum dbu ma dbang phyug gis bsgyur zhes pa 'dis yang nyams pa sos nas nyi ma'i longs spyod gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, by elaboration, the three places are changed by the lord of the middle. By this, the loss is restored, and the enjoyment of the sun becomes clear.

original: lo gcig gi bar du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gi cha ma gtogs par nyin zhag so so'i longs spyod dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gi cha ma gtogs par nyin zhag so so'i longs spyod dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: For one year, the enjoyment of each day will be clear, except for the part of the day of the sun's orb.

original: slar yang lo gzhan la 'pho ba'i nges pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang lo gzhan la 'pho ba'i nges pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, the certainty of the transits to other years changes.

original: des na nag pa'i zla ba nas slar yang nag pa'i zla ba'i bar lo so so tsam nyi ma'i longs spyod dag go //
analyzed: des na nag pa'i zla ba nas slar yang nag pa'i zla ba'i bar lo so so tsam nyi ma'i longs spyod dag go //
translated: Therefore, from the dark fortnight to the dark fortnight, the solar enjoyments are just the individual years.

original: de'i phyir la byed pa'i lo gzhan la ltos nas des zla ba gcig gi nges pa cung zad dag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir la byed pa'i lo gzhan la ltos nas des zla ba gcig gi nges pa cung zad dag go //
translated: Therefore, in relation to the other years of the agent, the certainty of one month is slightly different.

original: de nas nyi ma'i nyin zhag gi longs spyod nyin zhag so so la dbugs bzhi dang / chu srang gsum med pas ma dag ste longs spyod gyi dbang gis byang du bgrod pa nas byang du bgrod pa'i bar la nyin zhag lnga 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma'i nyin zhag gi longs spyod nyin zhag so so la dbugs bzhi dang / chu srang gsum med pas ma dag ste longs spyod gyi dbang gis byang du bgrod pa nas byang du bgrod pa'i bar la nyin zhag lnga 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the solar enjoyments of the solar days are not pure because of the lack of four breaths and three finger lengths in each day. Due to the enjoyments, five days are omitted from the northern course to the northern course.

original: zla ba so so la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba so so la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Twenty-five hours are omitted in each month.

original: byed pa 'pho ba'i dus nas byed pa 'pho ba'i dus kyi zla ba so so la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag ste /
analyzed: byed pa 'pho ba'i dus nas byed pa 'pho ba'i dus kyi zla ba so so la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag ste /
translated: From the time of the transit of the agent to the time of the transit of the agent, twenty-five hours are added in each month.

original: lo'i mtshams su gza' lnga lhag go //
analyzed: lo'i mtshams su gza' lnga lhag go //
translated: At the end of the year, five planets are added.

original: 'dir chad pa dang lhag pa ji @182a * //
analyzed: 'dir chad pa dang lhag pa ji @182a * //
translated: Here, the deficiency and excess should be understood.

original: ltar shes na byang du bgrod pa'i zla ba dang po la nyi ma bcu'i bar du thur ma'i grib mas yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: ltar shes na byang du bgrod pa'i zla ba dang po la nyi ma bcu'i bar du thur ma'i grib mas yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: When one is proceeding north, one should investigate with the gnomon‚Äôs shadow for ten days in the first month.

original: nyin zhag gang nas brtsams te /
analyzed: nyin zhag gang nas brtsams te /
translated: From whatever day one begins,

original: thur ma'i grib ma byang nas log par gyur pa de ni gza' de dang tshes de dang sbyor ba de dang byed pa des nyi ma 'pho ba'i nyin zhag go //
analyzed: thur ma'i grib ma byang nas log par gyur pa de ni gza' de dang tshes de dang sbyor ba de dang byed pa des nyi ma 'pho ba'i nyin zhag go //
translated: the day on which the gnomon‚Äôs shadow turns back from the north is the day of the sun‚Äôs revolution, with that planet, on that date, in that configuration, and with that activity.

original: nyin zhag de la nyi ma'i longs spyod skar ma'i gnas su nyi shu dang chu tshod kyi gnas su bcva lnga zhes pa rtsa ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag de la nyi ma'i longs spyod skar ma'i gnas su nyi shu dang chu tshod kyi gnas su bcva lnga zhes pa rtsa ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: On that day, the sun‚Äôs enjoyment is twenty in the place of the stars and fifteen in the place of the hours. This is the basic rule.

original: nges pa de la nyin zhag so sor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag rnams kyis thob pa rab tu bsres te /
analyzed: nges pa de la nyin zhag so sor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag rnams kyis thob pa rab tu bsres te /
translated: In that rule, the daily gains of the sun‚Äôs orb are thoroughly mixed in with the days.

original: de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, by the method described above, the sun‚Äôs degrees should be extracted.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag dang / chu tshod dang / chu srang dang dbugs dang khyim gyi 'khor lo longs spyod pa'i mthar thug pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag dang / chu tshod dang / chu srang dang dbugs dang khyim gyi 'khor lo longs spyod pa'i mthar thug pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The root tantra states that the ultimate enjoyment of the sun mandala‚Äôs days, hours, finger lengths, and breaths is the wheel of houses.

original: lo gcig mkha' dus mes bsgyur te //
analyzed: lo gcig mkha' dus mes bsgyur te //
translated: Multiply one year by space, time, and fire.

original: gnas gnyis 'og ma gnyis kyis bsgyur //
analyzed: gnas gnyis 'og ma gnyis kyis bsgyur //
translated: Multiply the two lower places by two.

original: drug cu rtsa lngas bgos thob pa //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa lngas bgos thob pa //
translated: Divide by sixty-five.

original: steng gi phung por nor du sbyin //
analyzed: steng gi phung por nor du sbyin //
translated: The remainder is given as the upper aggregate.

original: slar yang lhag ma drug cus bsgyur //
analyzed: slar yang lhag ma drug cus bsgyur //
translated: Again, multiply by the remainder sixty.

original: cha thob de yi 'og tu yang //
analyzed: cha thob de yi 'og tu yang //
translated: The remainder is the lower aggregate.

original: slar yang lhag ma drug cus bsgyur //
analyzed: slar yang lhag ma drug cus bsgyur //
translated: Again, multiply by the remainder sixty.

original: cha thob de las kyang 'og ste //
analyzed: cha thob de las kyang 'og ste //
translated: The remainder is the lower aggregate.

original: slar yang lhag ma drug gis bsgyur //
analyzed: slar yang lhag ma drug gis bsgyur //
translated: Again, multiply by the remainder six.

original: drug cu rtsa lngas bgos thob pa //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa lngas bgos thob pa //
translated: Divide by sixty-five.üîΩThe remainder is the aggregate of breaths, O King.

original: dbugs kyi tshogs te mi yi bdag / de yi yang ni 'og tu gzhag / nyin zhag chu tshod chu srang rnams //
analyzed: dbugs kyi tshogs te mi yi bdag / de yi yang ni 'og tu gzhag / nyin zhag chu tshod chu srang rnams //
translated: Again, the lower days, hours, and finger lengths

original: dbugs su byas nas rnam gsum slar //
analyzed: dbugs su byas nas rnam gsum slar //
translated: are made into breaths.

original: 'og la ri mkha' ris thob pa //
analyzed: 'og la ri mkha' ris thob pa //
translated: The remainder is the lower aggregate.

original: dbus kyi phung por nor du sbyin //
analyzed: dbus kyi phung por nor du sbyin //
translated: The central heap is the gift of wealth.

original: de las drug cu rtsa bzhis thob //
analyzed: de las drug cu rtsa bzhis thob //
translated: From that, the [amount] is obtained by multiplying by sixty-four.üîΩThe upper heap is the loan to be repaid. The remainder here is the days,

original: steng gi phung por bu lon dbrog / lhag ma 'dir ni nyin zhag dang // chu tshod chu srang dag dang dbugs //
analyzed: steng gi phung por bu lon dbrog / lhag ma 'dir ni nyin zhag dang // chu tshod chu srang dag dang dbugs //
translated: hours, minutes, and breaths.

original: 'di dag 'khor lo longs spyod pas //
analyzed: 'di dag 'khor lo longs spyod pas //
translated: By the enjoyment of these wheels,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
translated: [one obtains] the orb of the sun.

original: nyin gcig rgyu skar gyis bsgyur gang //
analyzed: nyin gcig rgyu skar gyis bsgyur gang //
translated: One day is the amount of the ecliptic divided by thirty.

original: chu tshod drug cus de bzhin te //
analyzed: chu tshod drug cus de bzhin te //
translated: Sixty hours are likewise.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor longs spyod kyis //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor longs spyod kyis //
translated: By the enjoyment of the orb of the sun,

original: thob pa zhag re'i chu tshod do //
analyzed: thob pa zhag re'i chu tshod do //
translated: the result is the hours of each day.

original: slar yang drug cus bsgyur chu srang //
analyzed: slar yang drug cus bsgyur chu srang //
translated: Again, by multiplying by sixty, [one obtains] the minutes.

original: drug gis bsgyur las dbugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: drug gis bsgyur las dbugs su 'gyur //
translated: By multiplying by six, [one obtains] the breaths.

original: longs spyod 'di ni nyi ma yi //
analyzed: longs spyod 'di ni nyi ma yi //
translated: This enjoyment of the sun

original: rgyu skar chu tshod sogs la sbyar //üîΩbgrod nas nyin zhag so sor slar //
analyzed: rgyu skar chu tshod sogs la sbyar // bgrod nas nyin zhag so sor slar //
translated: is applied to the ecliptic, hours, and so forth.

original: bgrod par 'gyur gyi bar du sbyin //
analyzed: bgrod par 'gyur gyi bar du sbyin //
translated: Having traversed [the ecliptic], it is given again until the individual days are traversed.

original: @182b brjod pa'i las kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: @182b brjod pa'i las kyi cho ga yis //
translated: By the rite of the described activity,

original: nyi ma'i rkang pa sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: nyi ma'i rkang pa sbyang bar bya //
translated: the feet of the sun are purified.

original: gzhan du byed pa'i lam gyis ni //
analyzed: gzhan du byed pa'i lam gyis ni //
translated: By the path of the other [feet],

original: nyi ma rtag tu dag pa med //
analyzed: nyi ma rtag tu dag pa med //
translated: The sun is never pure.

original: nyi ma'i longs spyod ma dag na //
analyzed: nyi ma'i longs spyod ma dag na //
translated: If the sun's enjoyment is impure,

original: 'di la sbyangs pa'i mig dmar sogs //
analyzed: 'di la sbyangs pa'i mig dmar sogs //
translated: Here, the purified eye, Mars, and so on,

original: rtsa ba nyams pa'i ljon pa bzhin //
analyzed: rtsa ba nyams pa'i ljon pa bzhin //
translated: Are like trees with damaged roots.

original: 'dir ni gsal ba nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni gsal ba nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: Here, clarity itself will not occur.

original: khyim gyi 'khor lo longs spyad pas //
analyzed: khyim gyi 'khor lo longs spyad pas //
translated: The enjoyment of the wheel of the house

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad bya la //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad bya la //
translated: Is explained to be the orb of the moon.

original: 'khor lo'i chu tshod nyi chu tshod //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i chu tshod nyi chu tshod //
translated: The wheel, the water-clock, the sun, the water-clock,üîΩThe enjoyment of the moon mixed with

original: zla ba'i longs spyod bsres pa dag / sum cu'i chas thob zla longs spyod //
analyzed: zla ba'i longs spyod bsres pa dag / sum cu'i chas thob zla longs spyod //
translated: The thirty-part attainment is the enjoyment of the moon.

original: nyin zhag so so'i chu tshod 'gyur //
analyzed: nyin zhag so so'i chu tshod 'gyur //
translated: The water-clock of each day changes.

original: zla bas nyin zhag chu tshod dang // chu srang dbugs ni gang dag gis //üîΩ'khor lo'i chu tshod mthar spyod pa //
analyzed: zla bas nyin zhag chu tshod dang // chu srang dbugs ni gang dag gis // 'khor lo'i chu tshod mthar spyod pa //
translated: The water-clock of the day and the water-measure and breathüîΩBy which the enjoyment of the wheel's water-clock ends

original: de ni de yi dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni de yi dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
translated: Is its orb.

original: nyin zhag stong phrag drug dang ni //üîΩdgu brgya sgra gcan dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: nyin zhag stong phrag drug dang ni // dgu brgya sgra gcan dkyil 'khor te //
translated: Six thousand and nine hundred daysüîΩIs RƒÅhu's orb.

original: mig dmar la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: mig dmar la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The orbs of Mars and so on

original: rang rang rgyu ba las rab grub //
analyzed: rang rang rgyu ba las rab grub //
translated: Are established from their own movements.

original: nyin gcig rgyu skar rnams kyis bsgyur //
analyzed: nyin gcig rgyu skar rnams kyis bsgyur //
translated: Multiply by one day.üîΩDivide by the circle.

original: dkyil 'khor gyis ni rnam par dbye //üîΩthob pa dag ni skar mar 'gyur //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyis ni rnam par dbye // thob pa dag ni skar mar 'gyur //
translated: The remainder is the lunar day.

original: lhag ma slar yang drug cus bsgyur //
analyzed: lhag ma slar yang drug cus bsgyur //
translated: Multiply the remainder by sixty.üîΩDivide by the circle.

original: dkyil 'khor cha yis chu tshod de //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor cha yis chu tshod de //
translated: The quotient is the hour.

original: de bzhin chu srang dbugs dag kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin chu srang dbugs dag kyang //
translated: The remainder is the breath.

original: dkyil 'khor chas thob gza' rnams kyi //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chas thob gza' rnams kyi //
translated: The quotient of the circle is the lunar day.üîΩThe lords of men should know that the planets are purified by the motion of the planets.

original: nyin zhag so sor mi yi bdag / de nyid sbyin pa byas nas ni //üîΩgza' yi rgyu bas gza' sbyang bya //
analyzed: nyin zhag so sor mi yi bdag / de nyid sbyin pa byas nas ni // gza' yi rgyu bas gza' sbyang bya //
translated: Having performed the gift of the planets,

original: gang tshe gza' yi longs spyod dag / de tshe zla ba'i cha 'char la //
analyzed: gang tshe gza' yi longs spyod dag / de tshe zla ba'i cha 'char la //
translated: when the enjoyment of the planets arises, then the lunar day should be known by the part of the moon.

original: bgrod pa'i ri mo la gnas pa //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i ri mo la gnas pa //
translated: It is located in the line of motion.

original: zla ba'i longs spyod kyis shes bya //
analyzed: zla ba'i longs spyod kyis shes bya //
translated: The enjoyment of the moon should be known by the enjoyment of the moon.

original: bgrod pas nyi ma sbyangs byas te //
analyzed: bgrod pas nyi ma sbyangs byas te //
translated: The motion should be purified by the sun.

original: longs spyod cha gcig la gnas pa'i //üîΩzla ba nyi mas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: longs spyod cha gcig la gnas pa'i // zla ba nyi mas sbyang bar bya //
translated: The moon, located in one part of the enjoyment,üîΩshould be purified by the sun.

original: zla bas mig dmar la sogs so //
analyzed: zla bas mig dmar la sogs so //
translated: The moon should be purified by Mars and so forth.

original: tshigs mtshams dkar po nag po la //
analyzed: tshigs mtshams dkar po nag po la //
translated: In the white and black phases,

original: tshes grangs gnyis ka'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: tshes grangs gnyis ka'i dbus su ni //
translated: in the middle of the two lunar days,

original: zla ba nyi ma rnam 'joms pa //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma rnam 'joms pa //
translated: The moon, the sun, and the conqueror,

original: sgra gcan 'jug pas tshes grangs so //
analyzed: sgra gcan 'jug pas tshes grangs so //
translated: are the lunar days, by the entry of RƒÅhu.

original: de ltar thams cad yongs shes nas //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad yongs shes nas //
translated: Thus, knowing everything,

original: grub mtha'i longs spyod rnam pa gzhan //
analyzed: grub mtha'i longs spyod rnam pa gzhan //
translated: the enjoyment of the conclusion is of another kind.

original: rnam gzhan nyung ngu'i byed la sogs //
analyzed: rnam gzhan nyung ngu'i byed la sogs //
translated: Another kind is the little-doing, etc.,

original: 'di las ma dag rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'di las ma dag rnam par spangs //
translated: excluded from this, the impure.

original: zhes so // de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid gsungs so //
translated: Thus, by the sequence of statements, the characteristics of the conclusion are stated in the Supreme King of Tantras, the Original Buddha.

original: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po @183a * //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po @183a * //
translated: In the Compendium Tantra,

original: las grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams zhes pa'i tshig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: las grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams zhes pa'i tshig gis bsdus te /
translated: the conclusions are summarized by the words deteriorated.

original: rgyud las gsal por ma mdzad do //
analyzed: rgyud las gsal por ma mdzad do //
translated: It is not clearly stated in the tantra.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dir mu stegs pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mthong ste /
analyzed: 'dir mu stegs pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mthong ste /
translated: Here, the tƒ´rthikas saw the Compendium Tantra.

original: nyi ma'i longs spyod rnam par dag pa mthong nas /
analyzed: nyi ma'i longs spyod rnam par dag pa mthong nas /
translated: Seeing the pure enjoyment of the sun,

original: bdag cag gi byed pa la yang nyi ma'i longs spyod rnam par dag pa yod do zhes rang gi byed pa'i nang du 'dri bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdag cag gi byed pa la yang nyi ma'i longs spyod rnam par dag pa yod do zhes rang gi byed pa'i nang du 'dri bar 'gyur te /
translated: Also, with regard to our own activity, there is the pure enjoyment of the sun.

original: rgyu des na 'grel bshad la ltos nas gsal por ma mdzad do //
analyzed: rgyu des na 'grel bshad la ltos nas gsal por ma mdzad do //
translated: For that reason, it is not clearly stated in the commentary.üîΩNow, the increase and decrease of day and night are stated: There are six months of increase and decrease, as numbered, there are two, increase and decrease.

original: da ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo 'phel ba dang 'grib pa gsungs pa zla drug 'phel dang / 'grib pa zhes pa ste grangs bzhin du 'phel ba dang 'grib pa gnyis su 'gyur ro nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang zhes pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo dag go //
analyzed: da ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo 'phel ba dang 'grib pa gsungs pa zla drug 'phel dang / 'grib pa zhes pa ste grangs bzhin du 'phel ba dang 'grib pa gnyis su 'gyur ro nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang zhes pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo dag go //
translated: And also of day and night means of day and night.

original: nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so zhes pa ni nyi ma byang du rgyu ba dang lhor rgyu bas ni nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so //
analyzed: nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so zhes pa ni nyi ma byang du rgyu ba dang lhor rgyu bas ni nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so //
translated: By the movement of the sun means by the movement of the sun to the north and to the south.

original: chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gis tshad 'di ni kee l'a sha'i byang gi cha khab can gyi bar du ste nyin zhag so so la dbugs bzhi dang chu srang gsum bgrod pa'i yan lagüîΩgis 'phel zhing 'grib bo //üîΩbgrod pa'i yan lag ni phyed dang bcas pa'i brgyad cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i nyin zhag brgya ste bgrod pa'i yan lag nyin zhag de rnams kyis lho phyogs su mtshan mo 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gis tshad 'di ni kee l'a sha'i byang gi cha khab can gyi bar du ste nyin zhag so so la dbugs bzhi dang chu srang gsum bgrod pa'i yan lag gis 'phel zhing 'grib bo // bgrod pa'i yan lag ni phyed dang bcas pa'i brgyad cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i nyin zhag brgya ste bgrod pa'i yan lag nyin zhag de rnams kyis lho phyogs su mtshan mo 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: This is the measure of the movement of the sun from the northern to the southern side of Meru, increasing and decreasing by one unit every day and night.üîΩThe movement of one unit is one hundred and eighty-five days and nights.

original: byang du nyin mo'o //
analyzed: byang du nyin mo'o //
translated: By those days and nights of movement, the nights increase in the south and the days increase in the north.

original: kee l'a sha'i lho phyogs la ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: kee l'a sha'i lho phyogs la ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o //
translated: The decrease in the south will be explained later.

original: tshad 'di la lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug gis nyin mor 'gyur zhing nyi shu rtsa bzhis mtshan mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad 'di la lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug gis nyin mor 'gyur zhing nyi shu rtsa bzhis mtshan mor 'gyur ro //
translated: On the days of the southern solstice, there are thirty-six hours of day and twenty-four hours of night.

original: de bzhin du byang du bgrod pa la mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i tshad bzlog pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang du bgrod pa la mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i tshad bzlog pas shes par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, one should understand the extent of the night and day in the northern course by reversing the above.

original: da ni sgra gcan rgyu skar la longs spyod pa gsungs pa zla ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sgra gcan rgyu skar la longs spyod pa gsungs pa zla ba zhes pa ste /
translated: Now, the passage on Rahu's enjoyment of the lunar mansions is stated:

original: zla ba ni byed pa'i zla ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba ni byed pa'i zla ba'o //
translated: The moon is the performing moon.

original: mig dang nyi ma bsres pa zhes pa ni phyed pa la ltos pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha' la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig dang nyi ma bsres pa zhes pa ni phyed pa la ltos pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha' la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: The eye and the sun mixed refers to the half, not to the tenet.

original: mig dang nyi ma zhes pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis bsres pa'o //
analyzed: mig dang nyi ma zhes pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis bsres pa'o //
translated: The eye and the sun is mixed with one hundred and twenty-two.

original: mig gis rnam 'gyur zhes pa ni phyogs kyi phung po'i don du gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: mig gis rnam 'gyur zhes pa ni phyogs kyi phung po'i don du gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The eye's transformation is multiplied by two for the purpose of the directional aggregate.

original: zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te @183b zhes pa ni nya'i longs spyod kyi don du phyogs gcig bsres pa dang gnam stong gi longs spyod kyi don du phyogs gnyis bsres pa phyogs kyi phung por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te @183b zhes pa ni nya'i longs spyod kyi don du phyogs gcig bsres pa dang gnam stong gi longs spyod kyi don du phyogs gnyis bsres pa phyogs kyi phung por 'gyur ro //
translated: One mixed in the lunar mansion is mixed with one for the purpose of the enjoyment of the full moon, and mixed with two for the purpose of the enjoyment of the new moon, which becomes the directional aggregate.

original: mkha' dus chu yis rab phye zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mkha' dus chu yis rab phye zhes pa ni /
translated: Well divided by the space, time, and water

original: sgra gcan gyi phyogs kyi longs spyod kyi don du phyogs kyi 'khor lo phyogs bzhi brgya drug cus bgos te mkha' dus chu des rab tu phye ba'i lhag ma'i phyogs gang yin pa de dag thub pa lag pas bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra gcan gyi phyogs kyi longs spyod kyi don du phyogs kyi 'khor lo phyogs bzhi brgya drug cus bgos te mkha' dus chu des rab tu phye ba'i lhag ma'i phyogs gang yin pa de dag thub pa lag pas bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For the sake of RƒÅhu‚Äôs enjoyment of the directions, the wheel of the directions is divided into four hundred and sixty parts. The remaining directions, which are distinguished by space, time, and water, are turned by the hand of the Sage.

original: skar ma'i longs spyod kyi don du mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o zhes pa ni stong pa la sogs pa bzhi brgya drug cu'i chas thob pa skar mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar ma'i longs spyod kyi don du mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o zhes pa ni stong pa la sogs pa bzhi brgya drug cu'i chas thob pa skar mar 'gyur ro //
translated: For the sake of the enjoyment of the stars, the stars are obtained by the parts of space, etc. The stars are obtained by the parts of the four hundred and sixty, such as the empty, etc.

original: slar yang lhag ma ni lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin pa las cha de nyid kyis thob pa chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang lhag ma ni lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin pa las cha de nyid kyis thob pa chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, the remaining [parts] are multiplied by the remaining sixty. The parts obtained by that part are muh≈´rtas.

original: de bzhin du drug cus bsgyur ba las cha de nyid kyis chu srang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du drug cus bsgyur ba las cha de nyid kyis chu srang du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the parts obtained by that part from the multiplication by sixty are gha·π≠ƒ´s.

original: drug gis bsgyur ba las cha de nyid kyis dbugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug gis bsgyur ba las cha de nyid kyis dbugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The parts obtained by that part from the multiplication by six are breaths.

original: thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong 'dir mkha' dus chu yis thob pa'i skar ma la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor lo skar ma nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid la dman par byas pa'i 'khor lo ni gdong du 'gyur te tha skar la
analyzed: thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong 'dir mkha' dus chu yis thob pa'i skar ma la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor lo skar ma nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid la dman par byas pa'i 'khor lo ni gdong du 'gyur te tha skar la
translated: The face of the wheel is inferior to the obtained, that is, the stars obtained by space, time, and water.

original: sogs pas gdong gi skar ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sogs pas gdong gi skar ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
translated: Those stars make the wheel inferior to the twenty-seven stars.

original: mun can ni sgra gcan te 'di la mun pa yod pa'i phyir mun can no //
analyzed: mun can ni sgra gcan te 'di la mun pa yod pa'i phyir mun can no //
translated: Rahu is the dark one, because it has darkness.

original: mun can de'i mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o zhes pa la rgyu skar phyed ni skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum ste /
analyzed: mun can de'i mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o zhes pa la rgyu skar phyed ni skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum ste /
translated: The tail of Rahu is half the lunar mansions mixed. Half the lunar mansions are thirteen with half a star.

original: de dag gdong gi longs spyod la bsres pa ni mjug ma zhes pa mjug ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gdong gi longs spyod la bsres pa ni mjug ma zhes pa mjug ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
translated: Those mixed with the enjoyment of the face are the tail, that is, the enjoyment of the tail.

original: da ni bkra shis la sogs pa rnams rgyu skar la longs spyod pa'i don du nyin zhag gi tshogs gsungs pa zla ba zhes pa byed pa'i zla ba'o //
analyzed: da ni bkra shis la sogs pa rnams rgyu skar la longs spyod pa'i don du nyin zhag gi tshogs gsungs pa zla ba zhes pa byed pa'i zla ba'o //
translated: Now, in order to enjoy the lunar mansions, etc., the author states the collection of days. The word ‚Äúmonth‚Äù is the operative month.

original: nyin zhag gi phung po'i don du sum cus bsgyur bas de dag nyin zhag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin zhag gi phung po'i don du sum cus bsgyur bas de dag nyin zhag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: By multiplying by thirty for the purpose of the collection of days, they become days.

original: nyin zhag de dag da ltar ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag so so dang bcas pa gnas gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin zhag de dag da ltar ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag so so dang bcas pa gnas gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Those days, together with the individual days of the present moon, become the three abodes.

original: 'og gi phung po las ri mkha' ris thob pa zhes pa bdun brgya bdun gyis cha thob pa dbu ma'i phung por rnam par bsre'o //
analyzed: 'og gi phung po las ri mkha' ris thob pa zhes pa bdun brgya bdun gyis cha thob pa dbu ma'i phung por rnam par bsre'o //
translated: From the collection below, the ‚Äúobtaining of the zodiacs‚Äù is the obtaining of the seven hundred parts in the central collection.

original: dbu ma'i phung po de dag las kyang chu gter ro //
analyzed: dbu ma'i phung po de dag las kyang chu gter ro //
translated: From those central collections, there are also the oceans.

original: drug cu rtsa bzhis cha thob pas dman pa mi gsal nyin zhag go //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa bzhis cha thob pas dman pa mi gsal nyin zhag go //
translated: By obtaining the sixty-fourth part, the inferior unclear day.

original: kha cig tu nyin zhag so so'i gza' lhag pas gsal ba'i don du gza' gcig dman par @184a * //
analyzed: kha cig tu nyin zhag so so'i gza' lhag pas gsal ba'i don du gza' gcig dman par @184a * //
translated: In some cases, the individual days are clarified by the excess of the planets. For the sake of clarity, one planet is inferior.

original: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir gsal ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir gsal ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the collection of clear days is obtained.

original: da ni bkra shis gsungs te ri dus gcig gis bsres pa zhes pa ni byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha' la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: da ni bkra shis gsungs te ri dus gcig gis bsres pa zhes pa ni byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha' la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: Now, the auspicious one is said to be mixed with the mountain and the moment. This refers to the activity, not to the philosophy.

original: brgya drug cu rtsa bdun gyis bsres pa ni ri dus gcig gis bsres pa'o //
analyzed: brgya drug cu rtsa bdun gyis bsres pa ni ri dus gcig gis bsres pa'o //
translated: The mixing with one hundred and sixty-seven is the mixing with the mountain and the moment.

original: gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yis /
analyzed: gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yis /
translated: The collection of clear days is divided by the mountain and the moment.

original: nyin zhag gi tshogs de yang mig dmar gyi dkyil 'khor nyin zhag drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyis bgos pa'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag gi tshogs de yang mig dmar gyi dkyil 'khor nyin zhag drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyis bgos pa'o //
translated: That collection of days is divided by one hundred and sixty-seven circles of Mars.

original: 'di las mig dmar gyi yongs su bskor ba shes nas lhag ma skar mas bsgyur zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bsgyur ba las slar yang ri klu dus rnams kyis thob pa ni skar mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las mig dmar gyi yongs su bskor ba shes nas lhag ma skar mas bsgyur zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bsgyur ba las slar yang ri klu dus rnams kyis thob pa ni skar mar 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, having understood the complete revolution of Mars, the remainder is transformed by the stars, which is transformed by twenty-seven. Again, what is obtained by the mountain and the moment becomes the stars.

original: nam mkha' ro drug cu yis bsgyur ba las kyang ri la sogs pa rnams kyis thob pa ni chu tshod de mig dmar gyi longs spyod la thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' ro drug cu yis bsgyur ba las kyang ri la sogs pa rnams kyis thob pa ni chu tshod de mig dmar gyi longs spyod la thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: What is obtained by the mountain, etc., from the transformation of space by sixty is the hour. That is obtained in the enjoyment of Mars.

original: chu srang la sogs pa ni sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: chu srang la sogs pa ni sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so //
translated: The muh≈´rta, etc., are as previously explained.

original: 'dir gza' thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi gnas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir gza' thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi gnas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the five abodes of enjoyment of all the planets occur.

original: khyim gyi gnas dang / skar ma'i gnas dang / chu tshod kyi gnas dang / chu srang gi gnas dang / dbugs kyi gnas rnams 'og nas 'og tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim gyi gnas dang / skar ma'i gnas dang / chu tshod kyi gnas dang / chu srang gi gnas dang / dbugs kyi gnas rnams 'og nas 'og tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The abode of the zodiac, the abode of the lunar mansion, the abode of the muh≈´rta, the abode of the lagnas, and the abode of the breath.

original: dbugs kyi gnas su dbugs drug las lhag pa mi gnas te drug gi chas thob pa ni chu srang la gzhug go //
analyzed: dbugs kyi gnas su dbugs drug las lhag pa mi gnas te drug gi chas thob pa ni chu srang la gzhug go //
translated: In the abode of the breath, more than six breaths do not occur. The portion of six is placed in the lagnas.

original: chu srang ni drug cu las lhag par mi gnas te drug cu'i chas thob pa ni chu tshod kyi phung por gzhug go //
analyzed: chu srang ni drug cu las lhag par mi gnas te drug cu'i chas thob pa ni chu tshod kyi phung por gzhug go //
translated: The lagnas do not occur more than sixty. The portion of sixty is placed in the muh≈´rta.

original: chu tshod rnams kyang de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi phung por gzhug go //
analyzed: chu tshod rnams kyang de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi phung por gzhug go //
translated: The muh≈´rtas are placed in the lunar mansion.

original: skar ma ni las gnyis la phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum pas lhag par mi gnas shing khyim drug tu gnas so zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: skar ma ni las gnyis la phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum pas lhag par mi gnas shing khyim drug tu gnas so zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: The lunar mansions do not occur more than two and a half in one sign. They occur in six signs. This is the rule.

original: da ni mig dmar dag pa gsungs pa mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni mig dmar dag pa gsungs pa mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang zhes pa ste /
translated: For the ruddy planet, purify nine and a half.

original: 'dir mig dmar gyi skar ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod tha dad du byas te mig dmar gyi longs spyod gcig la skye ba'i rkang pa gzung ba'i don du skar ma dgu sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir mig dmar gyi skar ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod tha dad du byas te mig dmar gyi longs spyod gcig la skye ba'i rkang pa gzung ba'i don du skar ma dgu sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Here, having distinguished the enjoyments of the ruddy planet and so on, one should purify nine planets for the purpose of taking the foot of the ruddy planet's enjoyments.

original: phyed bcas zhes pa ni chu tshod sum cu chu tshod kyi gnas nas sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyed bcas zhes pa ni chu tshod sum cu chu tshod kyi gnas nas sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: The and a half is the thirty periods of thirty periods of time to be purified from the place of the periods of time.

original: tha skar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod la gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: tha skar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod la gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang zhes pa ni /
translated: If the debt of the enjoyments of the stars such as A≈õvinƒ´ and so on is in excess, then purify the mixed wheel.

original: 'dir @184b skar ma'i longs spyod tha skar la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar bu lon sbyang bar bya ste gal te bu lon gyi phung po lhag pa dang bcas shing longs spyod kyi phung po dman par gyur na /
analyzed: 'dir @184b skar ma'i longs spyod tha skar la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar bu lon sbyang bar bya ste gal te bu lon gyi phung po lhag pa dang bcas shing longs spyod kyi phung po dman par gyur na /
translated: Here, one should definitely purify the debt of the enjoyments of the stars such as A≈õvinƒ´ and so on. If the heap of debt is in excess and the heap of enjoyments is diminished,

original: de'i tshe 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang ngo //
translated: then at that time purify the mixed wheel.

original: 'khor lo ni skar ma nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi tshogs te de dag bsres la bu lon rnam par sbyang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni skar ma nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi tshogs te de dag bsres la bu lon rnam par sbyang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The wheel is a group of twenty-seven [lunar mansions]. The meaning is that one should subtract the debts from that sum.

original: 'khor lo phyed ni dor bar bya ste zhes pa ni 'dir gal te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma 'khor lo phyed du gyur na /
analyzed: 'khor lo phyed ni dor bar bya ste zhes pa ni 'dir gal te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma 'khor lo phyed du gyur na /
translated: One should discard half the wheel means that if the remainder after the subtraction is half a wheel,

original: de'i tshe dor bar bya ste phyed pas lhag par gyur na'ang 'dir lhag ma gang yin pa phyed pas lhag par gyur na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe dor bar bya ste phyed pas lhag par gyur na'ang 'dir lhag ma gang yin pa phyed pas lhag par gyur na'o //
translated: then at that time one should discard it. If it is more than half, then whatever is the remainder after subtracting half is more than half.

original: dor ba'i lhag ma de ni rim pa min par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba'i lhag ma de ni rim pa min par 'gyur ro //
translated: That remainder of the subtraction is not in order.

original: gza' thams cad kyi dal ba'i las la rim pa min pas nor du 'gyur te rim pas ni bu lon no //
analyzed: gza' thams cad kyi dal ba'i las la rim pa min pas nor du 'gyur te rim pas ni bu lon no //
translated: Since it is not in order for all the planets in the work on the parvan [omens], it is a debt; in order it is a subtraction.

original: skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi tshogs kyi don du rgyu skar gyi tshogs drug cus bsgyur bar gyur pa la 'og na gnas pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs steng du ldan par 'gyur ro
analyzed: skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi tshogs kyi don du rgyu skar gyi tshogs drug cus bsgyur bar gyur pa la 'og na gnas pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs steng du ldan par 'gyur ro
translated: The group of nak·π£atras is transformed into sixty, and is endowed with the group of hours. The group of nak·π£atras is transformed into sixty for the sake of the group of hours. The group of hours below is endowed with the group of nak·π£atras above.

original: // 'byung me zla bas bgo khyim gyi rkang pa'i don du chu tshod kyi phung po la brgya sum cu rtsa lngas bgo ste gang thob pa de khyim gyi rkang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: // 'byung me zla bas bgo khyim gyi rkang pa'i don du chu tshod kyi phung po la brgya sum cu rtsa lngas bgo ste gang thob pa de khyim gyi rkang par 'gyur ro //
translated: The group of hours is divided by the element-month. For the sake of the quarters of the zodiac, the group of hours is divided by 135. Whatever is obtained is a quarter of the zodiac.

original: dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so //
analyzed: dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so //
translated: In the case of slow actions, the gain and loss are in reverse and forward order.

original: grangs bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: grangs bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: They should be understood according to the number.

original: 'dir khyim rgyu ba'i rkang pa ni de nyid ces pa skye ba nas khyim dang po la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: 'dir khyim rgyu ba'i rkang pa ni de nyid ces pa skye ba nas khyim dang po la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: Here, the quarter of the zodiac movement is the same. From birth, the first house is 25.

original: gnyis pa la bcva brgyad do //
analyzed: gnyis pa la bcva brgyad do //
translated: The second is 18.

original: gsum pa la ri zhes pa bdun te /
analyzed: gsum pa la ri zhes pa bdun te /
translated: The third is 7, called ri.

original: khyim snga ma gsum la'o //
analyzed: khyim snga ma gsum la'o //
translated: This is for the first three houses.

original: de nas 'khor lo phyed kyi phyed gzhan la ni khyim bzhi pa la bdun no //
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo phyed kyi phyed gzhan la ni khyim bzhi pa la bdun no //
translated: Then, in the other half of the half-wheel, there are seven in the fourth house.

original: lnga pa la bcva brgyad do //
analyzed: lnga pa la bcva brgyad do //
translated: In the fifth, there are eighteen.

original: drug pa la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: drug pa la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: In the sixth, there are twenty-five.

original: rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste zhes pa'o //
translated: It is very clear. In the half-wheel, above and below.

original: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las zhes pa ni /
analyzed: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las zhes pa ni /
translated: From the enjoyment, the hours are transformed.

original: chu tshod kyi tshogs las brgya sum cu rtsa lnga'i chas thob pa ni khyim gyi longs spyod du 'gyur te /
analyzed: chu tshod kyi tshogs las brgya sum cu rtsa lnga'i chas thob pa ni khyim gyi longs spyod du 'gyur te /
translated: From the collection of hours, the one-hundredth part of thirty-five is the enjoyment of the houses.

original: de nyid rkang pa drug gi nang nas rkang pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rkang pa drug gi nang nas rkang pa'o //
translated: That is the foot from among the six feet.

original: de nas gnyis pa ni longs spyod pa'i phyir longs spyod de /
analyzed: de nas gnyis pa ni longs spyod pa'i phyir longs spyod de /
translated: Then, the second is the enjoyment for the sake of enjoyment.

original: longs spyod lhag ma des chu tshod lhag ma bsgyur ba las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa /
analyzed: longs spyod lhag ma des chu tshod lhag ma bsgyur ba las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa /
translated: From the remaining enjoyment, the remaining hours are transformed. From the quality of the moon, the part of the half-wheel is obtained.

original: longs spyod kyis chu tshod bsgyur ba'i phung po las brgya sum cu @185a * //
analyzed: longs spyod kyis chu tshod bsgyur ba'i phung po las brgya sum cu @185a * //
translated: From the collection of the hours transformed by the enjoyment, the one-hundredth part of thirty-five is the foot.

original: rtsa lnga'i chas thob pa ni snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de /
analyzed: rtsa lnga'i chas thob pa ni snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de /
translated: The acquisition of the five signs is asserted to be held in the first half.

analyzed: rkang pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ni gza' phyed phyi mar ma bgrod kyi bar du'o //
translated: By the power of the feet means until the second half of the planet is traversed.

original: de'i 'og tu de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur zhes pa ni longs spyod de nyid phyed phyi ma la dor byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur zhes pa ni longs spyod de nyid phyed phyi ma la dor byar 'gyur ro //

translated: Having made a single set of what is eaten means that the feet that are eaten by the planets by the power of the houses in the first half are made into a single set, and in the second half, having discarded what is eaten in the first and second halves, what is not eaten is made into a single set.

original: gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o zhes pa la gza' rnams kyi bgrod pa ni rim pa min pa dang rim pa ste /
analyzed: gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o zhes pa la gza' rnams kyi bgrod pa ni rim pa min pa dang rim pa ste /
translated: By the power of the movement of the planets, the giving and discarding are also in the hours. The movement of the planets is irregular and regular.

original: de'i dbang gis sbyin pa dang dor ba ni /
analyzed: de'i dbang gis sbyin pa dang dor ba ni /
translated: By the power of that, the giving and discarding are

original: rim pa min pa'i dbang gis sbyin pa dang rim pa'i dbang gis dor ba'o //
analyzed: rim pa min pa'i dbang gis sbyin pa dang rim pa'i dbang gis dor ba'o //
translated: By the power of non-order, one should give; by the power of order, one should discard.

original: chu tshod la'o zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi phung po dang gza'i longs spyod skar ma'i phung po la'o zhes bya ba ni bkra shis la sogs pa rnams kyi dal ba'i las thams cad la nges pa ste khyim gyi las kyi cho ga skye ba'i rgyu ba dag
analyzed: chu tshod la'o zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi phung po dang gza'i longs spyod skar ma'i phung po la'o zhes bya ba ni bkra shis la sogs pa rnams kyi dal ba'i las thams cad la nges pa ste khyim gyi las kyi cho ga skye ba'i rgyu ba dag
translated: In the hour means in the group of hours and in the enjoyment of the planet, in the group of stars. This is the rule for all the slow actions of the auspicious and so forth. The rite of the house-work is the cause of the birth movement.üîΩ Now, the rite of the quick action is stated:

analyzed: pa'o // da ni myur ba'i las kyi cho ga gsungs pa de nas nyi mas skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Then, having purified the Sun, the Sun-born Guru also for the quick action.

original: de nas ni de ma thag nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nas ni de ma thag nyid la'o //

analyzed: slar yang khyim gyi las kyis rnam par dag pa'i gza'i longs spyod kyis nyi ma'i longs spyod la sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Again, by the purification of the house-work, the enjoyment of the planet should be purified in the enjoyment of the Sun.

original: nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste zhes pa ni dal ba'i longs spyod nyi rkang dang bral ba las te gza'i longs spyod tha dad du byas nas so //
analyzed: nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste zhes pa ni dal ba'i longs spyod nyi rkang dang bral ba las te gza'i longs spyod tha dad du byas nas so //
translated: The sun purifies the sa·πÉsk·πõta means that the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the sun is purified from the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the moon, that is, the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the sun is made distinct from the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the moon.

analyzed: de nas zhes pa ste bla ma yang sbyang bar bya zhing nyi skyes spen pa yang sbyang bar bya ste kyang gi sgras mig dmar ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
translated: Then, the guru should be purified and the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the sun should be purified, and also the sa·πÉsk·πõta of Mars should be purified, as is the case with Mars.

analyzed: gang la zhe na myur ba'i las la'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du zla skyes te zla skyes kyi longs spyod la gza' lag gi longs spyod kyi don du nyi mas sbyang bar bya'o //

analyzed: dkar po la yang ste dkar po'i longs spyod pa yang dkar po'i longs spyod kyi don du nyi mas sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Also for the white, that is, the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the white should be purified by the sun for the sake of the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the white.

original: 'dir gza' mthon pos gza' dma' mo la rnam par sbyang ngo zhes pa ni nges pa ste  nges na zla skyes dang dkar po la yang nyi mas sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gza' mthon pos gza' dma' mo la rnam par sbyang ngo zhes pa ni nges pa ste  nges na zla skyes dang dkar po la yang nyi mas sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the higher planet purifies the lower planet is certain, and if certain, the sa·πÉsk·πõta of the moon and the white should be purified by the sun.

analyzed: myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur zhes pa ni 'dir myur ba'i las te myur ba'i bya ba la rim @185b pas nor du 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of a swift action, it will certainly be erroneous by degrees‚Äù means that in the case of a swift action, that is, a swift operation, it will be erroneous by degrees.

original: nges par zhes pa gdon mi za bar ro //
analyzed: nges par zhes pa gdon mi za bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúCertainly‚Äù means without doubt.

original: rim pa min pas bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pa min pas bu lon du 'gyur ro //

original: gza' mthon po'i longs spyod dag pa'i lhag ma las 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni 'dir rkang pa'o //
analyzed: gza' mthon po'i longs spyod dag pa'i lhag ma las 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni 'dir rkang pa'o //
translated: The remainder of the pure enjoyment of the superior planets is the half-revolution, and the remainder of the purification is the foot.

original: de nyid gza' rgyu ba'i rkang pa ste chu tshod du ma'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de nyid gza' rgyu ba'i rkang pa ste chu tshod du ma'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: That itself is the foot of the planetary motion, which is the master of many hours.

original: gza' rgyu rkang pa'i chu tshod de dag rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
analyzed: gza' rgyu rkang pa'i chu tshod de dag rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //

analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du phyed snga ma la gzung bar bya ba dang phyed phyi ma la dbrog par bya ba'o // zos pa dag ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste zhes pa ni 'dir myur ba'i las la rim pas sbyin pa dang rim pa min pas dor ba ste phyed snga ma la zos pa'i tshogs dang phyed phyi
translated: The obtained by the sixty-part [method] is to be grasped and subtracted from the foot of the moving planet. Just as before, in the first half it is to be grasped, and in the second half it is to be subtracted.

original: ma la ma zos pa'i tshogs ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ma la ma zos pa'i tshogs ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Having made one group of the eaten, by the power of the motion of the planet, the entire addition and subtraction, here, by the method of the fast [method], it is added in order and subtracted out of order. The group of eaten in the first half and the group of not eaten in the second half is as before.

analyzed: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te zhes pa la rgyal ba ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: For the earth-born, the foot is the victor, etc. The victor is twenty-four.

analyzed: de dag kyang dang po la gnas pa ste ma nu'i gnas gnas bcu bzhi la gnas pa'i rkang pa bcu bzhi po gang dag gi gnas dang po la'o //

translated: The line ‚Äúthe feet of the victors and so on‚Äù refers to the feet of the victors and so on. The fourteen abodes of the nak·π£atras are to be placed in the directions beginning with the east.

original: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi bar rig par bya'o mi'i dbang zhes so //
analyzed: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi bar rig par bya'o mi'i dbang zhes so //
translated: Thus the order of all the planets should be understood.

original: zla skyes te zla skyes kyi longs spyod dang dkar po las nyi mas rnam par dag pa ni zla ba'i bu gza' lag tu 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: zla skyes te zla skyes kyi longs spyod dang dkar po las nyi mas rnam par dag pa ni zla ba'i bu gza' lag tu 'gyur zhing /
translated: The son of the moon, that is, the enjoyment of the moon, is purified by the sun, and becomes the moon‚Äôs son, the planet Mars.

translated: From seven, hole, mountain, and nƒÅga are eight thousand, seven hundred, and ninety-seven. One‚Äôs own ma·πá·∏çala days are divided by hole, mountain, and nƒÅga.

analyzed: de bzhin du chu srang dang dbugs ni thob pa'o //

translated: Abandoning the moon-born [sign], from the middle of the sun, the good lord of men, the lord of the stars, even half, is completely abandoned. This is the enjoyment of the moon-born [sign] obtained by the mandala of the mountain and so forth, which is abandoned for the sake of pure activity in swift [motion].

translated: Then, from the middle of the sun, O good lord of men, the lord of the sixteen and half stars, from the enjoyment of the sun's thirty ghatis.

original: rkang pa dag pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: rkang pa dag pa'i don du'o //
