analyzed: bu lon lhag na 'khor lo byin nas sbyang bar bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i nges pa ste skye ba'i skar ma rgyu ba'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of the movement of the birth star is the previous rule.üîΩHere, the slow action has twenty-two feet, days, and times.

original: 'di'i dal ba'i las la rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis tshes dus zhes pa ni khyim gyi gnas drug @187b la rkang pa rnams te khyim dang po la nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'di'i dal ba'i las la rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis tshes dus zhes pa ni khyim gyi gnas drug @187b la rkang pa rnams te khyim dang po la nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The feet are in the six houses. In the first house, there are twenty-two.

original: de nas tshes zhes pa bco lnga'o //
analyzed: de nas tshes zhes pa bco lnga'o //
translated: Then, the days are fifteen.

original: de nas dus zhes pa drug go //
analyzed: de nas dus zhes pa drug go //
translated: Then, the times are six.

original: de bzhin du phyed phyi ma la yang shes par bya ste rab gsal ro'i gnas la'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyed phyi ma la yang shes par bya ste rab gsal ro'i gnas la'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Similarly, one should understand the latter half in the same way.

original: myur ba'i las la ro la sogs zhes pa ni myur ba ste rgyu skar gyi las la gnas bcu bzhir ro la sogs pa ni drug la sogs pa'i rkang pa rnams sbyin pa dang dor ba'o //
analyzed: myur ba'i las la ro la sogs zhes pa ni myur ba ste rgyu skar gyi las la gnas bcu bzhir ro la sogs pa ni drug la sogs pa'i rkang pa rnams sbyin pa dang dor ba'o //
translated: The line swiftly, in the houses of the tastes, etc. means that in the swift action, in the fourteen houses of the nak·π£atras, the six tastes, etc., are given and taken away.

original: de dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba la brjod par bya ste /
translated: They will be explained below.

original: gza'i rkang pa'i tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du spen pa dag pa'o //
analyzed: gza'i rkang pa'i tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du spen pa dag pa'o //
translated: In the houses of the planets, all the ways of the feet are of ≈öukra.

original: da ni rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste zhes pa ni myur ba'i las la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las shar ba'i gza'i rkang pa bcu bzhi'i chu tshod phyed snga ma longs spyod pa ni myur
analyzed: da ni rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa myur dal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste zhes pa ni myur ba'i las la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las shar ba'i gza'i rkang pa bcu bzhi'i chu tshod phyed snga ma longs spyod pa ni myur
translated: Now, the characteristics of the moving [planets] are stated: The swift and slow movements are in the order of the feet. The swift action is the enjoyment of the first half of the fourteen gha·π≠ikƒÅs of the planet's feet that have arisen from the orb of the sun.

original: bar rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bar rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
translated: This is called the swift movement.

original: rim pas rkang pa bgrod par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pas rkang pa bgrod par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it moves in the order of the feet.

original: rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste ;
analyzed: rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste ;
translated: Gradually, the planets move through the houses.

original: phyed phyi ma la gang zhig longs spyod pa de ni dal bar rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la gang zhig longs spyod pa de ni dal bar rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
translated: In the second half, the one who enjoys is said to move slowly.

original: 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis zhes pa ni de nas 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor ba la gza'i rim pa min par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis zhes pa ni de nas 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor ba la gza'i rim pa min par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚Äú Crookedness is by irregularity‚Äù means that after that, the order of the planets is irregular in the second half of the wheel.

original: rim pa min pa de yang 'khyog por rgyu ba zhes brjod de phyed snga ma la'o //
analyzed: rim pa min pa de yang 'khyog por rgyu ba zhes brjod de phyed snga ma la'o //
translated: That irregularity is said to be ‚Äúcrooked movement‚Äù in the first half.

original: phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyis ni 'byung ba yang zhes pa 'byung bar rgyu ba zhes brjod de 'khyog po yongs su btang ba las so //
analyzed: phyed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyis ni 'byung ba yang zhes pa 'byung bar rgyu ba zhes brjod de 'khyog po yongs su btang ba las so //
translated: In the second half, the planets move by the power of the sun‚Äôs movement, and they are said to ‚Äúmove by emergence,‚Äù because they abandon crookedness.

original: 'dir shar nas rim par bgrod pa la phyed snga ma'i bar du nor 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'dir shar nas rim par bgrod pa la phyed snga ma'i bar du nor 'phel lo //
translated: Here, in the first half, wealth increases in the houses in order from Aries.

original: de nas phyed phyi ma la 'khor lo phyed kyi bar du nor 'grib po //
analyzed: de nas phyed phyi ma la 'khor lo phyed kyi bar du nor 'grib po //
translated: Then, in the second half, up to the second half of the wheel, wealth decreases.

original: de nas 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor nas rim pa min pas phyed snga ma la bu lon 'phel lo //
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo phyed yongs su dor nas rim pa min pas phyed snga ma la bu lon 'phel lo //
translated: Then, after abandoning the second half of the wheel, in the first half, by irregularity, debt increases.

original: phyed phyi ma la nyi ma'i rgyu skar la rab tu zhugs kyi bar du bu lon 'grib  go //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la nyi ma'i rgyu skar la rab tu zhugs kyi bar du bu lon 'grib  go //
translated: In the second half, it sets in the western lunar mansion and the debt decreases.

original: de nas nub ste slar yang 'char ba ni rim pa de nyid kyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nub ste slar yang 'char ba ni rim pa de nyid kyis rig par bya'o //
translated: Then it sets and rises again in the same order.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur zhes pa 'dir mjug rings mdor bstan pa'i rkang pa 'di ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las rgya cher brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur zhes pa 'dir mjug rings mdor bstan pa'i rkang pa 'di ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las rgya cher brjod par bya'o //
translated: The last line of the verse on the description of the comet, ‚ÄúThe comets move quickly and crookedly by the thirty-seven lunar mansions,‚Äù will be explained in detail in the commentary.

original: gza'i skabs so //
analyzed: gza'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the chapter on the planets.

original: da ni gza' rnams kyi 'char ba dang nub pa'i dus gsungs pa @188a * //
analyzed: da ni gza' rnams kyi 'char ba dang nub pa'i dus gsungs pa @188a * //
translated: Now the time of the rising and setting of the planets is stated:

original: gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThose planets that enter the sun‚Äôs enjoyment will certainly set.‚Äù

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis mi mthong ba'i phyir nub par gyur pa zhes brjod kyi gza' rnam pa thams cad du med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis mi mthong ba'i phyir nub par gyur pa zhes brjod kyi gza' rnam pa thams cad du med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because they are not seen due to the light rays of the sun‚Äôs orb, they are said to set, but the planets do not cease to exist altogether.

original: nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni nub par gyur pa'i gza' de nyid kyis rang gi rgyu ba'i dbang gis nyi ma btang bar gyur pa na 'char bar 'gyur te nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni nub par gyur pa'i gza' de nyid kyis rang gi rgyu ba'i dbang gis nyi ma btang bar gyur pa na 'char bar 'gyur te nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The sun is released and it rises means that the planet that has set rises when it is released by the sun by the power of its own motion, because it is released by the sun's rays.

original: de'i lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so zhes pa ni 'char ba'i gza' de'i lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //
analyzed: de'i lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so zhes pa ni 'char ba'i gza' de'i lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //
translated: And its path is divided by the divisions of its motion means that the path of the rising planet is divided by the divisions of its motion.

original: bgrod pa dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni bgrod pa'i rnam par dbye ba ste me'i dkyil 'khor nas kee l'a sha'i byang du gangs can gyi bar dang / gangs can nas lhor me'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba ste des nyi ma'i bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni bgrod pa'i rnam par dbye ba ste me'i dkyil 'khor nas kee l'a sha'i byang du gangs can gyi bar dang / gangs can nas lhor me'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba ste des nyi ma'i bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The division of its motion is the division of its path, from the circle of fire to the north of Kailash in two hundred and fifty-two days and from Kailash to the south of the circle of fire in two hundred and fifty-two days. By that, the path of the sun is divided.

original: nyi ma 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye ba nges 'char ba'i gza' de dag gi lam du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye ba nges 'char ba'i gza' de dag gi lam du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They also become the paths of the planets that rise in the form of the sun's motion.

original: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste zhes pa ni 'dir g-yon gyi lam la gnas pa ni zhi ba'i gza' zla skyes la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste zhes pa ni 'dir g-yon gyi lam la gnas pa ni zhi ba'i gza' zla skyes la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: Those that abide in the left path go to the left by the power of the sun's motion.  Here, those that abide in the left path are the peaceful planets, the moon and so on.

original: gza' lag dang pa sangs dang mjug rings rnams ni g-yon gyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gza' lag dang pa sangs dang mjug rings rnams ni g-yon gyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because Mercury, Jupiter and Venus arise in the left limbs.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub pa'i dus su yang g-yon gyi yan lag nas rab tu 'jug cing 'char ba yang g-yon gyi yan lag nas so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub pa'i dus su yang g-yon gyi yan lag nas rab tu 'jug cing 'char ba yang g-yon gyi yan lag nas so //
translated: At the time of setting on the sun's orb, they enter from the left limb and they also rise from the left limb.

original: de'i phyir g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa'i gza' gang yin pa de ni drag po'i gza' rnams kyi g-yon nas 'gro ste nyi ma'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa'i gza' gang yin pa de ni drag po'i gza' rnams kyi g-yon nas 'gro ste nyi ma'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, those planets that abide in the left path go to the left of the fierce planets, like the sun.

original: g-yas la gnas pa dag ni g-yas kyis zhes pa la 'dir g-yas la gnas pa ni gang zhig g-yas kyi lam nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub par 'gyur ba ste bkra shis dang phur bu dang spen pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas la gnas pa dag ni g-yas kyis zhes pa la 'dir g-yas la gnas pa ni gang zhig g-yas kyi lam nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub par 'gyur ba ste bkra shis dang phur bu dang spen pa'o //
translated: Those that are on the right are on the right. Here, those on the right are those that set in the direction of the right, that is, the sun, Jupiter, and Saturn.

original: drag po ni zhi ba'i gza' rnams kyi g-yas nas 'gro ste g-yas kyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag po ni zhi ba'i gza' rnams kyi g-yas nas 'gro ste g-yas kyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Mars is a benefic planet because it moves to the right of the benefic planets and arises in the right part of the body.

original: 'dir mjug rings ni g-yon gyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir lus kyi dbye bas zhi ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir mjug rings ni g-yon gyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir lus kyi dbye bas zhi ba'o //
translated: Here, Ketu is a benefic planet because it arises in the left part of the body.

original: @188b phur bu ni g-yas kyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir lus kyi dbye bas drag po'o //
analyzed: @188b phur bu ni g-yas kyi yan lag tu yang dag par byung ba'i phyir lus kyi dbye bas drag po'o //
translated: Jupiter is a malefic planet because it arises in the right part of the body.

original: de bzhin du slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir zhes pa ni zhi ba dang drag po gza' lag dang bkra shis dag dang / phur bu dang pa sangs dag dang / spen pa dang mjug rings 'di dag phan tshun 'thab par 'gyur te dgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir zhes pa ni zhi ba dang drag po gza' lag dang bkra shis dag dang / phur bu dang pa sangs dag dang / spen pa dang mjug rings 'di dag phan tshun 'thab par 'gyur te dgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, again, it is clear here that they are mutually hostile, because they are enemies. This is because Mars and Jupiter, Mercury and Venus, Saturn and RƒÅhu are mutually hostile.

original: rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te de la dgra dag gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o zhes pa ni mig dmar gyi rang gi zhing lug gi khyim dang sdig pa'i khyim ste zhing de la mig dmar yang dag par gnas pa de'i tshe gal te
analyzed: rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te de la dgra dag gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o zhes pa ni mig dmar gyi rang gi zhing lug gi khyim dang sdig pa'i khyim ste zhing de la mig dmar yang dag par gnas pa de'i tshe gal te
translated: If those who abide in their own houses are enemies, they will certainly fight. This is because, for example, when Mars is in its own house, the house of Aries or the house of Scorpio, and Mars is in that house,

original: zhing de la gza' lag longs spyod par gyur na de'i tshe nges par 'thab bo //
analyzed: zhing de la gza' lag longs spyod par gyur na de'i tshe nges par 'thab bo //
translated: if Jupiter is in that house, then they will certainly fight.

original: de bzhin du gza' lag gi zhing 'khrig pa dang bu mor gal te mig dmar rgyu ba'i dbang gis longs spyod par gyur pa de ltar na yang 'thab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' lag gi zhing 'khrig pa dang bu mor gal te mig dmar rgyu ba'i dbang gis longs spyod par gyur pa de ltar na yang 'thab bo //
translated: Similarly, if Mars is in the house of Venus and Mercury, and if there is an aspect of Mars to Venus, there will be a quarrel.üîΩSimilarly, if Saturn is in the house of the Scorpion and the Fish, and if there is an aspect of Jupiter to Saturn, then Saturn and Jupiter quarrel.

original: de bzhin du phur bu'i zhing gzhu dang nya la gal te pa sangs gyur na de'i tshe phur bu dang pa sangs 'thab bo //üîΩde bzhin du pa  ba sangs kyi zhing glang dang srang la yang ngo //üîΩde bzhin du spen pa'i zhing chu srin dang bum pa la gal te mjug rings gyur na de'i tshe 'thab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du phur bu'i zhing gzhu dang nya la gal te pa sangs gyur na de'i tshe phur bu dang pa sangs 'thab bo // de bzhin du pa  ba sangs kyi zhing glang dang srang la yang ngo // de bzhin du spen pa'i zhing chu srin dang bum pa la gal te mjug rings gyur na de'i tshe 'thab bo //
translated: Similarly, if Jupiter is in the house of the Bull and the Scales, and if there is an aspect of Saturn to Jupiter, then Jupiter and Saturn quarrel.üîΩSimilarly, if Rahu is in the house of the Crocodile and the Pot, and if there is an aspect of Ketu to Rahu, then Rahu and Ketu quarrel.

original: de bzhin du ri bong can gyi zhing ka rka ta la gal te spen pa gyur na de'i tshe mjug rings dang lhan cig rtsod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ri bong can gyi zhing ka rka ta la gal te spen pa gyur na de'i tshe mjug rings dang lhan cig rtsod do //
translated: Similarly, if Ketu is in the house of the Crab, and if there is an aspect of Saturn to Ketu, then Ketu quarrels with Saturn.

original: mjug rings g-yon gyi yan lag tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mjug rings g-yon gyi yan lag tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because Ketu is born as the left limb of Saturn.

original: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par zhes pa ni 'dir slar yang gza' rnams kyi skye ba'i skar ma la ltos nas skar ma la'o //
analyzed: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par zhes pa ni 'dir slar yang gza' rnams kyi skye ba'i skar ma la ltos nas skar ma la'o //
translated: Not the stars, but the other planets.

original: rang gi zhing gi khyim 'ba' zhig la 'thab pa ma yin te skye ba'i skar ma la yang dgra dag 'thab par 'gyur te pa sangs skar ma na bso la'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhing gi khyim 'ba' zhig la 'thab pa ma yin te skye ba'i skar ma la yang dgra dag 'thab par 'gyur te pa sangs skar ma na bso la'o //
translated: The planets do not fight only in their own houses, but also in the houses of the stars, according to the stars of birth.

original: bkra shis skar ma mchu la'o //
analyzed: bkra shis skar ma mchu la'o //
translated: Rahu fights in the star of the Pleiades.

original: phur bu skar ma me bzhi la'o //üîΩgza' lag skar ma lha mtshams la'o //
analyzed: phur bu skar ma me bzhi la'o // gza' lag skar ma lha mtshams la'o //
translated: Ketu fights in the star of the four-footed.üîΩMars fights in the star of the twins.

original: spen pa skar ma snubs la'o //
analyzed: spen pa skar ma snubs la'o //
translated: Saturn fights in the star of the scorpion.

original: mjug rings skar ma chu smad la'o //
analyzed: mjug rings skar ma chu smad la'o //
translated: Rahu fights in the star of the latter part of the water-bearer.

original: zla skyes dang bkra shis dag rang rang gis skar ma la 'thab ste /
analyzed: zla skyes dang bkra shis dag rang rang gis skar ma la 'thab ste /
translated: Rahu and Ketu fight in their own stars.

original: de bzhin du pa sangs dang phur bu dag dang / spen pa dang mjug rings dag go //
analyzed: de bzhin du pa sangs dang phur bu dag dang / spen pa dang mjug rings dag go //
translated: Likewise, Mars and Saturn, and Rahu and Ketu.

original: rang rang gi skar ma ma gtogs par skar ma'am zhing gzhan la 'thab pa min par 'gyur bar nges pa ni gdon mi za ba'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi skar ma ma gtogs par skar ma'am zhing gzhan la 'thab pa min par 'gyur bar nges pa ni gdon mi za ba'o //
translated: It is certain that they do not fight in other stars or houses, except in their own.

original: skar ma gzhan la phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan par 'gyur ro //üîΩ@189a * // de bzhin du zla ba'i rva mtho ba yang gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba zhugs par gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis yin par gyur na de'i tshe byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang
analyzed: skar ma gzhan la phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan par 'gyur ro // @189a * // de bzhin du zla ba'i rva mtho ba yang gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba zhugs par gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis yin par gyur na de'i tshe byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang
translated: The other stars are mutually similar.üîΩSimilarly, the waxing of the moon: if the moon enters the left of the sun and the rising is also on the left, then the northern horn is waxing.

original: gis lho ru ste lhor bgrod pa la'o //
analyzed: gis lho ru ste lhor bgrod pa la'o //
translated: In some cases, due to the influence of the path, it is in the south, in the southern course.

original: mu ge dang char mi 'bab pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mu ge dang char mi 'bab pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the cause of famine, drought, etc., but not by its own nature.

original: da ni sgra gcan rab tu 'jug pa gsungs te tshigs mtshams su ni nya'i mtshams su ste yang yig gis gnam stong gi mtshams su yang ngo //
analyzed: da ni sgra gcan rab tu 'jug pa gsungs te tshigs mtshams su ni nya'i mtshams su ste yang yig gis gnam stong gi mtshams su yang ngo //
translated: Now it is said that RƒÅhu enters: at the juncture, at the juncture of the lunar mansion, and also at the end of the month, indicated by the word also.

original: sgra gcan gdong dang zla ba mnyam par 'gro ste mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho nar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: sgra gcan gdong dang zla ba mnyam par 'gro ste mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho nar 'gyur ro ;
translated: RƒÅhu moves in conjunction with the moon, only taking it as facing itself.

original: /'dir mngon du phyogs pa ni shar du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: /'dir mngon du phyogs pa ni shar du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Here, facing means taking it as in the east.

original: de nyid sgra gcan 'khor ba'i dbang gis shes par bya ste byed pa gzhan thams cad la rab tu grags pa'i phyir 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis 'bad pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de nyid sgra gcan 'khor ba'i dbang gis shes par bya ste byed pa gzhan thams cad la rab tu grags pa'i phyir 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis 'bad pa ma mdzad do //
translated: That should be known by the power of RƒÅhu‚Äôs revolution, because all other activities are well known. Here, the BhagavƒÅn Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ did not make an effort.

original: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste zhes pa ni g-yon du sgra gcan 'khor ba la g-yas min g-yon du zla ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste zhes pa ni g-yon du sgra gcan 'khor ba la g-yas min g-yon du zla ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the left, not in the right,‚Äù means that in the left, in RƒÅhu‚Äôs revolution, there will be a lunar eclipse in the left, not in the right.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g-yas la g-yas pa'i char zhes pa ni nyi ma'i longs spyod las byung ba zla ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis te nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes so //

original: dper na so ba 'chag pa la ba lang ka ba las ring du 'khor ba gang yin pa de ni 'gyogs par 'gro zhing gom pa mang po dag gis skor bar byed la ;
analyzed: dper na so ba 'chag pa la ba lang ka ba las ring du 'khor ba gang yin pa de ni 'gyogs par 'gro zhing gom pa mang po dag gis skor bar byed la ;
translated: For example, when a cow is walking, it circles a pillar more slowly and with fewer steps if it is far from the pillar, but it circles more quickly and with more steps if it is near the pillar.

original: ka ba la nye bar 'khor ba gang yin pa de ni dal bar 'gro zhing gom ba nyung ngus skor bar byed de de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rig par bya'o zhes grag go //
analyzed: ka ba la nye bar 'khor ba gang yin pa de ni dal bar 'gro zhing gom ba nyung ngus skor bar byed de de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rig par bya'o zhes grag go //
translated: The planets should be understood in the same way.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa dang po rigs pas rnam par dpyad de 'dir rang rang gi grub pa'i mtha'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rtsis kyi tha snyad med cing 'dod pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa dang po rigs pas rnam par dpyad de 'dir rang rang gi grub pa'i mtha'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rtsis kyi tha snyad med cing 'dod pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The first assertion of the world is not investigated here by reasoning, because there is no conventional calculation according to one‚Äôs own philosophical tenets, and there is no single assertion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par dpyad par bya ste /üîΩ'dir 'go la la nyi ma las myur ba dang dal bar 'gro ba'i gza' gang yin pa de dag ci steng nas steng dang 'og nas 'og tu gnas sam /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par dpyad par bya ste / 'dir 'go la la nyi ma las myur ba dang dal bar 'gro ba'i gza' gang yin pa de dag ci steng nas steng dang 'og nas 'og tu gnas sam /
translated: Therefore, it should be investigated.üîΩHere, some say: The planets that move faster or slower than the sun, do they move above or below the sun?

original: 'on te g-yon gyi cha dang g-yas kyi char gnas /
analyzed: 'on te g-yon gyi cha dang g-yas kyi char gnas /
translated: Or do they move to the left or right of the sun?

original: rnam pa gnyis ka yang 'gal te /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ka yang 'gal te /
translated: Both alternatives are contradictory.

original: gal te nyi ma las 'og dang steng du rnam par gnas na de'i tshe myur ba dang dal ba dag tu phrad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te nyi ma las 'og dang steng du rnam par gnas na de'i tshe myur ba dang dal ba dag tu phrad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the sun is situated below and above, then it would not meet with the swift and slow planets,

original: rang gi gnas yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi gnas yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not abandon its own place.

original: ci ste pha rol gyi grub pa'i mtha' smra ba pos smras pa /
analyzed: ci ste pha rol gyi grub pa'i mtha' smra ba pos smras pa /
translated: If the proponent of the opponent‚Äôs theory says,

original: 'og na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis 'og dang steng gi gza' phrad cing mnyam par mthong ste 'og gi gzas steng gi gza' bsgribs pa ni mnyam pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'og na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis 'og dang steng gi gza' phrad cing mnyam par mthong ste 'og gi gzas steng gi gza' bsgribs pa ni mnyam pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúSentient beings in the lower regions see the planets as situated below and above, and they see them as equal, because the lower planet covers the upper planet,‚Äù

original: 'di la brjod pa 'dir mnyam pa nyid ni nyi ma'i gung gi dus la ste 'char ba dang nub pa'i dus la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa 'dir mnyam pa nyid ni nyi ma'i gung gi dus la ste 'char ba dang nub pa'i dus la ma yin no //
translated: we reply, here equality is at noon, not at sunrise or sunset.

original: 'char ba'i dus su gnas tha dad pa'i mthu las sems can rnams kyis 'og dang steng du gza' rnams blta bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'char ba'i dus su gnas tha dad pa'i mthu las sems can rnams kyis 'og dang steng du gza' rnams blta bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At sunrise, due to the power of the different locations, sentient beings would see the planets as situated below and above.

original: de bzhin du nub pa'i dus su yang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nub pa'i dus su yang ste /
translated: And likewise at sunset.

original: de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de bzhin du g-yas dang g-yon la gnas pa rnams kyang nyi ma dang lhan cig phrad pa med de rang gi gnas yongs su mi gtong @190a * //üîΩba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas dang g-yon la gnas pa rnams kyang nyi ma dang lhan cig phrad pa med de rang gi gnas yongs su mi gtong @190a * // ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, the planets to the right and left of the sun do not come into contact with the sun, because they do not abandon their own positions.

original: de ltar na gza' rnams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub pa dang 'char ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gza' rnams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nub pa dang 'char ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the planets do not set or rise in relation to the sun‚Äôs disk.

original: de'i phyir don dam par gza' rnams kyi gnas gzhan pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir don dam par gza' rnams kyi gnas gzhan pa med do //
translated: Therefore, ultimately, the planets do not have other abodes.

original: byis pa rnams kun tu rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshig rigs pa dang bral ba 'di dag kyang skye bo mi shes pa rnams kyis bkod pa ste /üîΩ'dir gnas dang po la zla ba dang / gnyis pa la gza' lag dang / gsum pa la pa sangs dang / bzhi pa la nyi ma dang / lnga pa la sa skyes dang / drug pa la phur bu dang / bdun pa la sgra gcan dang /
analyzed: byis pa rnams kun tu rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshig rigs pa dang bral ba 'di dag kyang skye bo mi shes pa rnams kyis bkod pa ste / 'dir gnas dang po la zla ba dang / gnyis pa la gza' lag dang / gsum pa la pa sangs dang / bzhi pa la nyi ma dang / lnga pa la sa skyes dang / drug pa la phur bu dang / bdun pa la sgra gcan dang /
translated: These statements, which are devoid of reason and generate confusion among the childish, are the fabrications of the ignorant.üîΩHere, the moon is in the first abode, Mars in the second, Mercury in the third, Jupiter in the fourth, Venus in the fifth, Saturn in the sixth, RƒÅhu in the seventh, and Ketu in the eighth.

original: brgyad pa la spen pa gnas so zhes bya ba ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la spen pa gnas so zhes bya ba ni srid pa'o //
translated: This is possible.

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la gza' thams cad byang du 'gro ba dang lhor 'gro ba yod de dper na nyi ma'i rgyu skar longs spyod pa'i dbang dang khyim drug longs spyod pa'i dbang gis bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la gza' thams cad byang du 'gro ba dang lhor 'gro ba yod de dper na nyi ma'i rgyu skar longs spyod pa'i dbang dang khyim drug longs spyod pa'i dbang gis bzhin no //
translated: Here, in the zodiac, all the planets have both northern and southern courses, like the sun, by the power of its enjoyment of the zodiacal sign and by the power of its enjoyment of the six houses.

original: byang du 'gro ba dang lhor 'gro ba'i nyi ma de dang phrad pa na gza' 'ga' zhig nyi ma'i steng du 'gro ba dang 'ga' zhig 'og tu 'gro ba yang med do //
analyzed: byang du 'gro ba dang lhor 'gro ba'i nyi ma de dang phrad pa na gza' 'ga' zhig nyi ma'i steng du 'gro ba dang 'ga' zhig 'og tu 'gro ba yang med do //
translated: When the sun has a northern or southern course, there is no planet that moves above or below the sun.

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la dal bar 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' 'ga' zhig nyi ma'i rgyab nas 'ong ngo //
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la dal bar 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' 'ga' zhig nyi ma'i rgyab nas 'ong ngo //
translated: Here, in the zodiac, by the power of slow motion, some planets come behind the sun.

original: shar bar gyur pa na zla ba ni mdun nas 'gro ste myur bar bgrod pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: shar bar gyur pa na zla ba ni mdun nas 'gro ste myur bar bgrod pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: When it rises, the moon moves in front, by the power of its swift motion.

original: gza' lag dang pa sangs ni rkang pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' mdun dang res 'ga' rgyab tu shar nas bgrod do //
analyzed: gza' lag dang pa sangs ni rkang pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' mdun dang res 'ga' rgyab tu shar nas bgrod do //
translated: Mars and Jupiter, by the power of their feet, sometimes move in front and sometimes behind.

original: 'di dag gi bgrod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du khyim gyi 'go la gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di dag gi bgrod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du khyim gyi 'go la gsungs te /
translated: In order to understand the complete path of these, the signs of the houses are taught at the beginning of the house.

original: rgyu skar g-yas su gnas bcu bzhi dang g-yas min du gnas bcu bzhi dag la khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag /
analyzed: rgyu skar g-yas su gnas bcu bzhi dang g-yas min du gnas bcu bzhi dag la khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag /
translated: The signs of the houses are the fourteen nak·π£atras that are located to the right and the fourteen that are located to the left.

original: gnas zhes pa ni khyim rnams kyi dbye ba rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gnyis te /üîΩkhyim so so'i khyim gyi dbye ba de dag gis byang du 'go la'i ri mo'i dbus su tha skar la sogs pa nag pa phyed kyi bar phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: gnas zhes pa ni khyim rnams kyi dbye ba rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gnyis te / khyim so so'i khyim gyi dbye ba de dag gis byang du 'go la'i ri mo'i dbus su tha skar la sogs pa nag pa phyed kyi bar phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum mo //
translated: The location is the two nak·π£atras with their feet, divided into the houses.üîΩIn the north, in the center of the sign of Aries, there are thirteen and a half nak·π£atras, beginning with A≈õvinƒ´ and ending with half of MaghƒÅ.

original: lho ru yang 'go la'i ri mo'i dbus su nag pa phyed la sogs pa nam gru'i mthar phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: lho ru yang 'go la'i ri mo'i dbus su nag pa phyed la sogs pa nam gru'i mthar phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum mo //
translated: In the south, in the center of the sign of Aries, there are thirteen and a half nak·π£atras, beginning with half of MaghƒÅ and ending with half of Revatƒ´.

original: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing zhes pa ni gzhu'i rnam pa'i khyim drug la  'go la nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i ri mo'i dbus nas rgyu skar gyi 'khor @190b lo phyed kyi rgyu skar gyiüîΩ'khor lo lhor gnas so //
analyzed: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing zhes pa ni gzhu'i rnam pa'i khyim drug la  'go la nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i ri mo'i dbus nas rgyu skar gyi 'khor @190b lo phyed kyi rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo lhor gnas so //
translated: In the six houses of the bow shape, from the center of the equator of the line of the equinoxes, the circle of the stars moves half the circle of the stars to the south.üîΩTo the north, it is the ≈öƒ´ta Mountains, like a good lotus petal, in the east, Aries, Libra, and so on.

original: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o zhes pa ni lhor khyim drug la so sor rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo phyed gnas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du  'og la'i ri mo'i dbus nas
analyzed: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o zhes pa ni lhor khyim drug la so sor rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo phyed gnas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du  'og la'i ri mo'i dbus nas
translated: Just as the circle of the stars abides in the six houses to the south, abiding in each one for half a circle of the stars, from the center of the equator below,

original: byang du khyim so so'i dbye bas khyim drug la gnas so //
analyzed: byang du khyim so so'i dbye bas khyim drug la gnas so //
translated: to the north, it abides in the six houses by the division of the individual houses.üîΩIn the east, it abides in Aries, Libra, and so on, up to Virgo.

original: shar du lug dang srang sogs te bu mo'i mthar thug pa la gnas shing de bzhin du srang la sogs pa nya'i mthar thug pa la gnas so //
analyzed: shar du lug dang srang sogs te bu mo'i mthar thug pa la gnas shing de bzhin du srang la sogs pa nya'i mthar thug pa la gnas so //

original: 'dir shar gyi phyed du lug go //
analyzed: 'dir shar gyi phyed du lug go //

original: dbang ldan du glang ngo //
analyzed: dbang ldan du glang ngo //
translated: In the northeast is Taurus.

analyzed: byang gi phyed du 'khrig pa'o //

original: slar yang byang gi phyed du ka rka ta'o //üîΩrlung du seng ge'o //
analyzed: slar yang byang gi phyed du ka rka ta'o // rlung du seng ge'o //
translated: Again, in the northern half is Cancer.üîΩIn the northwest is Leo.

original: nub kyi phyed du bu mo'o //
analyzed: nub kyi phyed du bu mo'o //
translated: In the western half is Virgo.

original: slar yang nub kyi phyed du srang ngo //üîΩbden bral du sdig pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang nub kyi phyed du srang ngo // bden bral du sdig pa'o //
translated: Again, in the western half is Libra.üîΩIn the southwest is Scorpio.

original: lho'i phyed du gzhu'o //
analyzed: lho'i phyed du gzhu'o //
translated: In the southern half is Sagittarius.

original: slar yang lho'i phyed du chu srin no //üîΩme ru bum pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang lho'i phyed du chu srin no // me ru bum pa'o //
translated: Again, in the southern half is Capricorn.üîΩIn the southeast is Aquarius.

original: shar gyi phyed du nya'o zhes pa ni 'go la la khyim dgong ba'o //
analyzed: shar gyi phyed du nya'o zhes pa ni 'go la la khyim dgong ba'o //
translated: In the eastern half is Pisces.üîΩThis is the beginning of the signs.

original: 'dir lug shar ba na srang nub bo //
analyzed: 'dir lug shar ba na srang nub bo //
translated: Here, when Aries rises, Libra sets.

original: glang shar ba na sdig pa nub ste de ltar thams cad du nyin mtshan gyis shar ba'i khyim nas khyim bdun pa ni nub par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: glang shar ba na sdig pa nub ste de ltar thams cad du nyin mtshan gyis shar ba'i khyim nas khyim bdun pa ni nub par rig par bya'o //
translated: When Taurus rises, Scorpio sets. Thus, in all cases, the seventh house from the rising sign of the day or night should be known as the setting sign.üîΩNow, the extent of the world in general is stated by Gola:üîΩFrom fire to the end of Cool Mountain,üîΩa thousand yojanas in the sky,

original: da ni 'jig rten spyi'i lugs kyis 'go la'i rgya gsungs pa me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mnga' ri'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten spyi'i lugs kyis 'go la'i rgya gsungs pa me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mnga' ri'o zhes pa ste /
translated: in the sky, in the sky, and in the land.

original: 'dir lho me'i dkyil 'khor nas byang kha ba can chen po'i mtshams su 'go la'i tshad dpag tshad stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: 'dir lho me'i dkyil 'khor nas byang kha ba can chen po'i mtshams su 'go la'i tshad dpag tshad stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: Here, from the southern fire mandala to the northern great snow mountain, the distance is 75,000 yojanas.

original: de bzhin du shar dang nub 'khor ba nas te gsal bar le'u lnga pa las brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du shar dang nub 'khor ba nas te gsal bar le'u lnga pa las brjod par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, from the eastern and western mountains, the distance is 75,000 yojanas. This will be explained clearly in Chapter Five.

original: dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo zhes pa ni khyim gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i ri mo ste /
analyzed: dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo zhes pa ni khyim gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i ri mo ste /
translated: In the center, the line of half a wheel. The line of the equinox is in the center of the wheel of the houses.

original: dpag tshad stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa'i stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun gyi mthar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpag tshad stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa'i stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun gyi mthar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the center of 75,000 yojanas, it extends to 37,500 yojanas and a half.

original: de la bgrod pa ni dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang zhes pa ste kyang gi sgra las gza' thams cad kyi 'khor lo phyed kyi dbus kyi ri mo bgrod pa ni rang rang gi mnyam pa la mtshan mo gcig yin
analyzed: de la bgrod pa ni dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang zhes pa ste kyang gi sgra las gza' thams cad kyi 'khor lo phyed kyi dbus kyi ri mo bgrod pa ni rang rang gi mnyam pa la mtshan mo gcig yin
translated: The movement of the sun on that line, and also the movement of all the planets on the line of half a wheel in the center, is one night and one day for each of their own equinoctial periods,

original: gyi dus thams cad du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gyi dus thams cad du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for all times.

original: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu ste zhes pa ni phyi nas mnyam pa'i dus kyi nyin zhag las lhor bgrod pa la lhor @191a * //
analyzed: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu ste zhes pa ni phyi nas mnyam pa'i dus kyi nyin zhag las lhor bgrod pa la lhor @191a * //
translated: Then, it moves to the right and left.

original: rgyu'o ; / byang du bgrod pa la byang du rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu'o ; / byang du bgrod pa la byang du rgyu'o //
translated: After that, from the time of the equinox, it moves south in the southern course, and it moves north in the northern course.

original: g-yas dang g-yas min dag ni srang la sogs pa dang / lug la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yas min dag ni srang la sogs pa dang / lug la sogs pa la'o //
translated: The right and left are the zodiac signs Aries and so on, and the houses of Aries and so on.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis /
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis /
translated: The path is divided into the lunar mansions,üîΩand the path is the celestial sphere.

original: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba zhes pa ni lam rnams kyi grangs brgya brgyad cu ste 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar zhes pa ni byang du bgrod pa nas lhor bgrod pa'i bar dang lhor bgrod pa nas byang duüîΩbgrod pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba zhes pa ni lam rnams kyi grangs brgya brgyad cu ste 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar zhes pa ni byang du bgrod pa nas lhor bgrod pa'i bar dang lhor bgrod pa nas byang du bgrod pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The path is counted as one hundred and eighty degrees, and the day and night are counted as far as the end of the journey, from the northern course to the southern course, and from the southern course to the northern course.

original: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so //
analyzed: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so //
translated: The sun and moon move six degrees in the day and night, decreasing and increasing by one-sixth.

original: zhes pa ni 'dir drug chas 'grib par 'gyur zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug cu'i drug cha chu tshod bcus chu srin nas 'khrig pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mtshan mo 'grib cing nyin mo 'phel lo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir drug chas 'grib par 'gyur zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug cu'i drug cha chu tshod bcus chu srin nas 'khrig pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mtshan mo 'grib cing nyin mo 'phel lo //
translated: The night decreases and the day increases by ten muh≈´rtas each, from the time of Capricorn until the time of Cancer.üîΩThe day decreases and the night increases by ten muh≈´rtas each, from the time of Cancer until the time of Capricorn.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.

original: ka rka ta nas gzhu'i mthar thug pa'i bar du nyin mo 'grib cing mtshan mo 'phel te nges par nyi ma ri bong can ni 'grib dang 'phel zhes pa drug chas so //
analyzed: ka rka ta nas gzhu'i mthar thug pa'i bar du nyin mo 'grib cing mtshan mo 'phel te nges par nyi ma ri bong can ni 'grib dang 'phel zhes pa drug chas so //
translated: The decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.

original: 'dir kee l'a sha'i dum bu la grib mas nges pa ni 'phags pa'i yul du ma yin te /üîΩ'phags pa'i yul du byang du bgrod pa nas /
analyzed: 'dir kee l'a sha'i dum bu la grib mas nges pa ni 'phags pa'i yul du ma yin te / 'phags pa'i yul du byang du bgrod pa nas /
translated: The decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.

original: lhor bgrod pa'i mtha' dang / lhor bgrod pa nas byang du bgrod pa'i mthar grib ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis bcu'i chas 'grib cing 'phel lo //
analyzed: lhor bgrod pa'i mtha' dang / lhor bgrod pa nas byang du bgrod pa'i mthar grib ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis bcu'i chas 'grib cing 'phel lo //
translated: The decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each, at the solstices, is not mentioned here because it is included in the decrease and increase of ten muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe decrease and increase of the day and night by one muh≈´rta each

original: de bzhin du bod dang li dang rgya nag la sogs pa'i yul rnams su dgu cha dang brgyad cha dang bdun cha dag gis sham bha la'i yul la thug pa'i bar du grib ma'i dbang gis 'grib cing 'phel bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bod dang li dang rgya nag la sogs pa'i yul rnams su dgu cha dang brgyad cha dang bdun cha dag gis sham bha la'i yul la thug pa'i bar du grib ma'i dbang gis 'grib cing 'phel bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, in the countries of Tibet, Khotan, China, and so on, the shadow of the gnomon decreases and increases by nine, eight, and seven parts, respectively, until it reaches the country of Shambhala.

original: da ni steng du nyi ma 'khor ba'i dbang gis dum bu bcu gnyis la sa'i 'go la gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni steng du nyi ma 'khor ba'i dbang gis dum bu bcu gnyis la sa'i 'go la gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the author explains the twelve sectors of the earth in terms of the movement of the sun above.

original: gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o zhes pa ste /
translated: In the sector of Aries, the days and nights are equal for people on the mountain, on the day of the sun in Aries.

original: sa'i dum bu gang du lug gi nyi ma la dpyid phyed kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur na srang gi nyi ma la ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa'i dum bu gang du lug gi nyi ma la dpyid phyed kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur na srang gi nyi ma la ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
translated: In whatever sector of the earth the days and nights are equal on the day of the sun in Aries, in that sector the days and nights are equal on the day of the sun in Libra in the autumn.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin du lug gi nyi ma la ston phyed du 'gyur na srang gi nyi ma la dpyid kyi dus phyed kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin du lug gi nyi ma la ston phyed du 'gyur na srang gi nyi ma la dpyid kyi dus phyed kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in the same way, if the days and nights are equal on the day of the sun in Aries in the spring, the days and nights are equal on the day of the sun in Libra in the autumn.

original: de bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa las gang gi phyir sa'i dum bu dang po la ri zhes pa sa'i dum bu bdun pa la ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa las gang gi phyir sa'i dum bu dang po la ri zhes pa sa'i dum bu bdun pa la ste /
translated: Similarly, because they are mutually dependent, the first part of the land is called the mountain, and the seventh part of the land is called the mountain.

original: lhun po'i lho nas byang dang byang nas lhor sa'i dum bu @191b bdun pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhun po'i lho nas byang dang byang nas lhor sa'i dum bu @191b bdun pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: From the south to the north of Meru, and from the north to the south, the seventh part of the land is the place where the day and night are equal.üîΩTherefore, in the two parts of the eight parts, it is certain that the sun is in the place of the bull and the sun is in the place of the scorpion.

original: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no zhes pa ni 'dir ji ltar sngar brjod pa la lhun po'i lho dang byang gi sa'i dum bur lug gi nyi ma dang / srang gi nyi ma la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du cung zad bden bral gyi zur du gnas pa dang dbang ldan gyi  thur phyed kyi char gnas pa la yang nges pa /
analyzed: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no zhes pa ni 'dir ji ltar sngar brjod pa la lhun po'i lho dang byang gi sa'i dum bur lug gi nyi ma dang / srang gi nyi ma la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du cung zad bden bral gyi zur du gnas pa dang dbang ldan gyi  thur phyed kyi char gnas pa la yang nges pa /
translated: Just as it was previously explained that in the southern and northern parts of Meru, the sun is in the place of the ram and the sun is in the place of the libra, the day and night are equal.

original: zhes pa gdon mi za bar nyi ma glang la gnas pa dang / sdig pa la gnas pa la de bzhin du dpyid phyed dang ston phyed nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa gdon mi za bar nyi ma glang la gnas pa dang / sdig pa la gnas pa la de bzhin du dpyid phyed dang ston phyed nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: Without doubt, when the sun is in Taurus and Scorpio, the days and nights are of equal length in the northern and southern regions of Jambudvƒ´pa, respectively, at the solstices.

original: de bzhin du bug pa zhes bya dgu pa dang me grangs te gsum pa'i sa'i dum bur bden bral gyi zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa dang dbang ldan gyi zur phyed la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bug pa zhes bya dgu pa dang me grangs te gsum pa'i sa'i dum bur bden bral gyi zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa dang dbang ldan gyi zur phyed la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, when the sun is in Virgo and Gemini, the days and nights are of equal length in the western and eastern regions of Jambudvƒ´pa, respectively, at the solstices.

original: nyi ma 'khrig pa la gnas pa dang / gzhu la gnas pa la dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma 'khrig pa la gnas pa dang / gzhu la gnas pa la dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
translated: When the sun is in Cancer and Capricorn, it is summer and winter, respectively, in the northern and southern regions of Jambudvƒ´pa.üîΩWhen the sun is in Libra and Aries, the days and nights are of equal length in the eastern and western regions of Jambudvƒ´pa, respectively, at the equinoxes.

original: phyogs kyi tshad bcu pa dang bzhi pa dag la ni lhun po'i shar gyi sa'i dum bu dang nub kyi sa'i dum bur nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas pa la dpyid phyed dang ston phyedüîΩdu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshad bcu pa dang bzhi pa dag la ni lhun po'i shar gyi sa'i dum bu dang nub kyi sa'i dum bur nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas pa la dpyid phyed dang ston phyedüîΩdu 'gyur ro //
translated: When the sun is in Taurus and Scorpio, it is summer and winter, respectively, in the northern and southern regions of Jambudvƒ´pa.üîΩWhen the sun is in Cancer and Capricorn, it is summer and winter, respectively, in the northern and southern regions of Jambudvƒ´pa.

original: lnga pa la gnas pa dang bcu gcig pa la yang mdun gyi sa'i dum bur nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro //üîΩseng ge bum par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa na ste nyi ma lnga pa rlung gi zur gyi phyed la gnas pa dang bcu gcig pa me'i zur gyi phyed la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lnga pa la gnas pa dang bcu gcig pa la yang mdun gyi sa'i dum bur nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro // seng ge bum par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa na ste nyi ma lnga pa rlung gi zur gyi phyed la gnas pa dang bcu gcig pa me'i zur gyi phyed la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed du 'gyur ro //
translated: On the fifth day, and also on the eleventh, day and night are equal in the eastern sector of the earth.üîΩWhen the sun enters Leo, on the fifth day, which is half of the wind direction, and on the eleventh day, which is half of the fire direction, day and night are equal, and it is the middle of spring and the middle of autumn.

original: bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni zhes pa bcu gnyis pa me'i zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa dang ro rlung gi zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa la stes zhes pa lung gi tshig go //üîΩnyi ma nya la gnas pa dang bu mo la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam pa gnyis su 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed gyur ro //
analyzed: bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni zhes pa bcu gnyis pa me'i zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa dang ro rlung gi zur gyi phyed gzhan la gnas pa la stes zhes pa lung gi tshig go //üîΩnyi ma nya la gnas pa dang bu mo la gnas pa la nyin mtshan mnyam pa gnyis su 'gyur te dpyid phyed dang ston phyed gyur ro //
translated: On the twelfth day, which is the other half of the fire direction, and on the thirteenth day, which is the other half of the wind direction, day and night are equal, and it is the middle of spring and the middle of autumn.

original: de ltar sa bcu gnyis su khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbang gis nyi ma 'char ba dang nub pa'i rnam par dbye bas zla ba bcu gnyis dang dus drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sa bcu gnyis su khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbang gis nyi ma 'char ba dang nub pa'i rnam par dbye bas zla ba bcu gnyis dang dus drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by the power of the twelve houses, the sun rises and sets in twelve ways, and so there are twelve months and six seasons.

original: da ni nyi ma'i khyim 'khor ba'i dbang gis sa dum bu bcu gnyis su byang du bgrod pa bcu gnyis dang lhor bgrod pa bcu gnyis gsungs pa @192a * //
analyzed: da ni nyi ma'i khyim 'khor ba'i dbang gis sa dum bu bcu gnyis su byang du bgrod pa bcu gnyis dang lhor bgrod pa bcu gnyis gsungs pa @192a * //
translated: Now, by the power of the sun's revolution through the houses, the twelve ascents to the north and the twelve descents to the south are described in the twelve sectors of the earth.

original: 'dir ni g-yon bgrod du 'gyur zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni g-yon bgrod du 'gyur zhes pa ste /
translated: Here, the sun moves counterclockwise.

original: 'dir ni zhes pa lhun po'i lho'i sa'i dum bur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes pa lhun po'i lho'i sa'i dum bur ro //
translated: Here, in the southern sector of the earth,

original: ci'i phyir zhe na lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngur de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngur de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: why? Because the sun moves counterclockwise in the southern sector of the earth, in the small southern continent of Jambudvƒ´pa, by the power of the TathƒÅgata's teaching of the Dharma.

original: de'i phyir lho'i sa'i dum bur g-yon bgrod ces pa byang du bgrod pa ste nyi ma chu srin du gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lho'i sa'i dum bur g-yon bgrod ces pa byang du bgrod pa ste nyi ma chu srin du gnas pa la'o //
translated: Therefore, in the southern sector of the earth, the sun moves counterclockwise, that is, to the north, when the sun is in Capricorn.

original: de bzhin du bum par nyi mas sa'i dum bu gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bum par nyi mas sa'i dum bu gnyis pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, in Aquarius, the sun is in the second sector of the earth.

original: nya la dum bu gsum par ro //
analyzed: nya la dum bu gsum par ro //
translated: In Pisces, it is in the third sector.

original: mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par te nub kyi sa'i dum bu ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par te nub kyi sa'i dum bu ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth part of the earth, the western part, is traversed by the sun in Aries.

original: 'byung ba zhes bya lnga par nyi ma glang la gnas par 'gyur pas so //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes bya lnga par nyi ma glang la gnas par 'gyur pas so //
translated: The fifth part is Taurus, where the sun is in the element of earth.

original: 'khrig par nyi ma gnas pas sa drug pa la byang du bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrig par nyi ma gnas pas sa drug pa la byang du bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The sixth part is Gemini, where the sun is in the element of air.

original: bdun pa lhun po'i byang du yang nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pas byang du bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdun pa lhun po'i byang du yang nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pas byang du bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The seventh part is Cancer, where the sun is in the element of water.

original: seng ga la gnas pas sa'i dum bu brgyad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: seng ga la gnas pas sa'i dum bu brgyad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The eighth part is Leo, where the sun is in the element of fire.

original: bu mo la nyi ma gnas pas bug pa ste sa'i dum bu dgu par ro //
analyzed: bu mo la nyi ma gnas pas bug pa ste sa'i dum bu dgu par ro //
translated: The ninth part is Virgo, where the sun is in the element of earth.

original: srang gi nyi mas sa'i dum bu bcu par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srang gi nyi mas sa'i dum bu bcu par 'gyur ro //
translated: The tenth part is Libra, where the sun is in the element of air.

original: sdig par nyi ma yis drag po'i dum bu bcu gcig pa la'o //
analyzed: sdig par nyi ma yis drag po'i dum bu bcu gcig pa la'o //
translated: The eleventh part is Scorpio, where the sun is in the element of fire.

original: gzhu la gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis par 'gyur te mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang zhes pa srid pa ste khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas rtsibs bcu gnyis kyis gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi byang du bgrod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhu la gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis par 'gyur te mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang zhes pa srid pa ste khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas rtsibs bcu gnyis kyis gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi byang du bgrod pa'o //
translated: The sun's movement is in the southern direction when it is in the southern direction of the world realm, and in the northern direction when it is in the northern direction.

original: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur /
translated: Similarly, it moves to the south.

original: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas lhor bgrod pa ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis ka rka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas lhor bgrod pa ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis ka rka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, it moves to the south, in the houses of Cancer and so on, by the power of the sun's movement.

original: lhun po'i lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngu'i sa'i dum bu 'dir ka rka tar nyi ma gnas pas lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhun po'i lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngu'i sa'i dum bu 'dir ka rka tar nyi ma gnas pas lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this southern Jambudvipa of Meru, the sun is in Cancer and moves to the south.

original: de bzhin du g-yas skor gyis te gnyis par seng ge'i nyi mas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas skor gyis te gnyis par seng ge'i nyi mas so //
translated: Similarly, in the second house, Leo, by the sun's movement to the right.

original: gsum par bu mo'i nyi mas so //
analyzed: gsum par bu mo'i nyi mas so //
translated: In the third house, Virgo, by the sun's movement.

original: bzhi par srang gi nyi mas te lhun po'i nub tu lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzhi par srang gi nyi mas te lhun po'i nub tu lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the fourth house, Libra, the sun is in the west and moves to the south.

original: lnga pa la sdig pa'i nyi mas so //
analyzed: lnga pa la sdig pa'i nyi mas so //
translated: In the fifth house, Scorpio, by the sun's movement.

original: drug pa la gzhu'i nyi mas so //
analyzed: drug pa la gzhu'i nyi mas so //
translated: In the sixth house, Sagittarius, by the sun's movement.

original: bdun pa la chu srin gyi nyi mas te lhun po'i byang du'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la chu srin gyi nyi mas te lhun po'i byang du'o //
translated: On the seventh, by the sign of Makara, to the north of Meru.

original: brgyad pa la bum pa'i nyi mas so //üîΩdgu pa la nya'i nyi mas so //
analyzed: brgyad pa la bum pa'i nyi mas so // dgu pa la nya'i nyi mas so //
translated: On the eighth, by the sign of Kumbha.üîΩOn the ninth, by the sign of Mina.

original: bcu pa la lug gi nyi mas so //
analyzed: bcu pa la lug gi nyi mas so //
translated: On the tenth, by the sign of Mesa.

original: bcu gcig pa la glang gi nyi mas so //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la glang gi nyi mas so //
translated: On the eleventh, by the sign of Vrishabha.

original: sa'i dum bu bcu gnyis pa la 'khrig pa'i nyi mas te /
analyzed: sa'i dum bu bcu gnyis pa la 'khrig pa'i nyi mas te /
translated: On the twelfth part of the earth, by the sign of Mithuna.

original: khyim bcu gnyis kyis dbye bas 'jig rten rnams kyi lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim bcu gnyis kyis dbye bas 'jig rten rnams kyi lhor bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The world moves to the south by the division of the twelve houses.

original: da ni sa'i @192b dkyil 'khor la nyi ma steng du 'gro ba'i tshad gsungs pa steng du drug dang klu'i grangs zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sa'i @192b dkyil 'khor la nyi ma steng du 'gro ba'i tshad gsungs pa steng du drug dang klu'i grangs zhes pa ste /
translated: Now, the measure of the sun's movement above the circle of the earth is stated: above, six and the number of NƒÅga.

original: 'dir bdun pa sa'i dkyil 'khor las steng du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug gi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar te lhor bgrod pa'i dang po la'o //
analyzed: 'dir bdun pa sa'i dkyil 'khor las steng du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug gi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar te lhor bgrod pa'i dang po la'o //
translated: Here, above the seventh, the circle of the earth, the number of 86,000 yojanas is the extent of the sun's rays at the end of the northern course, at the beginning of the southern course.

original: rang rang gi dum bur ka rka ta la sogs pa rang rang gi lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la 'gyur te dum bu bcu gnyis po rnams la rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang rang gi dum bur ka rka ta la sogs pa rang rang gi lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la 'gyur te dum bu bcu gnyis po rnams la rim pa bzhin no //
translated: In each of the twelve sectors, the movement of the sun from south to north occurs on the day of the solstice in the corresponding sector, such as Cancer.

original: de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs zhes pa ni /
translated: Then, to the right, it is exhausted.üîΩThe movement of the sun from south to north occurs on the day of the solstice in the southern sector. Then, to the right, it is exhausted in eleven thousand.

original: lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag de nas g-yas su bgrod pa la byang du bgrod pa'i bar du stong phrag bcu gcig zad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lhor bgrod pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag de nas g-yas su bgrod pa la byang du bgrod pa'i bar du stong phrag bcu gcig zad par 'gyur te /

analyzed: 'go la'i ri mo de las gang zhig nyi ma'i 'phel dang 'grib par gyur pa de ni mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' zhes pa dpag tshad lnga brgya lnga pa'i stong phrag lnga ste ri mo las byang dang lhor nyi ma'i gdung bar byed pa steng du rang rang

analyzed: gi dum bur rang rang gi khyim du longs spyod pa'i dbang gis rig par bya'o //
translated: in one's own direction, one should understand by the power of enjoying one's own house in one's own part.

original: da ni dum bu bcu gnyis la lho dang byang du nyin zhag so sor nyi ma thad kar 'gro ba gsungs pa lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me'i bar du 'gro bar byed ces pa ste /
analyzed: da ni dum bu bcu gnyis la lho dang byang du nyin zhag so sor nyi ma thad kar 'gro ba gsungs pa lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me'i bar du 'gro bar byed ces pa ste /
translated: Now, it is said that the sun moves directly north and south in each day in the twelve parts. The sun moves to the south from the ocean of salt to the south of fire.

original: 'dir rtsibs bcu gnyis kyis la dum bu so so re rer khyim gyi dbang gis lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs can lhor bgrod pa la gnas pa'i nyi ma me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dang po'i bar rgya mtsho'i mtha'i mtshams su gro bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dir rtsibs bcu gnyis kyis la dum bu so so re rer khyim gyi dbang gis lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs can lhor bgrod pa la gnas pa'i nyi ma me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dang po'i bar rgya mtsho'i mtha'i mtshams su gro bar byed do //
translated: Here, on each of the twelve spokes, the sun, which is located in the southern solstice in the salt ocean, makes the first degree of the southern solstice at the end of the ocean on the first day of the fire mandala.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams de nas kee l'a sha'i byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang gi lam du yang byang bgrod la gnas pa'i nyi ma lho bgrod kyi dang po'i nyin zhag gi bar du'o //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams de nas kee l'a sha'i byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang gi lam du yang byang bgrod la gnas pa'i nyi ma lho bgrod kyi dang po'i nyin zhag gi bar du'o //
translated: From that point of the fire mandala, it moves north to Kailash, and on the northern path to the snow mountains, it makes the first day of the northern solstice.

original: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba zhes pa la mda' rnams zhes pa lnga'o //
analyzed: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba zhes pa la mda' rnams zhes pa lnga'o //
translated: The arrows are multiplied by the lunar days. The arrows are five.

original: tshes zhes pa bco lnga ste bco lnga po de dag gis bsgyur ba ni mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba zhes pa ste bdun cu rtsa lngar 'gyur ro //üîΩdpag @193a * //

original: // de ltar bgrod pa gnyis ka'i longs spyod kyis nyi ma'i khyim gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gi grangs ni drug cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: // de ltar bgrod pa gnyis ka'i longs spyod kyis nyi ma'i khyim gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gi grangs ni drug cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by the enjoyment of both paths, the number of days in the mandala of the solar house-wheel is 365.

original: de ltar dum bu bcu gnyis su nyi ma thad kar bgrod par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dum bu bcu gnyis su nyi ma thad kar bgrod par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be understood that the sun moves directly through twelve sectors.

original: da ni dum bu bcu gnyis su 'khor ba'i dbang gis nyi ma khyim so so la gnas pa'i zla ba bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni dum bu bcu gnyis su 'khor ba'i dbang gis nyi ma khyim so so la gnas pa'i zla ba bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the division of the twelve months of the sun abiding in the individual houses by the power of revolution through the twelve sectors is stated:

original: khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed ces pa ste //
analyzed: khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed ces pa ste //
translated: The sun abiding in one house makes the entire collection of time, the twelve months, and the twenty-four directions.

original: 'dir lug la sogs pa'i khyim gang yang rung ba gcig la nyi ma gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis su dus drug dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed de khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: 'dir lug la sogs pa'i khyim gang yang rung ba gcig la nyi ma gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis su dus drug dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed de khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: Here, the sun abiding in any one house, such as Aries, makes the six times, the twelve months, and the twenty-four directions in the twelve sectors by the power of revolution of the house-wheel.

original: 'dir lhun po'i phyogs kyi cha thams cad du khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i dbang gis me la reg pa gang yin pa de ni bdun pa'i phyogs thob pa na lhun po'i rva la reg cing gangs kyi ri'i steng du 'gro'o zhes pa'i rigs pas nyi ma khyim
analyzed: 'dir lhun po'i phyogs kyi cha thams cad du khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i dbang gis me la reg pa gang yin pa de ni bdun pa'i phyogs thob pa na lhun po'i rva la reg cing gangs kyi ri'i steng du 'gro'o zhes pa'i rigs pas nyi ma khyim
translated: Here, by the power of the revolution of the wheel of houses in all directions of Meru, the sun touches Meru when it reaches the seventh direction. By the reasoning that it touches the peak of Meru and goes above the snowy mountains, the sun should be known in all houses.

original: so sor gnas pa'i dus kyi tshogs la sogs pa mtha' dag ste thams cad rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so sor gnas pa'i dus kyi tshogs la sogs pa mtha' dag ste thams cad rig par bya'o //
translated: All the collections of times of the individual houses and so on should be known.

original: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so zhes pa ni /
translated: The moon is in each section. In the twelve spokes of the ground, it is in order.

original: 'dir sa gzhi rtsibs bcu gnyis po la dum bu so so dag tu zla ba so sor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir sa gzhi rtsibs bcu gnyis po la dum bu so so dag tu zla ba so sor 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the moon is in each section in the twelve spokes of the ground.

original: nyi ma khyim gcig la gnas pa'i rnam pa gang gis yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste 'dir khyim gcig nges par bstan pas khyim thams cad rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma khyim gcig la gnas pa'i rnam pa gang gis yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste 'dir khyim gcig nges par bstan pas khyim thams cad rig par bya'o //
translated: The aspect of the sun abiding in one house should be stated. Here, all houses should be known by the definite teaching of one house.

original: lhun po'i lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngu 'dir lug la sogs pa'i khyim rnams dang @193b dpyid la sogs pa'i dus rnams dang / nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba rnams dang / de bzhin du phyogs rnams thams cad rab tu grags so //
analyzed: lhun po'i lho 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngu 'dir lug la sogs pa'i khyim rnams dang @193b dpyid la sogs pa'i dus rnams dang / nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba rnams dang / de bzhin du phyogs rnams thams cad rab tu grags so //
translated: In this small southern continent of Jambudvƒ´pa, the houses of Aries, etc., the seasons of spring, etc., the months of KƒÅrtika, etc., and the directions are well known.

original: de'i phyir lug gi khyim de la nyi ma gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis su dus kyi tshogs la sogs pa thams cad byed pa ji lta ba bde bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir lug gi khyim de la nyi ma gnas pas dum bu bcu gnyis su dus kyi tshogs la sogs pa thams cad byed pa ji lta ba bde bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, just as the sun, located in the house of Aries, makes all the collections of time, etc., in the twelve sectors, so it should be stated.

original: lhun po'i lho'i dum bu 'dir lug la nyi ma gnas pas dpyid kyi dus su sa ga'i zla ba byed do //üîΩme'i zur gyi phyed dum bu gnyis pa la snron gyi zla ba byed do //

original: de bzhin du me'u zur gyi phyed gzhan gyi dum bu gsum pa la chu stod kyi zla ba byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du me'u zur gyi phyed gzhan gyi dum bu gsum pa la chu stod kyi zla ba byed do //

analyzed: de bzhin du bzhi pa la lhun po'i shar gyi dum bu la shar lus 'phags por gro bzhin gyi zla ba byed do //

analyzed: lnga pa dbang ldan gyi phyed kyi dum bur khrums kyi zla ba byed do //
translated: In the fifth, in the sector of Indra, one should place DhanisthƒÅ.

analyzed: dbang ldan gyi zur gyi phyed gzhan la dum bu drug par tha skar gyi zla ba byed do //

analyzed: lhun po'i byang dum bu bdun par smin drug gi zla ba byed do //
translated: In the northern sector of Meru, in the seventh sector, one should place the moon of BhadrapadƒÅ.

analyzed: rlung gi zur gyi phyed la dum bu brgyad par mgo'i zla ba byed do //
