analyzed: rlung gi zur gyi phyed gzhan la dum bu dgu par rgyal gyi zla ba byed do //
translated: In the other half of the corner of VƒÅyu, in the ninth sector, one should place the moon of MaghƒÅ.

original: lhun po'i nub tu dum bu bcu par mchu'i zla ba byed do //üîΩbden bral gyi zur gyi phyed kyi dum bu la da bo'i zla ba byed do //
analyzed: lhun po'i nub tu dum bu bcu par mchu'i zla ba byed do // bden bral gyi zur gyi phyed kyi dum bu la da bo'i zla ba byed do //
translated: In the west of Meru, in the tenth sector, one should place the moon of M≈´la.üîΩIn the half of the corner of Nair·πõti, in the eleventh sector, one should place the moon of P≈´rvƒÅ·π£ƒÅ·∏çhƒÅ.

original: bden bral gyi zur gyi phyed gzhan gyi dum bu la nag pa'i zla ba byed do //
analyzed: bden bral gyi zur gyi phyed gzhan gyi dum bu la nag pa'i zla ba byed do //
translated: In the other half of the corner of Nair·πõti, in the twelfth sector, one should place the moon of UttarƒÅ·π£ƒÅ·∏çhƒÅ.

original: de bzhin du zla ba gnyis kyis dum bu gnyis su dus su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba gnyis kyis dum bu gnyis su dus su 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, two months make two parts.

original: dum bu so sor dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas phyogs gnyis su 'gyur te de ltar na dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams dum bu bcu gnyis la 'khor lo'i rnam pas 'khor bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dum bu so sor dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas phyogs gnyis su 'gyur te de ltar na dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams dum bu bcu gnyis la 'khor lo'i rnam pas 'khor bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Each part is divided into two directions, white and black, thus making six periods, twelve months and twenty-four directions.

original: lho'i dum bu 'dir khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbang gis 'pho ba la zla ba gang zhig gyur pa de ni 'pho ba gzhan la g-yas skor gyis bden bral gyi zur du 'gro'o //
analyzed: lho'i dum bu 'dir khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbang gis 'pho ba la zla ba gang zhig gyur pa de ni 'pho ba gzhan la g-yas skor gyis bden bral gyi zur du 'gro'o //
translated: In this southern part, the moon moves by the power of the twelve houses. The moon that moves in one revolution moves to the southeast in the next revolution.

original: bden bral gyi zur phyed na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: bden bral gyi zur phyed na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that abides half a square moves to the other half square.

original: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni lhun po'i nub pa lang spyod du 'gro'o //
analyzed: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni lhun po'i nub pa lang spyod du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that abides in the other half square moves to the west of Meru, to godaniya.

original: nub pa lang spyod na gnas pa ni rlung gi zur phyed du 'gro'o //
analyzed: nub pa lang spyod na gnas pa ni rlung gi zur phyed du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that abides in godaniya moves to half a square of Vayu.

original: rlung gi zur phyed na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: rlung gi zur phyed na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in the half-sector that faces it moves to the other half-sector.

original: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni byang sgra mi snyan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni byang sgra mi snyan du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in the other half-sector moves to the northern continent Uttarakuru.

original: byang sgra mi snyan na gnas pa ni dbang ldan gyi zur phyed @194a * //
analyzed: byang sgra mi snyan na gnas pa ni dbang ldan gyi zur phyed @194a * //
translated: The moon that is in Uttarakuru moves to the half-sector of Indra.

original: du 'gro'o // de nas  gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: du 'gro'o // de nas  gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in the half-sector of Indra moves to the other half-sector.

original: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni shar lus 'phags por 'gro'o //
analyzed: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni shar lus 'phags por 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in the other half-sector moves to the eastern continent P≈´rvavideha.

original: shar lus 'phags po na gnas pa ni me'i zur gyi phyed kyi dum bur 'gro'o //
analyzed: shar lus 'phags po na gnas pa ni me'i zur gyi phyed kyi dum bur 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in P≈´rvavideha moves to the half-sector of Agni.

original: phyed snga ma na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: phyed snga ma na gnas pa ni zur phyed gzhan du 'gro'o //
translated: The moon that is in the first half-sector moves to the other half-sector.

original: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni lho 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ste de ltar zla ba bcu gnyis po rnams 'pho ba so so'i dbang gis dum bu bcu gnyis po rnams su yang dag par rgyu bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zur phyed gzhan na gnas pa ni lho 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ste de ltar zla ba bcu gnyis po rnams 'pho ba so so'i dbang gis dum bu bcu gnyis po rnams su yang dag par rgyu bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The moon that is in the other half-sector moves to the southern continent Jambudvƒ´pa. Thus, it should be understood that the moon moves through the twelve sectors in accordance with its movement through the twelve months.

original: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gang yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la 'gyur ro //üîΩ'dir byang du bgrod pa'i 'pho ba la lho'i dum bur nyin mo'i tshad nyams pa dang mtshan mo'i tshad 'phel ba de nyid byang sgra mi snyan du ste sa'i dum bu bdun par nyi ma 'char ba'i dbang dang lhor mtshan mo 'phel ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gang yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la 'gyur ro // 'dir byang du bgrod pa'i 'pho ba la lho'i dum bur nyin mo'i tshad nyams pa dang mtshan mo'i tshad 'phel ba de nyid byang sgra mi snyan du ste sa'i dum bu bdun par nyi ma 'char ba'i dbang dang lhor mtshan mo 'phel ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: The day length and the day of the week that correspond to a given place are the night length and the night of the week that correspond to the seventh place.üîΩHere, in the northern solstice, the day length decreases in the southern continent and the night length increases. This is so in Kuru, the seventh place, because the sun rises in the south and sets in the north.

original: de'i tshad kyang gzhan du ma yin te lho 'dzam bu gling du 'char ba'i dbang gis dang bdun par mtshan mo nyams pa'i dbang gis de nas lho la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshad kyang gzhan du ma yin te lho 'dzam bu gling du 'char ba'i dbang gis dang bdun par mtshan mo nyams pa'i dbang gis de nas lho la 'gyur ro //
translated: The measure of the day and night is not elsewhere, but in Jambudvƒ´pa, the southern continent, because the sun rises there and the night decreases in the seventh place.

original: de ltar thams cad dum bu so so la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad dum bu so so la rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood for all the continents.

original: lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o //
analyzed: lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o //
translated: The day is in front of the sun and the night is behind the sun on the three hundred thousand leagues of the path.

original: zhes pa ni 'dir zlum po'i tshad 'bum phrag drug ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis lam phyed la 'bum phrag gsum ni nyin mo zhes pa shar ba nas nub pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir zlum po'i tshad 'bum phrag drug ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis lam phyed la 'bum phrag gsum ni nyin mo zhes pa shar ba nas nub pa'i bar ro //
translated: This is the measure of the circle here. By the power of the movement of the sun, three hundred thousand [leagues] on half the path are called the day, from sunrise to sunset.

original: nub pa nas 'char ba'i bar ni mtshan mo ste 'bum phrag gsum mo //
analyzed: nub pa nas 'char ba'i bar ni mtshan mo ste 'bum phrag gsum mo //
translated: From sunset to sunrise is the night, three hundred thousand [leagues].

original: de ltar nyin mtshan la rig par bya'o //üîΩda ni dum bu bcu gnyis la gnas pa rnams kyis lhun po'i gnas pa gsungs pa //
analyzed: de ltar nyin mtshan la rig par bya'o // da ni dum bu bcu gnyis la gnas pa rnams kyis lhun po'i gnas pa gsungs pa //
translated: Thus, the day and night should be understood.üîΩNow, it is said that those who dwell in the twelve sectors live on Meru.

original: ri'i rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag ces pa ste 'dir ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i dum bu bcu gnyis la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyi byang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri'i rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag ces pa ste 'dir ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i dum bu bcu gnyis la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams kyi byang du 'gyur ro //
translated: The kings of mountains are in the north of all people, O Lord of Men. Here, for those people who dwell in the twelve sectors of Meru, the king of mountains, it is the north.

original: nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te zhes pa ni lhun po'i dum bu thams cad la gnas pa kun gyi gang nas nyi ma 'char ba de ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gyur te lho 'dzam bu'i gling la gnas pa rnams kyi shar lus 'phags po shar gyi
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te zhes pa ni lhun po'i dum bu thams cad la gnas pa kun gyi gang nas nyi ma 'char ba de ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gyur te lho 'dzam bu'i gling la gnas pa rnams kyi shar lus 'phags po shar gyi
translated: The rising of the sun is the east.üîΩThe direction from which the sun rises for all those living in all the sectors of Meru is the east.üîΩFor those living in Jambudvƒ´pa, the east is Videha.

original: phyogs so // nub ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi lho 'dzam bu'i gling shar gyi phyogs so //üîΩbyang sgra mi snyan na gnas pa rnams kyi nub pa lang spyod @194b shar gyi phyogs so //
analyzed: phyogs so // nub ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi lho 'dzam bu'i gling shar gyi phyogs so // byang sgra mi snyan na gnas pa rnams kyi nub pa lang spyod @194b shar gyi phyogs so //
translated: For those living in GodƒÅnƒ´ya, the east is Jambudvƒ´pa.üîΩFor those living in Kuru, the east is GodƒÅnƒ´ya.üîΩFor those living in Videha, the east is Kuru.

original: shar lus 'phags po na gnas pa rnams kyi byang sgra mi snyan shar gyi phyogs te nyi ma 'khor zhing 'char ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: shar lus 'phags po na gnas pa rnams kyi byang sgra mi snyan shar gyi phyogs te nyi ma 'khor zhing 'char ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: This is due to the movement and rising of the sun.

original: de bzhin du zur na gnas pa brgyad po rnams la'ang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zur na gnas pa brgyad po rnams la'ang shes par bya ste /
translated: The eight directions of the sectors should be understood in the same way.

original: dum bu so sor dbyug gu lnga lnga'i bar gyis nyi ma 'char bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum bu so sor dbyug gu lnga lnga'i bar gyis nyi ma 'char bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sun rises in each sector for five gha·π≠ikƒÅs.

original: ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang zhes pa ni dum bu so sor ri dang mnyam pa lhun po la mngon du phyogs par nyi ma bgrod pa ni byang dang lho dag go //
analyzed: ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang zhes pa ni dum bu so sor ri dang mnyam pa lhun po la mngon du phyogs par nyi ma bgrod pa ni byang dang lho dag go //
translated: The sun moves in the same way as the mountains, that is, it moves in the northern direction in the northern hemisphere and in the southern direction in the southern hemisphere.

original: de ni nub pa nub /
analyzed: de ni nub pa nub /
translated: It sets in the west.

original: de bzhin du dum bu bcu gnyis su ji ltar 'char ba shar yin pa de bzhin du de nub pa ni nub tu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dum bu bcu gnyis su ji ltar 'char ba shar yin pa de bzhin du de nub pa ni nub tu rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way that it rises in the east in the twelve sectors, one should understand that it sets in the west.

original: dus ni gsum ste snga dro dang nyin gang dang phyi 'bred do //
analyzed: dus ni gsum ste snga dro dang nyin gang dang phyi 'bred do //
translated: There are three periods of the day: morning, midday, and afternoon.

original: thun mtshams ni bzhi ste mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams dang / snga dro'i thun mtshams dang / nyin  gung gi thun mtshams dang / phyi 'bred kyi thun mtshams so //
analyzed: thun mtshams ni bzhi ste mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams dang / snga dro'i thun mtshams dang / nyin  gung gi thun mtshams dang / phyi 'bred kyi thun mtshams so //
translated: There are four periods of the day: the period of the first watch of the night, the period of the last watch of the night, the period of the morning, and the period of the afternoon.

original: thun tshod ni brgyad de nyin mo la bzhi dang mtshan mo la bzhi'o //
analyzed: thun tshod ni brgyad de nyin mo la bzhi dang mtshan mo la bzhi'o //
translated: There are eight periods of the day: four periods of the day and four periods of the night.

original: nyin mo dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams /
analyzed: nyin mo dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams /
translated: The sun moves correctly in the three periods of the day and in the three periods of the night.

original: de ltar dus la sogs pa rnams nyin mtshan dus thams cad du yang dag par rgyu ba ni dum bu nas dum bur lhun po'i phyogs rnams su 'khor ro //
analyzed: de ltar dus la sogs pa rnams nyin mtshan dus thams cad du yang dag par rgyu ba ni dum bu nas dum bur lhun po'i phyogs rnams su 'khor ro //
translated: Thus, time and so forth move perfectly in all times of day and night, circulating in the directions of the mountain of Meru from one section to the next.

original: rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la zhes pa ni rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i sa la'o //
analyzed: rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la zhes pa ni rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i sa la'o //
translated: On the ground of the bright sun means on the ground of the twelve spokes.

original: dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa zhes pa la dus sbyor ni bcu gnyis te de dag gi dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i dus la sogs pa rnams 'khor te dus ni dus sbyor bzhi bzhis 'khor ro //
analyzed: dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa zhes pa la dus sbyor ni bcu gnyis te de dag gi dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i dus la sogs pa rnams 'khor te dus ni dus sbyor bzhi bzhis 'khor ro //
translated: The divisions of the houses are the divisions by the twelve houses. The times and so forth that are divided by the divisions of the houses circulate. The times circulate by the four houses of the times.

original: thun mtshams so so ni dus sbyor gsum gyis 'khor ro //
analyzed: thun mtshams so so ni dus sbyor gsum gyis 'khor ro //
translated: The individual periods circulate by the three houses of the periods.

original: thun tshod so so ni dus sbyor phyed dang gnyis kyis 'khor ro //
analyzed: thun tshod so so ni dus sbyor phyed dang gnyis kyis 'khor ro //
translated: The individual watches circulate by one and a half houses.

original: de bzhin du dus sbyor so so ni dbyug gu lngas 'khor ro ;üîΩ/ thun tshod phyed ni thun tshod phyed kyis 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dus sbyor so so ni dbyug gu lngas 'khor ro ; / thun tshod phyed ni thun tshod phyed kyis 'khor ro //
translated: The individual houses circulate by five ghatis.üîΩHalf a watch circulates by half a watch.

original: yud tsam ni thun tshod phyed kyi phyed kyis 'khor ro //
analyzed: yud tsam ni thun tshod phyed kyi phyed kyis 'khor ro //
translated: A moment circulates by half a half watch.

original: chu tshod ni chu srang drug cus 'khor ro //
analyzed: chu tshod ni chu srang drug cus 'khor ro //
translated: The hour is completed in sixty minutes.

original: chu srang so so ni dbugs drug gis 'khor te /
analyzed: chu srang so so ni dbugs drug gis 'khor te /
translated: Each minute is completed in six breaths.

original: de ltar na nyin mtshan du lus can rnams kyi dbugs kyi dbye ba dang dus sbyor gyi dbye bas dus rnams 'khor zhing bgrod do //
analyzed: de ltar na nyin mtshan du lus can rnams kyi dbugs kyi dbye ba dang dus sbyor gyi dbye bas dus rnams 'khor zhing bgrod do //
translated: Thus, in day and night, the times are completed and passed by the divisions of the breaths of embodied beings and the divisions of the lunar mansions.

original: da ni lhun po'i phyogs thams cad du nyi ma 'khor ba'i tshad gsungs pa chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni lhun po'i phyogs thams cad du nyi ma 'khor ba'i tshad gsungs pa chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste zhes pa ste /
translated: Now, the measure of the sun‚Äôs movement in all directions of Meru is stated: In the time of an hour, the sun moves six thousand leagues with its foot.

original: chu tshod dus la zhes pa ni dbugs sum brgya drug cu'i grangs kyi dus la'o //
analyzed: chu tshod dus la zhes pa ni dbugs sum brgya drug cu'i grangs kyi dus la'o //
translated: The time of an hour is the time of three hundred and sixty breaths.

original: drug ni @195a * //
analyzed: drug ni @195a * //
translated: Six is

original: rkang pa dang bcas zhes pa ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag pa'i stong phrag drug ste khyim la gnas pa'i nyin mor byed pa 'di nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: rkang pa dang bcas zhes pa ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag pa'i stong phrag drug ste khyim la gnas pa'i nyin mor byed pa 'di nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
translated: with its foot. With its foot means with six thousand leagues plus two hundred and fifty. This sun, which is in the houses, moves in the sky.

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba'i shugs 'di ni khyim gyi yin gyi gzhi la gnas pa'i nyi ma yi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba'i shugs 'di ni khyim gyi yin gyi gzhi la gnas pa'i nyi ma yi ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the motion of the planets is in the zodiac, not in the ecliptic.

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo ni g-yas skor gyis 'khor te gza' rnams ni khyim dag la g-yas min gyis rgyu'o /
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo ni g-yas skor gyis 'khor te gza' rnams ni khyim dag la g-yas min gyis rgyu'o /
translated: Here, the zodiac moves in a rightward direction, but the planets move in a leftward direction in the zodiac.

original: ji ltar khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba de bzhin du sgra gcan yang nub tu mngon par phyogs nas ri rab la g-yas skor byed cing yang dag par rgyu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khyim gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba de bzhin du sgra gcan yang nub tu mngon par phyogs nas ri rab la g-yas skor byed cing yang dag par rgyu'o //
translated: Just as the zodiac moves, so RƒÅhu moves in a rightward direction around Meru facing west.

original: shar du phyogs pa'i gza' rnams ni lhun po la g-yas min du skor ba byed cing khyim gyi 'khor lo la yang dag par bgrod par byed do //
analyzed: shar du phyogs pa'i gza' rnams ni lhun po la g-yas min du skor ba byed cing khyim gyi 'khor lo la yang dag par bgrod par byed do //
translated: The planets moving toward the east move in a leftward direction around Meru and move in the zodiac.

original: de ltar na don dam pa'i rigs pas sgra gcan ni bsod nams dang ldan pa yin zhing nyi ma la sogs pa rnams ni gdug pa ste sdig pa'i gzar ba brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar na don dam pa'i rigs pas sgra gcan ni bsod nams dang ldan pa yin zhing nyi ma la sogs pa rnams ni gdug pa ste sdig pa'i gzar ba brjod do //
translated: Thus, by ultimate reasoning, RƒÅhu is meritorious and the sun and so on are wicked and sinful.

original: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang zhes pa ni chu tshod drug cu'i dus kyi yun la ste dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi grangs kyi dus la'o //
analyzed: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang zhes pa ni chu tshod drug cu'i dus kyi yun la ste dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi grangs kyi dus la'o //
translated: means at the time of sixty periods of time, that is, at the time of the number of twenty-one thousand and six hundred breaths.

original: me 'bum ste 'bum phrag gsum dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag ces pa ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'i dpag tshad kyi grangs 'khor te /
analyzed: me 'bum ste 'bum phrag gsum dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag ces pa ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga'i dpag tshad kyi grangs 'khor te /
translated: A hundred thousand fires, that is, three hundred thousand, five thousand, and seven thousand mountains, means the number of yojanas, that is, seventy-five thousand.üîΩIn days and nights,

original: nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu zhes pa ni nyin mtshan du'o //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu zhes pa ni nyin mtshan du'o //
translated: means in days and nights.

original: nyin dang mtshan mor 'go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mor 'go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de //
translated: In days and nights, half in the zodiac sign, half in the sky, fire, and water periods.

original: zhes pa ni 'dir nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la lngar brjod pa'i 'go la'i ri mo las mkha' me ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la lngar brjod pa'i 'go la'i ri mo las mkha' me ste /
translated: Here, in the day and night of the equinox, in the five statements, half in the zodiac sign from the zodiac sign, half in the sky, fire, and water periods.

original: sum cu'i chu tshod nyi mas nyin mo bgrod cing sum cu'i chu tshod mtshan mo bgrod de //
analyzed: sum cu'i chu tshod nyi mas nyin mo bgrod cing sum cu'i chu tshod mtshan mo bgrod de //
translated: Thirty periods of time are traversed by the sun in the day, and thirty periods of time are traversed in the night.

original: nyin mtshan mnyam mo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyin mtshan mnyam mo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that day and night are equal.

original: 'go la dag la g-yas dang ni g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste zhes pa ni 'go la'i phyed de las g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu ste g-yas su zla ba gsum gyis mtshan mo chu tshod lnga 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'go la dag la g-yas dang ni g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste zhes pa ni 'go la'i phyed de las g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu ste g-yas su zla ba gsum gyis mtshan mo chu tshod lnga 'phel lo //
translated: In the northern and southern courses, in the right and left directions, in the right direction, for three months, the night increases by one period of thirty minutes.

original: g-yas min du zla ba gsum gyis nyin mo chu tshod lnga 'phel lo ;
analyzed: g-yas min du zla ba gsum gyis nyin mo chu tshod lnga 'phel lo ;
translated: In the left direction, for three months, the day increases by one period of thirty minutes.

original: /'dir mtshan mo 'phel bas nyin mo 'grib pa dang nyin mo 'phel bas mtshan mo 'grib par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: /'dir mtshan mo 'phel bas nyin mo 'grib pa dang nyin mo 'phel bas mtshan mo 'grib par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the night increases, so the day decreases, and the day increases, so the night decreases.üîΩIn each day, it is three periods of thirty minutes.

original: nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum zhes pa ni 'dir g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu zla ba gsum po rnams kyi nyin zhag so so la nyin mo dang mtshan mo 'phel @195b ba'am 'grim pa ni dbugs gnyis dang chu srang gsum mo //
analyzed: nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum zhes pa ni 'dir g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu zla ba gsum po rnams kyi nyin zhag so so la nyin mo dang mtshan mo 'phel @195b ba'am 'grim pa ni dbugs gnyis dang chu srang gsum mo //
translated: In each day of the three months in the right and left directions, the increase or decrease of the day and night is two breaths and three periods of thirty minutes.

original: tshad 'di ni kee l'a sha'i dum bu la yin gyi 'phags pa'i yul la sogs pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad 'di ni kee l'a sha'i dum bu la yin gyi 'phags pa'i yul la sogs pa la ma yin no //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i yul du yang nyin mtshan so so la chu srang gnyis 'phel ba'am 'grib par shes par bya ste zla ba gsum gyis nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i dbus nyin mtshan gyi tshad sum cur mtshungs pa las bgrod pa'i dbang gis chu tshod gsum 'phel ba'am 'grib par rig
translated: In three months, the day and night are equal, with thirty muh≈´rtas each. Due to the movement, the gha·π≠ikƒÅs increase or decrease by three.

original: par bya'o // da ni kee l'a sha'i dum bu'i dbye bas dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'char ba'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: par bya'o // da ni kee l'a sha'i dum bu'i dbye bas dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'char ba'i dus gsungs pa /

original: lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur zhes pa ste /
analyzed: lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur zhes pa ste /
translated: In the muh≈´rta of Mesa, there are two gha·π≠ikƒÅs.

original: 'dir lug gi dus sbyor la dang po shar ba nas dus sbyor phyi ma 'char ba'i bar gyi dus la chu srang gi tshogs mkha' dgu lag ste zhes pa dgu bcu lhag pa'i nyis brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir lug gi dus sbyor la dang po shar ba nas dus sbyor phyi ma 'char ba'i bar gyi dus la chu srang gi tshogs mkha' dgu lag ste zhes pa dgu bcu lhag pa'i nyis brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, from the first rising of the muh≈´rta of Mesa until the rising of the next muh≈´rta, the time is the sum of the gha·π≠ikƒÅs, which is 200 plus 90.

original: 'di las drug cu'i chas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang lnga bcu ni lug gi dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so zhes pa ni kee l'a sha'i yul du nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las drug cu'i chas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang lnga bcu ni lug gi dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so zhes pa ni kee l'a sha'i yul du nges pa'o //
translated: Of these, four hours and fifty-five minutes are the time of the rising of the Aries ingress. This is certain in the land of KƒÅli·πÖga.

original: mkha' dus mig gi glang la 'gyur zhes pa ni de bzhin du glang gi dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus la chu srang gi tshogs nyis brgya drug cu ste chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu 'char ba'i dus su //
analyzed: mkha' dus mig gi glang la 'gyur zhes pa ni de bzhin du glang gi dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus la chu srang gi tshogs nyis brgya drug cu ste chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu 'char ba'i dus su //
translated: ‚ÄúThe sky, time, and the eye are the bull‚Äù means that in the same way, the time of the rising of the Taurus ingress is two hundred and sixty minutes, which is four hours and twenty minutes.

original: zung dag la yang mkha' gnyis te zhes pa ni zung ste 'khrig pa 'char ba'i dus chu srang gi tshogs nyis brgya ste chu tshod gsum dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
analyzed: zung dag la yang mkha' gnyis te zhes pa ni zung ste 'khrig pa 'char ba'i dus chu srang gi tshogs nyis brgya ste chu tshod gsum dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe pair also has two skies‚Äù means that the time of the rising of the Gemini ingress is two hundred minutes, which is three hours and twenty minutes.

original: mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur zhes pa ni mda' ste chu tshod lnga ni ku l'i ra ste ka rka ta 'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so //
analyzed: mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur zhes pa ni mda' ste chu tshod lnga ni ku l'i ra ste ka rka ta 'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe arrow is the time of Cancer‚Äù means that the time of the rising of the Cancer ingress is five hours, which is the time of the Karka·π≠aka.

original: de nas ro zhes pa chu tshod drug ni seng ge'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so //
analyzed: de nas ro zhes pa chu tshod drug ni seng ge'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus so //
translated: ‚ÄúThen the fish‚Äù means that the time of the rising of the Pisces ingress is six hours.

original: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste zhes pa ni bu mo'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus chu tshod drug dang chu srang sum cu ste phyed bcas drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste zhes pa ni bu mo'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus chu tshod drug dang chu srang sum cu ste phyed bcas drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: This means that for a woman, the time of the rising of the lunar mansion is six hours and thirty minutes, with a half.üîΩSince the order of Tula and so forth is not the same, all are like that.

original: srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur zhes pa ni dus sbyor drug gi dus kyi mtshams 'di nas srang la sogs pa'i dus sbyor phyi ma drug la rim pa min pas de bzhin te cho ga 'dis thams cad do ma lus pa 'gyur ro
analyzed: srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur zhes pa ni dus sbyor drug gi dus kyi mtshams 'di nas srang la sogs pa'i dus sbyor phyi ma drug la rim pa min pas de bzhin te cho ga 'dis thams cad do ma lus pa 'gyur ro
translated: This means that since the order of the six lunar mansions beginning with Tula is not the same as the six lunar mansions beginning with Mesa, all are like that, by this procedure.

original: // zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: // zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: This is a definite statement.

original: 'dir dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus ni srang la chu tshod drug dang chu srang sum cu'o //
analyzed: 'dir dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus ni srang la chu tshod drug dang chu srang sum cu'o //

original: sdig pa la drug go //üîΩgzhu la nga'o //
analyzed: sdig pa la drug go // gzhu la nga'o //
translated: For Vr≈õcika, it is six hours.

original: chu srin la chu tshod gsum dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
analyzed: chu srin la chu tshod gsum dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
translated: For Dhanus, it is three hours and twenty minutes.üîΩFor Makara, it is four hours and twenty minutes.

original: bum pa la chu tshod bzhi @196a * //
analyzed: bum pa la chu tshod bzhi @196a * //
translated: For Kumbha, it is four hours and twenty minutes.

original: dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
analyzed: dang chu srang nyi shu'o //
translated: For Mina, it is three hours and twenty minutes.

original: nya la chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang lnga bcu'o zhes pa ni kee l'a sha'i yul du nges pa'o //
analyzed: nya la chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang lnga bcu'o zhes pa ni kee l'a sha'i yul du nges pa'o //
translated: Four hours and fifty-five minutes is the definite [length of] a night in the land of KƒÅli·πÖga.üîΩThe six periods of the day and night are the same for the rising of the sun.

original: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin zhes pa ni gang gi phyir 'char ba yang dus sbyor drug gis yin pa de'i phyir de ni nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin zhes pa ni gang gi phyir 'char ba yang dus sbyor drug gis yin pa de'i phyir de ni nub par 'gyur ro //

original: nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so zhes pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum gyi mthar nub pa ste de bzhin du de 'char ba ni phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum gyi mthar ro //üîΩnyin mtshan gyi dbye bas dus sbyor drug dang skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis nyin mo'i dus su 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so zhes pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum gyi mthar nub pa ste de bzhin du de 'char ba ni phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gsum gyi mthar ro // nyin mtshan gyi dbye bas dus sbyor drug dang skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis nyin mo'i dus su 'gyur ro ;
translated: By the division of the lunar mansions of the sun, it sets at the end of the thirteen and a half lunar mansions. Likewise, its rising is at the end of the thirteen and a half lunar mansions.üîΩBy the division of day and night, the six periods of the day and night and the thirteen and a half lunar mansions are the day.

original: / dus sbyor drug dang skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis mtshan mo'i dus su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / dus sbyor drug dang skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis mtshan mo'i dus su 'gyur ro //
translated: The six periods of the day and night and the thirteen and a half lunar mansions are the night.

original: dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus kyi dbang gis nyin mo dang mtshan mo dman pa dang lhag par 'gyur te nyi ma yang dag par rgyu ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: dus sbyor 'char ba'i dus kyi dbang gis nyin mo dang mtshan mo dman pa dang lhag par 'gyur te nyi ma yang dag par rgyu ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: Day and night are short or long by the power of the rising of the ayanas, by the power of the sun's true movement.

original: da ni lus la dbu ma'i lo brgya'i nyin zhag dang dbugs la sogs pa gsungs pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni lus la dbu ma'i lo brgya'i nyin zhag dang dbugs la sogs pa gsungs pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ni stong phrag gcig lhag pa'i khri phrag gnyis so //

analyzed: ro brgya ldan pa dag ces pa ni drug brgya dang ldan pa'o //
translated: With a hundred tastes means with six hundred.

analyzed: so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa zhes pa ni phung po de las sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha dag gis nges par phyung ba'o //
translated: The part of the teeth is definitely extracted means that thirty-two parts are definitely extracted from that aggregate.

original: lus la ni lus la ste dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus dus sbyor gyi 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya'i grangs so //
analyzed: lus la ni lus la ste dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus dus sbyor gyi 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya'i grangs so //
translated: The body is the body itself, the breaths that occur at the time of each day and night, at the time of the twelve transits of the lunar mansions and the signs of the zodiac.

analyzed: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste /
translated: The number of breaths is 6,750, multiplied by thirty-six thousand, which is well known as the measure of a hundred years.

analyzed: dbugs de dag lo brgya'i nyin zhag stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis bsgyur ba de dag ni lo brgya'i dbugs kyi tshad du 'gyur ro //

translated: Here, the number of breaths in the three channels, 20,000 plus 16,000, multiplied by the days and nights of a hundred years, is 7,676,000,000.

analyzed: lhag ma 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gi dkyil 'khor lnga las 'bab ste cha mnyam par gyur pa las g-yon dang g-yas nas phyed la la n'a nas 'bab cing phyed
translated: The remaining 7,530,000 breaths flow from the five mandalas of lalanƒÅ and rasanƒÅ. Half of them flow from lalanƒÅ on the left and half from rasanƒÅ on the right.

original: ra sa n'a nas 'bab ste lo brgya'i mtshams kyi'o //
analyzed: ra sa n'a nas 'bab ste lo brgya'i mtshams kyi'o //
translated: This is the number of breaths in one hundred years.

original: stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur zhes pa ni dbugs kyi phung po de las sum brgya drug cus rab tu phye ba'i rnyed pa ni chu tshod kyi phung por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur zhes pa ni dbugs kyi phung po de las sum brgya drug cus rab tu phye ba'i rnyed pa ni chu tshod kyi phung por 'gyur ro //
translated: The total of 10,800,000 breaths divided by 360 is the number of breaths in one day.

analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang zhes pa ni chu tshod kyi phung po de las drug cu'i chas thob pa ni nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur te /
translated: From that mass of hours, a day and night is obtained by a sixty-part, which becomes a collection of days and nights.

analyzed: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug las dbu ma'i nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi grangs so //
translated: From thirty-six thousand, there are thirty-two hundred and fifty, plus eleven hundred.

analyzed: lhag ma'i nyin zhag gi tshogs brgya phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i khri phrag gsum ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gi lo brgya'i mtshams kyi yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The remaining collection of days and nights, which is forty-eight hundred and thirty-seven thousand, is the measure of one hundred years of LƒÅlana and RƒÅsa.

original: da ni gza' brgyad kyi lo brgya'i tshad 'khor lo phyed dang bcas pa la longs spyod pa'i phyir gcig tu bsdus pa nyid kyis dus kyi 'khor lo dang bral ba gsungs pa zla ba'i phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

translated: Now, in order to enjoy the measure of one hundred years of the eight planets in half a wheel, the time without the KƒÅlacakra is stated by the collection of one, the ‚Äúlunar part,‚Äù and so on.

original: zla ba'i phyogs te zhes pa ni zla ba'i phyogs gcig dbyug gu sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan mor 'gyur te khyim gyi 'khor lo phyed la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba'i phyogs te zhes pa ni zla ba'i phyogs gcig dbyug gu sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan mor 'gyur te khyim gyi 'khor lo phyed la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.üîΩThe lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.üîΩIn the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa zhes pa ni nyi ma'i bgrod pa nyid nyin mtshan phyed du 'gyur te 'khor lo phyed la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma'i bgrod pa zhes pa ni nyi ma'i bgrod pa nyid nyin mtshan phyed du 'gyur te 'khor lo phyed la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.üîΩIn the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.üîΩThe lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.

original: sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi mtshan mo'i zhes pa ni byed pa brjod par 'dod pas so //

original: de bzhin du bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.üîΩThe lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.üîΩIn the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.üîΩThe lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.üîΩIn the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.

analyzed: nyi ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du pa sangs kyi yang bgrod pa ste zla skyes gza' lag gi yang bgrod pa'o //
translated: Just as the sun, so also is Venus, and just as the moon, so also is Mercury.

analyzed: tshes zhes bya ba'i lo ni ste lo bcva lnga ni spen pa'i'o //
translated: The lunar side of the earth-born planets is night, because the author wishes to express that.üîΩIn the same way, the lunar side of the superior planets is night.üîΩJust as the sun, so also is Venus

original: mun can sgra gcan gyi ni lo dgu nyin mtshan phyed du 'gyur te rgyu skar phyed kyi 'khor lo nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo zhes pa /
analyzed: mun can sgra gcan gyi ni lo dgu nyin mtshan phyed du 'gyur te rgyu skar phyed kyi 'khor lo nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro // de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo zhes pa /
translated: The nine years of RƒÅhu, the dark one, are half a day and night, because it experiences half the wheel of the lunar mansions.

original: lo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum du 'gyur te sems can @197a * //
analyzed: lo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum du 'gyur te sems can @197a * //
translated: All of those added together are the years of the time of the transformation of the elements, which are thirty-two and a half years.

original: rnams kyi snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: rnams kyi snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi dbye bas so //
translated: Because of the division of the quality of sattva of sentient beings,üîΩthe half-day and night is divided into three parts by the division of sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas lo brgyar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo la nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas lo brgyar 'gyur te /
translated: The half-day and night is divided into three parts by the division of sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo dman no zhes pa ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyis dman pa ste gza' brgyad po rnams kyi gcig tu bsdus pa las phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu lhag pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo dman no zhes pa ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyis dman pa ste gza' brgyad po rnams kyi gcig tu bsdus pa las phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu lhag pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The Wheel of Time is inferior, that is, it is inferior by three years and three sides. From the combination of one of the eight planets, it is the sum of 96 years, with 10 months and a half.

original: 'dir srog gi snying stobs la 'bab ces pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba gsum lhag pa'i lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du sems can rnams kyi srog ni stobs la ste snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi 'bab bo //
analyzed: 'dir srog gi snying stobs la 'bab ces pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba gsum lhag pa'i lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du sems can rnams kyi srog ni stobs la ste snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi 'bab bo //
translated: Here, the life force falls on strength, that is, for 32 years, with 3 months and a half, the life force of sentient beings falls on strength, that is, the quality of sattva.

original: de'i 'og tu rdul gyi bar du tshad de nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rdul gyi bar du tshad de nyid kyis so //
translated: After that, it is measured up to rajas by the same amount.

original: de'i 'og tu mun pa la yang rim pa de nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu mun pa la yang rim pa de nyid kyis so //
translated: After that, it is also measured up to tamas by the same process.

original: lha mi lag 'gro rnams kyi rang rang gi lo brgya'i tshad las snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams kyi mtha'i mtshams de nas lnga pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha mi lag 'gro rnams kyi rang rang gi lo brgya'i tshad las snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams kyi mtha'i mtshams de nas lnga pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: From the measure of 100 human years, the measure of sattva, rajas and tamas of gods, humans and animals is five times that.

original: zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis zhes pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs gsum gyis te kyang zhes pa sngar gyi lo gsum gyis so //
analyzed: zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis zhes pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs gsum gyis te kyang zhes pa sngar gyi lo gsum gyis so //
translated: The half months and nights, by the three directions of the Wheel of Time, and also by the three years mentioned above.

original: 'dir 'khor ba pa rnams lnga pa nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir 'khor ba pa rnams lnga pa nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, transmigrators die at the age of five.

original: skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa dbang po brgya pa zhes pa'i tshig 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad las so //
analyzed: skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa dbang po brgya pa zhes pa'i tshig 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad las so //
translated: The one hundred years of a man, the one hundred faculties, are from the worldly convention.

original: don dam pa'i rigs pas ni nges pa med de sems can rnams kyi rang rang gi las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang 'gag par sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i rigs pas ni nges pa med de sems can rnams kyi rang rang gi las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang 'gag par sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: By the reasoning of the ultimate, there is no certainty, but one should understand that by the power of the individual karma of sentient beings, birth and cessation are realized by the Buddhas.

original: skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa dbang po brgya pa zhes pa ni dgongs pa'i skad de skyes bu ni phyi rol du dus bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi lo khri phrag gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbugs kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa dbang po brgya pa zhes pa ni dgongs pa'i skad de skyes bu ni phyi rol du dus bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi lo khri phrag gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbugs kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The one hundred years of a man, the one hundred faculties, is the intention language. Externally, a man is the characteristic of the breath, more than twenty thousand years, the nature of the four times, one hundred thousand.

original: nang du ni dbugs kyi tshad de nyid kyis dus bzhi'i bdag nyid de gang gi dus su gza' thams cad kyi rgyu ba stong pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ni don dam pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni dbugs kyi tshad de nyid kyis dus bzhi'i bdag nyid de gang gi dus su gza' thams cad kyi rgyu ba stong pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ni don dam pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: Internally, by the very measure of the breath, the nature of the four times, in whatever time all the movements of the planets enter into emptiness. This is the ultimate reasoning.

original: sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis kyang tshe dman pa dang / lhag par 'gyur zhing tshe lo brgya pa zhes bya ba'i nges pa med de /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis kyang tshe dman pa dang / lhag par 'gyur zhing tshe lo brgya pa zhes bya ba'i nges pa med de /
translated: By the power of the virtue and nonvirtue of sentient beings, life becomes short or long, and there is no certainty called ‚Äúa hundred years.‚Äù

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the speech of the TathƒÅgata.

original: grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag @197b rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag @197b rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no //
translated: These very certain numbers are well known in the KƒÅlacakra Tantra.

original: mi yi dbang zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje zla ba bzang po la bod pa'o //
analyzed: mi yi dbang zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje zla ba bzang po la bod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLord of men‚Äù is VajrapƒÅ·πái, who is addressed by Sucandra.

original: da ni dbu ma aa ba dh'u t'i drug cu'i cha'i chu tshod rnams gza' lnga rgyu skar la 'char ba'i rkang pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs su gsungs pa ma bcad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni dbu ma aa ba dh'u t'i drug cu'i cha'i chu tshod rnams gza' lnga rgyu skar la 'char ba'i rkang pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs su gsungs pa ma bcad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the hours of the sixty parts of the central channel are said to be the collection of foot hours of the five planets rising in the nak·π£atras.

original: ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi nyin zhag ma bcad pa ste /
analyzed: ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi nyin zhag ma bcad pa ste /
translated: The unseparated wheel of time is the unseparated days of three years and three half months.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi bgrod pa dag la /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi bgrod pa dag la /
translated: In the course of eleven hundred twenty-five,

original: bu lon dgu ni mngal gyi zla ba dgu'i bu lon chu tshod dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams te chu tshod kyi tshogs sum cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi grangs rnams ni bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyi
analyzed: bu lon dgu ni mngal gyi zla ba dgu'i bu lon chu tshod dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams te chu tshod kyi tshogs sum cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi grangs rnams ni bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyi
translated: the nine debts are the nine debts of the nine months of pregnancy. The nine hours are the nine hours of the nine months of pregnancy. All of these are added together. The collection of hours is the number of eleven hundred thirty-four.üîΩThe five planets, beginning with B·πõhaspati,

original: myur ba'i las te /
analyzed: myur ba'i las te /
translated: are the swift actions.

original: skar ma'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar ma'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod du 'gyur ro //
translated: The actions of the stars are also foot hours.

original: sa skyes la ni rig byed dus me zhes pa de dag las bkra shis la chu tshod kyi tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i sum brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa skyes la ni rig byed dus me zhes pa de dag las bkra shis la chu tshod kyi tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i sum brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: For those born in Jambudvipa, the time of the Vedas is the time of the fire. From those, the auspicious time is the number of three hundred and sixty-four hours.

original: srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la zhes pa ni rkang pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la ste skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la zhes pa ni rkang pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la ste skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the abodes of existence means in the fourteen abodes of the feet, because one enjoys the thirteen and a half stars.

original: rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the division of movement means by the division of twenty-four and so on.

original: snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par phyed snga ma la rgyu skar gyi rkang pa'i dbang gis brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis dang phyed phyi ma la brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis te rgyu skar rnams kyi phyed phyed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par phyed snga ma la rgyu skar gyi rkang pa'i dbang gis brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis dang phyed phyi ma la brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis te rgyu skar rnams kyi phyed phyed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the earlier and later half, the earlier half has one hundred and eighty-two by the power of the feet of the stars, and the later half has one hundred and eighty-two, because they are the half of the stars.

original: bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag la zhes pa ni rim pa min pas bu lon gyi bgrod pa dang / rim pas nor gyi bgrod pa rnams la gnas kyi dbye ba nges par sbyar te /
analyzed: bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag la zhes pa ni rim pa min pas bu lon gyi bgrod pa dang / rim pas nor gyi bgrod pa rnams la gnas kyi dbye ba nges par sbyar te /
translated: The text says, ‚Äúin the movement of debt and wealth,‚Äù meaning that the movement of debt is irregular and the movement of wealth is regular.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la shar ba'i skar ma ni gnas dang po'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la shar ba'i skar ma ni gnas dang po'o //
translated: The stars that rise in the orb of the sun are in the first house.

original: gnas kyi dbye ba de las gzhan dang gnas bcu bzhi ste /
analyzed: gnas kyi dbye ba de las gzhan dang gnas bcu bzhi ste /
translated: The other houses are the other fourteen houses.

original: gnas kyi dbye ba de dag gis chu tshod de dag nges par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnas kyi dbye ba de dag gis chu tshod de dag nges par sbyar ro //
translated: The hours are determined by the divisions of the houses.

original: dang por rgyal dbang grangs te /
analyzed: dang por rgyal dbang grangs te /
translated: First, the number of the lords of the houses.

original: rgyu skar dang po spyad pa'i gnas la nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar dang po spyad pa'i gnas la nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: In the first house, the house of Aries, there are twenty-four.

original: me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu rab tu 'gyur /
translated: The sun, Mars, and Venus are in three houses.

original: dang po'i gnas nas gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nyi shu rtsa gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dang po'i gnas nas gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nyi shu rtsa gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: From the first house, in the second, third, and fourth houses, there are twenty-three.

original: rnam gsum zhes so //
analyzed: rnam gsum zhes so //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúin three houses.‚Äù

original: gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste /
analyzed: gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste /
translated: In the second house, there is one, and in the third house, Venus.

original: @198a * // gnas bzhi pa de nas lnga pa dang drug pa'i gnas la nyi shu rtsa gcig ste /
analyzed: @198a * // gnas bzhi pa de nas lnga pa dang drug pa'i gnas la nyi shu rtsa gcig ste /
translated: From the fourth place, there are twenty-one in the fifth and sixth places.

original: gnas gnyis zhes so //
analyzed: gnas gnyis zhes so //
translated: Two places.

original: bcva brgyad tshes dang drag po gnas drug pa de nas bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa'i gnas rnams la grangs bzhin du bcva brgyad dang / tshes zhes pa bcva lnga dang drag po zhes pa bcu gcig go //
analyzed: bcva brgyad tshes dang drag po gnas drug pa de nas bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa'i gnas rnams la grangs bzhin du bcva brgyad dang / tshes zhes pa bcva lnga dang drag po zhes pa bcu gcig go //
translated: From the sixth place, there are eighteen in the seventh place, fifteen in the eighth place, and eleven in the ninth place.üîΩFire, root, and Rudra.

original: me dang rtsa bar drag po dang / gnas dgu pa de nas gnas bcu pa la me zhes pa rkang pa gsum mo //
analyzed: me dang rtsa bar drag po dang / gnas dgu pa de nas gnas bcu pa la me zhes pa rkang pa gsum mo //
translated: From the ninth place, there are three in the tenth place.

original: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma ste /
analyzed: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma ste /
translated: Then, the latter half of the root.

original: phyed phyi ma gnas bcu gcig par drag po ste bcu gcig go //üîΩsum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang / bcu gnyis pa la sum cu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma gnas bcu gcig par drag po ste bcu gcig go // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang / bcu gnyis pa la sum cu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: The latter half is in the eleventh place, Rudra, making eleven.üîΩThirty-eight, eighty, and twelve.üîΩIn the twelfth place, there are thirty-eight.

original: bcu gsum pa la brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la brgyad cu'o //
translated: In the thirteenth place, there are eighty.

original: brtan pa srid pa'i gnas zhes pa gnas bcu bzhi pa la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o zhes pa la gsum dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ni gsum bcas lnga bcu ste /
analyzed: brtan pa srid pa'i gnas zhes pa gnas bcu bzhi pa la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o zhes pa la gsum dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ni gsum bcas lnga bcu ste /
translated: The fourth abode is called ‚Äúfirm,‚Äù and the fifth is called ‚Äúabode of existence.‚Äù

original: lnga bcu rtsa gsum ni gnas bcu bzhi pa 'di la nges pa'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gsum ni gnas bcu bzhi pa 'di la nges pa'o //
translated: The fourth abode is called ‚Äúfirm,‚Äù and the fifth is called ‚Äúabode of existence.‚Äù

original: rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo phyed po de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur pa'i rjes la rim pa min pas bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo phyed po de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur pa'i rjes la rim pa min pas bu lon du 'gyur ro //
translated: The first half of the zodiac wheel is the pure sun. After that, the order is reversed, and it becomes a debt.

original: rim pas nor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pas nor du 'gyur ro //
translated: In order, it becomes wealth.

original: mig dmar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod la bu lon dor bar bya zhing nor sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: mig dmar la sogs pa'i skar ma'i longs spyod la bu lon dor bar bya zhing nor sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the stars such as Mars and so on is to be discarded as a debt and given as wealth.

original: rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur zhes pa ni /üîΩ'dir gza' lag gi chu tshod kyi tshogs brgya dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur zhes pa ni / 'dir gza' lag gi chu tshod kyi tshogs brgya dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: The number of lunar days in the Vedas and the holes is the hours of Jupiter‚Äôs swift activity.üîΩHere, the collection of Jupiter‚Äôs hours is 194.

original: bkra shis kyi rang gi chu tshod kyi tshogs rnams gnas bcu bzhi la /
analyzed: bkra shis kyi rang gi chu tshod kyi tshogs rnams gnas bcu bzhi la /
translated: The collections of the hours of each of the four lunar mansions are in the fourteen abodes.

original: ji lta ba de bzhin du gza' lag gi yang rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba de bzhin du gza' lag gi yang rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Just as it is for the sun, so it is for Mars.

original: myur ba'i las zhes pa rgyu skar gyi las la'o //
analyzed: myur ba'i las zhes pa rgyu skar gyi las la'o //
translated: The ‚Äúswift action‚Äù is the action of the stars.

original: gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug ces pa ni gnas dang po la bcu drug ste /
analyzed: gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug ces pa ni gnas dang po la bcu drug ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn two places, sixteen‚Äù means that in the first place there are sixteen.

original: gnas gnyis pa la yang bcu drug go //
analyzed: gnas gnyis pa la yang bcu drug go //
translated: In the second place there are also sixteen.

original: gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed ces pa ni gsum pa la bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed ces pa ni gsum pa la bcva lnga'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the other, the lunar day, and Manu, intoxicating,‚Äù means that in the third there are twenty-five.

original: bzhi pa la bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la bcu bzhi'o //
translated: In the fourth there are fourteen.

original: lnga pa la bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: lnga pa la bcu gsum mo //
translated: In the fifth there are thirteen.

original: drag po ri dang dbang po mkha' //
analyzed: drag po ri dang dbang po mkha' //
translated: ‚ÄúRudra, mountain, and Indra, space,‚Äù

original: drug pa la bcu gcig go //
analyzed: drug pa la bcu gcig go //
translated: in the sixth there are eleven.

original: bdun pa la bdun no //
analyzed: bdun pa la bdun no //
translated: In the seventh there are seven.

original: brgyad pa la lnga'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la lnga'o //
translated: In the eighth there are five.

original: dgu pa la stong pa'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la stong pa'o //
translated: In the ninth there is zero.

original: rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the roots, the Veda, Rudra, and so on,‚Äù

original: gnas dgu pa de nas @198b rtsa bar phyed phyi ma ste /
analyzed: gnas dgu pa de nas @198b rtsa bar phyed phyi ma ste /
translated: means that from the ninth place, the second half of the root,

original: gnas bcu pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnas bcu pa la bzhi'o //
translated: in the tenth place there are four.

original: bcu gcig pa la bcu gcig go //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la bcu gcig go //
translated: In the eleventh there are eleven.

original: bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu'o //
translated: In the twelfth there are twenty.

original: bcu gsum pa la nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: In the thirteenth there are twenty-eight.

original: bcu bzhi pa la yang sum cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la yang sum cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Also, thirty-four should be placed on the fourteenth.

analyzed: de ltar na go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gza' lag gi chu tshod rnams rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag par gnas par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the nak·π£atras should be known to be arranged in order by the divisions of the movement of the lunar mansions.

analyzed: chu gter nam mkha' dag dang / zla ba'i grangs brgya rtsa bzhi ni bla ma'i chu tshod kyi tshogs te /
translated: The four hundred and ninety-two lunar mansions are the collection of the teacher‚Äôs muh≈´rtas.üîΩThe divisions of the movement are divided into fourteen abodes. In the collection of muh≈´rtas, in two abodes there are twelve muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are eleven muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are ten muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are nine muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are eight muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are seven muh≈´rtas each, in two abodes there are six muh≈´rtas each, in one abode there are five muh≈´rtas, in one abode there are four muh≈´rtas, in one abode there are three muh≈´rtas, in one abode there are two muh≈´rtas, and in one abode there is one muh≈´rtas.

analyzed: rgyu ba'i dbye bas rnam par phye ba dag gnas bcu bzhi la 'gyur ba ni chu tshod kyi tshogs de las gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang / gnas dang po la bcu ste /
