analyzed: dgu nor dus zhes pa ni gsum pa la dgu'o //
translated: In the third there are nine.

original: bzhi pa la brgyad do //
analyzed: bzhi pa la brgyad do //
translated: In the fourth there are eight.

original: lnga pa la drug go //üîΩdrug lag pa zla ba dag dang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lnga pa la drug go // drug lag pa zla ba dag dang zhes pa ni /
translated: In the fifth there are six.

original: drug pa la drug go //
analyzed: drug pa la drug go //
translated: In the sixth there are six.

original: bdun pa la gnyis so //
analyzed: bdun pa la gnyis so //
translated: In the seventh there are two.

original: brgyad pa la gcig go //
analyzed: brgyad pa la gcig go //
translated: In the eighth there is one.

original: rtsa bar ni phyed phyi ma la me drug bug pa dang ni drag po zhes pa ni dgu pa la gsum mo //
analyzed: rtsa bar ni phyed phyi ma la me drug bug pa dang ni drag po zhes pa ni dgu pa la gsum mo //
translated: In the root [text] it is said, In the latter half, six [planets] move in the fire [signs], and in the ninth [sign], three [move] in the [sign] of RƒÅhu.

original: bcu pa la drug go //
analyzed: bcu pa la drug go //
translated: In the tenth [sign], six [move].

original: bcu gcig pa la dgu'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la dgu'o //
translated: In the eleventh [sign], nine [move].

original: bcu gnyis pa la bcu gcig go //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la bcu gcig go //
translated: In the twelfth [sign], eleven [move].

original: mi bdag thub pa rnams te zhes pa ni bcu gsum pa la bcu drug go //
analyzed: mi bdag thub pa rnams te zhes pa ni bcu gsum pa la bcu drug go //
translated: The lords of men [move] in the thirteenth [sign], sixteen [move].

original: gnas bcu bzhi pa la bdun no //
analyzed: gnas bcu bzhi pa la bdun no //
translated: In the fourteenth [sign], seven [move].

original: rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so zhes pa ni /
translated: All the movements are in order.

original: de ltar bza' thams cad kyi rkang pa'i chu tshod rnams thams cad go rims ji lta bas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bza' thams cad kyi rkang pa'i chu tshod rnams thams cad go rims ji lta bas rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, all the ghatis of the feet of all the [planets] should be known in order.

original: myur zhes pa ni myur ba'i rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: myur zhes pa ni myur ba'i rgyu ba ste /
translated: Swift is the swift movement,

original: gza' shar ba'i phyed snga ma la'o //
analyzed: gza' shar ba'i phyed snga ma la'o //
translated: in the first half of the rising of the planets.

original: dal ba yang phyed phyi ma la'o //
analyzed: dal ba yang phyed phyi ma la'o //
translated: Slow is in the second half.

original: 'khyog po ni rim pa min pas phyed snga ma la'o //
analyzed: 'khyog po ni rim pa min pas phyed snga ma la'o //
translated: Bent is in the first half, not in order.

original: yang yig gis 'byung ba ni rim pa min pa'i phyed phyi ma la'o //
analyzed: yang yig gis 'byung ba ni rim pa min pa'i phyed phyi ma la'o //
translated: Again is in the second half, not in order.

original: gza'i tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis te /
analyzed: gza'i tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis te /
translated: The group of planets is definitely by the divisions of the sun.

original: nyi ma las rnam par dag pa'i dbye bas rgyu bar byed do //
analyzed: nyi ma las rnam par dag pa'i dbye bas rgyu bar byed do //
translated: It moves by the division of the pure nature of the sun.

original: drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs zhes pa ni bzhi brgya bcu drug gi tshogs te /
analyzed: drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs zhes pa ni bzhi brgya bcu drug gi tshogs te /
translated: The six, the moon, the ocean, and the number are the collection of 480.

original: 'di dag ni pa sangs te dkar po'i gnas bcu bzhi la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag ni pa sangs te dkar po'i gnas bcu bzhi la 'gyur ro //
translated: These are the white lunar mansions.üîΩFrom that, the hours are twenty-five in three places.

original: de las chu tshod rnams gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste zhes pa ni dang po'i gnas la nyi shu lnga ste /
analyzed: de las chu tshod rnams gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste zhes pa ni dang po'i gnas la nyi shu lnga ste /
translated: Twenty-five in the first place,

original: gnyis pa dang / gsum pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: gnyis pa dang / gsum pa la yang ngo //
translated: and also in the second and third.

original: gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang / @199a * //
analyzed: gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang / @199a * //
translated: Two are the Victorious.

original: bzhi pa la nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste lnga la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa la nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste lnga la yang de bzhin no //
translated: In the fourth, twenty-four, and also in the fifth.

original: lag mig rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni drug pa la nyi shu rtsa gnyis te bdun pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: lag mig rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni drug pa la nyi shu rtsa gnyis te bdun pa la yang ngo //
translated: Two, hand and eye, are twenty-two in the sixth, and also in the seventh.üîΩFault, lunar day, and eight.

original: skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de zhes pa ni brgyad pa la bcva brgyad do //
analyzed: skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de zhes pa ni brgyad pa la bcva brgyad do //
translated: In the eighth, thirty-eight.

original: dgu pa la bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la bcva lnga'o //
translated: In the ninth, thirty-five.

original: bcu pa la brgyad do //
analyzed: bcu pa la brgyad do //
translated: In the tenth, eight.

original: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma la drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang zhes pa ni bcu gcig pa la drug go //
analyzed: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma la drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang zhes pa ni bcu gcig pa la drug go //
translated: Then, in the second half of the root [text], the six and the number of the qualities of space are the six in the eleventh [place].

original: bcu gnyis pa la sum cu'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la sum cu'o //
translated: In the twelfth [place] there are thirty.

original: bcu gsum pa la gcig gis dman pa'i brgya'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la gcig gis dman pa'i brgya'o //
translated: In the thirteenth [place] there are ninety-nine.

original: mthar bcu bzhi pa la me dang ri yi grangs zhes pa bdun cu rtsa gsum mo //
analyzed: mthar bcu bzhi pa la me dang ri yi grangs zhes pa bdun cu rtsa gsum mo //
translated: At the end, in the fourteenth [place], the number of fire and mountains are seventy-three.

original: brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la ste gnas bcu bzhi la pa sangs kyi rgyu ba rim pas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la ste gnas bcu bzhi la pa sangs kyi rgyu ba rim pas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The movement of the planets in the fourteen abodes of existence should be understood in order.

original: nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs /
analyzed: nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs /
translated: The six and the number of the elements in the son of the sun

original: spen pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la chu tshod kyi tshogs lnga bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spen pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la chu tshod kyi tshogs lnga bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: [means] in the fourteen abodes of Saturn there are fifty-six groups of hours.

original: de las drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba rig byed ces pa ni gnas dang po la drug go /
analyzed: de las drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba rig byed ces pa ni gnas dang po la drug go /
translated: The six and the elements, and the elements to be known are the six in the first abode.

original: gnyis pa la lnga ste gsum pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: gnyis pa la lnga ste gsum pa la yang ngo //
translated: In the second [abode] there are five, and in the third [abode] as well.

original: bzhi pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la bzhi'o //
translated: In the fourth [abode] there are four.

original: chu gter mig dang zhes pa ni lnga pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: chu gter mig dang zhes pa ni lnga pa la bzhi'o //
translated: The eye of the ocean are the four in the fifth [abode].

original: drug pa la gnyis so //
analyzed: drug pa la gnyis so //
translated: In the sixth [abode] there are two.

original: bdun pa zung zhes pa gnyis so //
analyzed: bdun pa zung zhes pa gnyis so //
translated: The seventh is called the pair, which is two.

original: brgyad pa la stong pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la stong pa'o //
translated: The eighth is called the empty.

original: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma la phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba zhes pa ni dgu pa la gnyis so //
analyzed: de nas rtsa bar phyed phyi ma la phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba zhes pa ni dgu pa la gnyis so //
translated: Then, in the second half of the root, the directions, the Vedas, and the elements are the ninth, which is two.

original: bcu pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la bzhi'o //
translated: The tenth is four.

original: bcu gcig pa la lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la lnga'o //
translated: The eleventh is five.

original: ro dang nor dang rtse mo can zhes pa ni bcu gnyis pa la drug go //
analyzed: ro dang nor dang rtse mo can zhes pa ni bcu gnyis pa la drug go //
translated: Taste, wealth, and crest are the twelfth, which is six.

original: bcu gsum pa la brgyad do //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la brgyad do //
translated: The thirteenth is eight.

original: bcu bzhi pa la chu tshod gsum ste spen pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la rim pas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la chu tshod gsum ste spen pa'i gnas bcu bzhi la rim pas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The fourteenth is three hours. The houses of Saturn should be placed in order.

original: de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur zhes pa ni dbu ma'i lo brgya'i dbugs kyi 'khor lo la dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ste gza' rnams 'char ba'i rgyu ba'i chu tshod kyi longs spyod
analyzed: de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur zhes pa ni dbu ma'i lo brgya'i dbugs kyi 'khor lo la dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ste gza' rnams 'char ba'i rgyu ba'i chu tshod kyi longs spyod
translated: Thus, the entire motion of the planets is very well ascertained from the wheels of time. The wheel of breath in one hundred years of the central [channel] is called the wheel of time. The enjoyment of the hours of the rising motion of the planets

original: do // da ni dal ba'i bya ba la skye ba'i khyim gyi chu tshod dal ba'i rkang pa rnams gsungs pa sum cu rtsa drug ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: do // da ni dal ba'i bya ba la skye ba'i khyim gyi chu tshod dal ba'i rkang pa rnams gsungs pa sum cu rtsa drug ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the slow feet of the house of the sign of the ascendant are stated, thirty-six, etc.üîΩ

original: sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba ni lo gsum gyi zla ba sum cu rtsa drug dang phyogs gsum las phyogs gcig bzung ba ste nges par zhes pa gdon mi za bar ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba ni lo gsum gyi zla ba sum cu rtsa drug dang phyogs gsum las phyogs gcig bzung ba ste nges par zhes pa gdon mi za bar ro //
translated: Now, the slow feet of the slow motion of the houses in the nativity are stated, thirty-six and a half months are a year, and the thirty-six months of three years, taking one third of the three parts, are definitely twelve.üîΩThe slow motion of the five planets is transformed by the eight qualities.üîΩThe slow motion of the five planets is transformed by the eight qualities, sound, touch, form, taste, smell, sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ces pa la sgra dang reg dang gzugs dang ro dang dri dang snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ni yon @199b tan brgyad de yon tan brgyad po 'di dag gis bsgyur ba dag ni gza' lnga po rnams kyi dal ba'i bya baüîΩla rkang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ces pa la sgra dang reg dang gzugs dang ro dang dri dang snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ni yon @199b tan brgyad de yon tan brgyad po 'di dag gis bsgyur ba dag ni gza' lnga po rnams kyi dal ba'i bya ba la rkang par 'gyur ro //
translated: The slow motion of the five planets is transformed by these eight qualities.

original: mig bug mig gi grangs ni khyim gyi chu tshod gnyis brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig bug mig gi grangs ni khyim gyi chu tshod gnyis brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The number of eyes in the eye sockets is the number of two hundred ninety-two house hours.

original: de las rab tu gsal bar bkra shis la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas drug gi phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi ma la rim pa dang rim pa min pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de las rab tu gsal bar bkra shis la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas drug gi phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi ma la rim pa dang rim pa min pas shes par bya'o //
translated: From that, the auspiciousness, etc. , should be known in the first and second half of the six houses, respectively, by the order and reverse order.

original: de nyid bcva brgyad ri dag brtan pa sa yi bu yi phyi ma phyed dang snga ma'i cha la ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcva brgyad ri dag brtan pa sa yi bu yi phyi ma phyed dang snga ma'i cha la ste /
translated: That itself is in the eighteen mountains, in the second and first half of the son of the earth.

original: de bzhin du phyogs ri me ni gza' lag gi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs ri me ni gza' lag gi'o //
translated: In the same way, the direction is in the fire of the moon.

original: de bzhin du dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dang gzhan gyi cha la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dang gzhan gyi cha la yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, the nine lords are in the first and second half of the guru.

original: de bzhin du dkar po'i mda' dang chu gter zla ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dkar po'i mda' dang chu gter zla ba'o //
translated: In the same way, the white arrow and the ocean are the moon.

original: de bzhin du spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur te rim pa 'di ni sngar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur te rim pa 'di ni sngar brjod pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the eyes of Saturn are in the eyes, at the time of the day. This order was stated before.

original: de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo zla ba'i yongs su longs spyod pa brgyad kyis bsgyur ba las drug cu'i cha shas ni khyim gyi rkang pa'i chu tshod du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo zla ba'i yongs su longs spyod pa brgyad kyis bsgyur ba las drug cu'i cha shas ni khyim gyi rkang pa'i chu tshod du rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, from the transformation of the ecliptic by the eight parvas of the moon, the sixty parts are to be known as the hours of the houses.

original: da ni zla ba zhes pa la sogs pas bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga rnams kyi khyim gsum yongs su longs spyod pa las lo gsum gyi nyin zhag dang mtshungs pa'i chu tshod yongs su longs spyod par gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni zla ba zhes pa la sogs pas bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga rnams kyi khyim gsum yongs su longs spyod pa las lo gsum gyi nyin zhag dang mtshungs pa'i chu tshod yongs su longs spyod par gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the five planets such as Mercury, beginning with the moon, enjoy three houses, and enjoy 900 hours equal to three years.

original: zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste zhes pa ni 'jig rten la grags pa ste rang gi ngo bos ni dkyil 'khor gyi chas thob pa'i chu tshod rnams 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste zhes pa ni 'jig rten la grags pa ste rang gi ngo bos ni dkyil 'khor gyi chas thob pa'i chu tshod rnams 'gyur ro //
translated: The moon enjoys 90 hours born from the earth. This is known in the world. By its nature, the hours obtained by the parts of the orb change.

original: zla bar yang phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag sum cus 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla bar yang phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag sum cus 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, the moon changes by 30 half-days.

original: grub pa'i mtha'i tshad des phur bu dang spen pa'i longs spyod dang lhan cig nyi ma la rnam par sbyong ba gsum po rnams kyi chu tshod dgu bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i tshad des phur bu dang spen pa'i longs spyod dang lhan cig nyi ma la rnam par sbyong ba gsum po rnams kyi chu tshod dgu bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: By that measure of the conclusion, the 90 hours of Jupiter and Saturn together with the sun's enjoyment are purified in three ways.

original: zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: This is the conclusion.

original: lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs pa sangs rgyas kyi ste mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs pa sangs rgyas kyi ste mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: If one says that the number of worldly months of the five planets is the same as the Buddha's, it is not correct.

original: grub pa'i mtha' tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the tenets are valid.

original: gang gi phyir nyi ma'i longs spyod kyis pa sangs la rnam pa sbyangs pa las pa sangs su 'gyur ba des na pa sangs kyi zla ba'i longs spyod kyi chu tshod kyi tshogs ni brgya sum cu rtsa lnga ste gza' lag gi yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyi ma'i longs spyod kyis pa sangs la rnam pa sbyangs pa las pa sangs su 'gyur ba des na pa sangs kyi zla ba'i longs spyod kyi chu tshod kyi tshogs ni brgya sum cu rtsa lnga ste gza' lag gi yang de bzhin no //
translated: Since the sun's enjoyment of the moon purifies the moon, the moon becomes full. Therefore, the total of the moon's hours of enjoyment is 135. The same is true for Mars.

original: de dag gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro bsreg za ste lnga po rnams kyi chu tshod kyi tshogs sum brgya drug cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro bsreg za ste lnga po rnams kyi chu tshod kyi tshogs sum brgya drug cur 'gyur ro //
translated: The total of those is 360 hours.

original: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo'i nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod de chu @200a * //
analyzed: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo'i nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod de chu @200a * //
translated: Those are the three months of the year.

original: tshod stong brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: tshod stong brgyad cu'o //
translated: The total of the hours is 1,800.üîΩThis is the enjoyment of the three.

original: longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi 'o zhes pa ni 'jam dpal gyis tshig zur gyis grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi 'o zhes pa ni 'jam dpal gyis tshig zur gyis grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the tenet stated by Manjushri in a verse.

original: zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa nyams par bya ba'i don du tshig zur gyi don gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa nyams par bya ba'i don du tshig zur gyi don gsungs pa'o //
translated: The verse on the tenet the moon is the enjoyment of the guru and so forth is stated for the purpose of undermining worldly renown.

original: 'dir phyogs gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni mjug rings 'char ba'i longs spyod dang 'brel bar gza' lnga rnams kyi rtsa ba'i grub pa'i mtha' las gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir phyogs gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni mjug rings 'char ba'i longs spyod dang 'brel bar gza' lnga rnams kyi rtsa ba'i grub pa'i mtha' las gsungs so //
translated: Here, whatever the three positions are, they are related to the enjoyment of the rising node, and the five planets are stated in the basic tenet.

original: de'i phyir de dag phur bu dang spen pa'i longs spyod la sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag phur bu dang spen pa'i longs spyod la sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they should not be applied to the enjoyment of Mercury and Saturn.

original: da ni sgra gcan gyi longs spyod las mjug rings kyi longs spyod gsungs pa zla gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sgra gcan gyi longs spyod las mjug rings kyi longs spyod gsungs pa zla gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the enjoyment of the ascending node is stated from the enjoyment of RƒÅhu, beginning with the verse one month and so forth.

original: 'dir sngar gyi dal ba'i bya ba la zla ba phyed dang bcas pa'i sum cu rtsa drug gi lhag ma'i zla ba gang zhig gza' rnams kyis ma spyad pa'i zla ba de nyid yon tan brgyad kyis bsgyur te de las drug cu'i chas chu tshod brgyad gzung bar
analyzed: 'dir sngar gyi dal ba'i bya ba la zla ba phyed dang bcas pa'i sum cu rtsa drug gi lhag ma'i zla ba gang zhig gza' rnams kyis ma spyad pa'i zla ba de nyid yon tan brgyad kyis bsgyur te de las drug cu'i chas chu tshod brgyad gzung bar
translated: Here, the remaining months, thirty-six less the previous half month of activity, are the months not used by the planets. Those months are multiplied by eight and from that the eight hours are taken by the sixty-fourth part.

original: bya'o // de dag las chu tshod phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun ni sgra gcan gyi longs spyod de 'di nyid la zhes pa ni nyi ma'i zla ba'i tshad la'o //
analyzed: bya'o // de dag las chu tshod phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun ni sgra gcan gyi longs spyod de 'di nyid la zhes pa ni nyi ma'i zla ba'i tshad la'o //
translated: From those, seven and a half hours are RƒÅhu‚Äôs enjoyment. This itself is the measure of the sun and moon.

original: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa zhes pa ni nyi ma'i snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ste rkang pa gsum mo //
analyzed: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa zhes pa ni nyi ma'i snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ste rkang pa gsum mo //
translated: RƒÅhu‚Äôs enjoyment of the moon together with the sun is the three feet of the moon.

original: zla ba'i dri dang ro dang gzugs dang reg dang sgra'i yon tan te rkang pa lnga'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dri dang ro dang gzugs dang reg dang sgra'i yon tan te rkang pa lnga'o //
translated: The qualities of the moon are smell, taste, form, touch, and sound, which are the five feet.

original: rkang pa brgyad po 'di dag ni sgra gcan gyi chu tshod phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad po 'di dag ni sgra gcan gyi chu tshod phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: These eight feet are of the nature of the seven and a half ghatis of Rahu.

original: lhag ma chu tshod phyed ni mun pa med pa'i rang bzhin te des dman pa ni chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma chu tshod phyed ni mun pa med pa'i rang bzhin te des dman pa ni chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman pa'o //
translated: The remaining half ghatis are of the nature of Tamas, and the deficiency is the deficiency of a half ghatis.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum /
analyzed: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum /
translated: In the first solar revolution, there are three.

original: chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i phyogs dang po la chu tshod gsum ste snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i bdag nyid nor gyi longs spyod do //
analyzed: chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i phyogs dang po la chu tshod gsum ste snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i bdag nyid nor gyi longs spyod do //
translated: In the first part of the revolution of Capricorn, there are three ghatis, which are of the nature of sattva, rajas, and tamas, and are the enjoyment of wealth.

analyzed: de bzhin du ka rka ta'i phyogs dang po la bu lon gyi longs spyod do //
translated: Similarly, in the first part of Cancer, there is the enjoyment of debt.

original: zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zhes pa ni tshogs kyi gnas su bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma nyin zhag dang po ste rkang pa dang po 'am bcu gsum pa la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga ste yon tan lnga'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //

translated: In the days of the intoxicated moon, the first day is the remainder of the fourteenth part in the place of the assembly, and in the first or thirteenth foot, there are five ghatis of the moon, which become of the nature of the five qualities.

original: gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod ces pa ni sgra gcan gyis ma spyad pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod ces pa ni sgra gcan gyis ma spyad pa'o //

translated: The day of the season is in the season. In sixty-four days, that is the inferior part of the month. The meaning is that the part of the month is diminished.

original: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nyi ma'i chu tshod gnyis su gyur nas nyin zhag so sor lhag ste dus kyis bsgyur ba rig byed rnams kyis tshes grangs bsgyur zhes pa la sogs pas so //

translated: That is the excess of the sun. Having become two solar hours, it is the excess in each day. The days are transformed by the seasons. The dates are transformed by the Vedas, and so on.

original: gang zhig zla ba'i nang du nyin zhag tu gyur pa de nyid ni lhag par 'gyur te nyi ma'i zla ba ste 'pho ba'i zla ba la nyin zhag gcig lhag pa de nyid dbu ma'i yan lag tu rig par bya'o //

translated: Whatever is a day in the moon becomes the excess. The solar month, the month of the revolution, has one day in excess. That is to be known as the middle limb.

analyzed: du ba btang nas skar ma bzhin rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //

translated: Again, when the glorious KƒÅlacakra enters the enjoyment of the three years, at that time it will not be seen.

original: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na ste de ltar mjug rings de'i 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas pa'i dus kyang shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na ste de ltar mjug rings de'i 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas pa'i dus kyang shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the rising portion of it is known, in that way, when the rising portion of that comet is known, its rising will be known for an infinite time.

original: da ni dus kyi 'khor lo lo gsum gyi nyin zhag de nyid nyi shu rtsa lngas bsgyur zhing bgrod pa'i nyin zhag gis dman pa la dgu bsres pa rnams gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa /

translated: Now, the very same day of three years of KƒÅlacakra, multiplied by twenty-five and diminished by the traversed days, with the addition of nine, is stated to be the circle of the planets.

original: lo yi nyin zhag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lo yi nyin zhag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The author] says, ‚ÄúThe days of the year, etc. ‚Äù

analyzed: lo yi nyin zhag ni stong phrag gcig dang brgyad cu'o //
translated: The days of the year are one thousand eight hundred.

original: de nyid lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mda' zhes pa lngas bsnun pa ni bsgyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mda' zhes pa lngas bsnun pa ni bsgyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That is multiplied by five and again struck by five, which is the meaning of transformed.

original: de ltar dum bur bsgyur ba ni nyi shu rtsa lngas bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dum bur bsgyur ba ni nyi shu rtsa lngas bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the transformation into parts is multiplied by twenty-five.

original: bgrod pa'i nyin zhag ni brgya brgyad cu ste des dman pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i nyin zhag ni brgya brgyad cu ste des dman pa'o //
translated: The traversed days are one hundred and eighty, less than that.

original: bgrod pa gcig la gza' rnams longs spyod pa'i dbang gis bgrod pa gcig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgrod pa gcig la gza' rnams longs spyod pa'i dbang gis bgrod pa gcig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: In one traverse, the days of one traverse are less due to the influence of the planets' enjoyment.

original: bug pa bsres pa rnams ni bug pa zhes pa dgu ste de dag gis bsres pa rnams ni rang rang gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis gza' lnga po rnams kyi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bug pa bsres pa rnams ni bug pa zhes pa dgu ste de dag gis bsres pa rnams ni rang rang gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis gza' lnga po rnams kyi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
translated: The mixed holes are the nine holes. Mixed by them, the circles of the days of the five planets are due to the influence of their own traverses.

analyzed: gcig tu bsdus pa las drug stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa dgu lhag pa'i khri phrag gnyis te /
translated: From the sum of those, there are two myriads, with two hundred and ninety-nine in excess.

original: de las sa skyes la ni ri klu drug ces pa drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las sa skyes la ni ri klu drug ces pa drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of one born on the earth, there are six hundred and eighty-seven days in the group of the six, mountain, hole, serpent, and so on.

original: ri bug ri klu ste zla skyes la stong phrag brgyad dang bdun brgya dgu bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri bug ri klu ste zla skyes la stong phrag brgyad dang bdun brgya dgu bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of one born in the month, there are eight thousand, seven hundred and ninety-seven.

original: lha'i bla ma dag la so me rig byed de bzhi stong sum brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i bla ma dag la so me rig byed de bzhi stong sum brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of one born under the constellation, there are three thousand, three hundred and thirty-two.

original: pa sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig ces pa nyis stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig ces pa nyis stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of one born in the paksa, there are two thousand, two hundred and forty-seven.

translated: In the case of one born in the solar day, there are eleven thousand, seven hundred and sixty-six days in the group of the six, mountain, sun, and so on.

analyzed: sa skyes la ni ri dus gcig kyang zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi bar ni 'grel bshad las sngar brjod zin to //
translated: In the case of one born on the earth, there are two verses beginning with ‚Äúmountain, time, and one, and so on,‚Äù which have been explained above in the commentary.

original: da ni gza' rnams kyi skye ba dag par bya ba'i don du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gsungs pa zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod ces pa ni de'i steng du dag pa ste grub pa'i mtha' la'o //
analyzed: da ni gza' rnams kyi skye ba dag par bya ba'i don du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gsungs pa zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod ces pa ni de'i steng du dag pa ste grub pa'i mtha' la'o //
translated: Now, in order to purify the birth of the planets, the group of lunar mansions is taught. The enjoyment of the moon in six months is on top of that, in the conclusion.

analyzed: 'on kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis byed pa la ltos pa'o // mjug rings 'char ba la yang phyogs gsum gyi nyin zhag gis rgyu ba'i rkang pa bsgyur ba ni chu srang gi tshogs phyed dang bcas pa'i brgya bcu gnyis su 'gyur te de nyid mjug rings shar ba nas nyin zhag so so la 'gyur ro zhes pa ni bya
translated: However, it depends on the power of the intention of sentient beings.

original: bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Also, in the rising of Ketu, the movement of the lunar mansions by the days of the three directions is 1200, half of the total of 2400 finger lengths. That itself is the rising of Ketu, and it should be understood that it occurs in each day.

original: gang zhig phyed kyi chu tshod rgyu skar gyi bu lon gyi gnas nas thob pa zhes pa ni sems can rnams smin par bya ba'i slad du ma'i la du ma'i tshig go //
analyzed: gang zhig phyed kyi chu tshod rgyu skar gyi bu lon gyi gnas nas thob pa zhes pa ni sems can rnams smin par bya ba'i slad du ma'i la du ma'i tshig go //
translated: What is obtained from the debt of the lunar mansions in half a period is the word of the mother for the sake of ripening sentient beings.

original: de ni gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba'i stobs gsungs pa zla skyes zhes pa la sogs pa ste zla skyes gza' lag dang blon po phur bu ni myur ba ste myur bar rgyu ba phyed snga ma la shar bar gyur pa na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba'i stobs gsungs pa zla skyes zhes pa la sogs pa ste zla skyes gza' lag dang blon po phur bu ni myur ba ste myur bar rgyu ba phyed snga ma la shar bar gyur pa na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The strength of the planets‚Äô courses is stated in ‚Äúmoon-born, etc.‚Äù The moon-born, i.e., Mercury, and the minister, i.e., Jupiter, are swift, i.e., move quickly, and are strong when they rise in the first half of the course.

original: sa skyes dang mjug rings ni sa skyes mjug rings te 'khyog po la zhes pa dkyil 'khor phyed yongs su btang nas rim pa min pa la longs spyod pa las stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa skyes dang mjug rings ni sa skyes mjug rings te 'khyog po la zhes pa dkyil 'khor phyed yongs su btang nas rim pa min pa la longs spyod pa las stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Earth-born and Ketu are strong when they enjoy the crooked, i.e., the second half of the circle, i.e., the reverse order.

original: dman pa spen pa dang pa sangs ni dal ba la ste rim pa'i phyed phyi ma la stobs dang ldan no //
analyzed: dman pa spen pa dang pa sangs ni dal ba la ste rim pa'i phyed phyi ma la stobs dang ldan no //
translated: The inferior, i.e., Saturn and Venus, are strong in the slow, i.e., the second half of the order.

original: rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhes pa ni khams kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhes pa ni khams kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the power of the qualities of their natures‚Äù means by the power of the qualities of their elements.

original: rgyu ba lhag ma la ste rgyu ba gsum las skyes la sogs pa rnams stobs med do //
analyzed: rgyu ba lhag ma la ste rgyu ba gsum las skyes la sogs pa rnams stobs med do //
translated: The remaining courses, i.e., those born from the three courses, etc., are weak.

original: myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te gza' thams cad myur bar rgyu ba phyed snga ma la shar du kha phyogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te gza' thams cad myur bar rgyu ba phyed snga ma la shar du kha phyogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Swiftly turning to the east, all the planets move swiftly. In the first half they turn to the east.

original: slar yang de dag 'khyog por rgyu ba la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa na gzhan du mngon par phyogs te nub tu mngon par phyogs so //
analyzed: slar yang de dag 'khyog por rgyu ba la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa na gzhan du mngon par phyogs te nub tu mngon par phyogs so //
translated: Again, when they enter into moving crookedly, they face another direction, facing west.

original: dal ba rim pa'i phyed phyi ma la lho ru bzhin phyogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dal ba rim pa'i phyed phyi ma la lho ru bzhin phyogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Slowly, in the second half of the sequence, they face south.

original: rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang ste rim pa min pa'i phyed phyi ma la byang du gdong phyogs par 'gyur te tshig 'di ni dbyangs 'char ba la sa'i stobs kyi don du'o //
analyzed: rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang ste rim pa min pa'i phyed phyi ma la byang du gdong phyogs par 'gyur te tshig 'di ni dbyangs 'char ba la sa'i stobs kyi don du'o //
translated: Also, due to the power of their own motion, in the second half of the sequence out of order, they face north. This verse is for the purpose of the power of the earth in the rising of the tones.

original: da ni nyi @202a * //
analyzed: da ni nyi @202a * //
translated: Now, the sun

original: ma dang zla ba'i rkang pa gsungs pa zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur zhes pa bzhis bsgyur ba de dag mkha' mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zla ba'i cha 'phel ba'i don du rkang pa
analyzed: ma dang zla ba'i rkang pa gsungs pa zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur zhes pa bzhis bsgyur ba de dag mkha' mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zla ba'i cha 'phel ba'i don du rkang pa
translated: They are multiplied by four and are the lunar feet for seven days.

original: brgya nyi shur 'gyur te 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: brgya nyi shur 'gyur te 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o //
translated: The lunar feet are one hundred and twenty.

original: khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams bzhis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang zla ba drug gi bar du nyi ma'i rkang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams bzhis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang zla ba drug gi bar du nyi ma'i rkang par 'gyur ro //
translated: The twelve houses multiplied by eight and the Vedas are the solar feet for six months.üîΩThat will be explained later.

original: de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya ste 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa tsam gyis rkang pa 'di dag gi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya ste 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa tsam gyis rkang pa 'di dag gi nges pa'o //
translated: Here, this is just a brief summary of the determination of the feet.
